campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
If the Dash BANDO 3.0 gets funded, we will make sure everything goes according to plan to meet the promised deadlines. Projects often have trouble completing production and meeting the expected deadlines for shipment. The project could face possible challenges if the quality of the product or packaging does not meet our requirements. However, we will personally be in charge of assembling and shipping all of the pledge rewards as soon as we reach our goal. Our last project was fortunate enough to deliver earlier than expected for most backers. Our team is experienced and has been preparing for months to ensure that post-funding will be like clockwork when the time comes.
Although we do not see any direct risks and challenges, there are always indirect or unseen tasks that may present itself during the process of productions. We hope to run everything as streamlined as possible and also ahead of schedule. Like most small businesses, we face a challenge when trying to offer affordable pricing while postage rates are continually rising. Furthermore, due to lack of infrastructure and transport from the global pandemic, reliability in shipments have plummeted resulting in increased costs and losses.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
We've designed this wallet to last longer than our BANDO 2.0! Using an aerograde aluminum internal storage system, the BANDO 3.0 is now more durable than ever. We even have a two year warranty should anything ever happen to your wallet!
Sustainable materials
Bando 3.0 uses animal-free eco synthetic leather. We have used cruelty-free vegan materials for all our wallets since 2013! More than a billion cows, pigs, goats, sheep, alligators, ostriches, kangaroos, and even dogs and cats are cruelly slaughtered for their skins every year. Let's do our part!

campaign.story:
With USB 4, Thunderbolt and USB will converge. HALOBAND USB 4 Super Cable is powerful and durable, and the price is reasonable, your cable nightmare might be over.

USB 4 is an upgraded version of Thunderbolt 3 and has better compatibility. A few years ago, Intel announced that it would make Thunderbolt available to everyone without any royalty fee. So the USB-IF is taking advantage of that by integrating Thunderbolt 3 specifications into USB 4.
Stretch Goad 
FASTER DATA TRANSFER
Transferring data between Thunderbolt3 /USB4 devices at up to a staggering 40Gbps.
This cable can transfer 25GB of data in ten seconds. Faster than ever.


FAST CHARGING
Super Cable can also supply up to 100W of power delivery.
You can quickly charge your laptop, mobile phone, etc.

SUPPORTS ULTIMATE HIGH DEFINITION DISPLAYS
High volume data capability makes the USB4 Super cable ideal for high definition video.
Supporting Dual 4K and Ultra HD displays, sharing content between screens is easy, without compromising quality.

Dual 4K/5K/8K
Supports external GPU



You can use it to connect EGPU to play games.


Or improve work efficiency.
Obviously, you can also use it to connect a Hub.

Super Cable is made of high-quality coaxial cable, with braided layer and reinforced design, which means good data transmission quality, and tough and soft.
 Stretch goal unlocked:  1200D Kevlar fiber will be added. 
5 times stronger than steel, It will make the cable tougher.



Italian vegetable tanned leather cable tie

Super cable has a very good leather cable tie. Easy for you to organize and commute.





Specs
•Name: HALOBAND USB 4 Super Cable
•Length: 1M/3.3FT
•Weight: 45g
•Color: Black
•Material: High quality customized coaxial cable, Kevlar fiber.
•Data Speed: 40Gbps
•Fast Charging: Yes, up to 100w, E-mark chip inside.
•Display: Dual 4K/5K/8K
•Connector: USB-C (USB 4)
•Compatibility: Work flawlessly with any device that use a USB-C connector, backward-compatible with USB 3.x, 2.x and 1.x devices

About us
Our product vision: simple, durable, worry-free. We seek the strongest and best materials to develop products with ergonomic designs.

Our team is based in San Francisco, Shenzhen and Osaka. Craftsmanship is what we pursue. We have excellent product development engineers, and we have a mature production and manufacturing supply chain to ensure that our products are of high quality from design to output. Our first generation Super Cable have received a great response since they were put into the market. Now we are developing a new generation products, which we believe will bring surprises to our users.

Design Concept and Why Kickstarter
The cables is one of the most commonly used products in our daily life, but is usually of simple and poor quality. We hope to create some products that are more exciting.
We made our first designs focused on the appearance. We require the joints be very smooth and also be durable. After some brainstorming, we were able to come up with the design we wanted.
After many instances of mold-opening, we finally got what we wanted.
We are proud of it. We chose Kickstarter for two reasons, one is to verify our ideas, and the other is to promote the mass production of products to get better quality and cost. If you are interested in our products, or would like to bring our products to your market, please feel free to contact us.
campaign.risks:

As a hardware project, there are natural risks and challenges in engineering and manufacturing. Due to supply chain issues and other reasons, the final manufacturing schedule may be delayed. However, we will be as transparent as possible to keep you informed and work to resolve any issues that may arise. If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to contact us.

campaign.story:
Monument is a smart photo storage device that automatically backs up and organizes all of your photos and videos while protecting your privacy and security. 
Now, Monument is even smarter to organize all of your memories by people, scenery, location, camera and more while eliminating duplicates — automatically. It's more intuitive and without clutter.
With built-in SSD, Monument provides you the reliability that you can trust for your precious memories. SSD is the fastest, most reliable storage technology. That’s what you need for your photos!

You can also use choose the diskless model to use existing USB drives for storage and add more capacity when you need more. 

There's no limit with the storage capacity to use with Monument 2. If you plug in a 12TB USB drive or an SSD module, then you will have 12TB storage. 
Monument 2 offers two models according to your storage needs:  
This model includes a built-in SSD storage. You do not need to plug in anything else. The storage capacity can be upgraded by simply exchanging the SSD module in the future.  
This model does not have a built-in SSD storage. 
You can add your own:
- external USB Drive or
- M.2 2280 SSD module to use as your storage. 

For example, if you plug in a 2TB drive, then you will have 2TB storage space. 
* Diskless model also comes with the M.2 SSD connector on it. This allows you to add your own SSD module in the future. 
Monument 2 can now be accessed from any computer as a network drive. 
This is a pretty big feature that allows users to:
Quickly access all content directly as they are stored on the drives
Use the Dropbox folder to quickly drag and drop photos/videos to be imported into Monument library
Use Smart Folders to browse by locations, cameras, tags etc. without launching the Monument app
Store other files types other than photos and videos
Automatically back up all of your photos and videos from your devices: phones, computers, hard drives, SD cards and cloud accounts. 
Using a camera? Just plug in the SD card to Monument - that's it! You do not need to turn on your computer to sync photos. 

Compact Flash Cards can also be imported using USB readers. 
Preserve the original, highest level or quality of your photos. Monument supports the most common RAW formats.  
Photos and videos that are already backed up can be removed to save up space from your phones. 
Monument mirrors the contents to another USB drive (RAID-1) or to a network drive (NAS) automatically. 
Import your existing folders and Monument will automatically carry over the folder/album structure. So you can keep things the way they are. 
Simply plug in the drive and Monument handles the rest by scanning all photos and videos by eliminating duplicates and sorting them like magic.
Put your private data on Monument with advanced security that protects what's yours. Only you have the access - no compromises!
Giving away your private data could leave you vulnerable to misuse of data, hacking or manipulation.
  Many companies collect personal information by processing your photos in the cloud, it means they can use or sell your personal information.
End-to-end encryption gives you the confidence to keep your content completely secure and private. There are no ads, data mining, or user profiling.
  Your data never leaves Monument and it is processed locally. The built-in Neural Processing Unit (NPU) allows Monument to analyze your content to recognize faces, scenery and other properties locally, on your device.
Add password protection to your photos and keep your private items safe and always under your control.  
Spread the joy by inviting your friends and family and share your albums and photos with them. Just select the photos or albums you'd like to share and Monument automatically creates a secure sharable link for you. 

You can also add additional users to your Monument and share photos and albums effortlessly.  
Sharing with users on Monument
Share photos with anyone using secure links.
With its cutting-edge performance, Monument gives you everything you need: speed, smarts and privacy —above and beyond without any monthly fees.

Monument is moving the processing power to edge and using Artificial Intelligence to provide cloud-level photo management experience without compromising security and privacy. This gives us a massive advantage to use the processing power and the storage on the local device with no infrastructure cost. 

Unlike public cloud services, Monument does not process, collect, use or share any personal data. You keep the ownership and have full control over your content.

You can use Monument as an alternative to Google Photos and iCloud or as a secondary backup to keep everything under your control. Monument does not require any additional fees. 

With Google sunsetting its free unlimited storage plan, you can switch to Monument 2 and enjoy a comprehensive suite of features to centralize and manage your photos while keeping your personal data private and without paying any monthly fees. Monument does not analyze your photos to serve you ads or influence your choices. 

If you're an iCloud user and looking for an alternative, Monument 2 can help you stop paying monthly fees. Also with Monument, you are not locked into a single platform and can share content across all of your devices: Windows, Android, Mac and iOS. 

The photo editing feature allows you to tweak your photos without leaving the Monument app. You can crop, color correct, change orientation and even apply a wide range of filters. 
The best part is that after editing your photo, both the edited and original versions are stored on your Monument.

Full List of Image Editor Features:
 All devices: Edit photos on the go using the Monument app on your phone or on your computer.
 Cropping and rotation: Crop, rotate and transform photos. We even have common social media aspect ratios saved for quick edits. 
 Filters: Add filters to your photos using the intensity slider to customize the filter strength. 
 Adjust: Customize everything from saturation, brightness and contrast to create the impact your photos deserve. 
You may be looking a for a cool gift idea for your family and friends. 

Beat the holiday rush and spread the love by supporting Monument this holiday season. You can print the fully customizable gift certificate to give it to your loved ones before we ship Monument 2 to the address you pick in May 2021. 

Once our campaign ends, simply enter the name and shipping details of the recipient into the form (backer survey) that we will send to your email address. 

Monument 2 is ten times faster and smarter than its predecessor, it's the world's smartest storage device. 

With the addition of  Neural Processing Unit (NPU), it's now more accurate, faster and provides new levels of artificial intelligence that makes Monument smarter than ever.

Enjoy high speed on your network using dual band 5GHz WiFi or Gigabit Ethernet.
Bringing a seamless photo browsing experience isn’t just about hardware quality. It’s also about our applications that are developed based on our users’ feedback. We’ve been adding features and optimizing the overall experience since our launch. In the past four years, Monument has gotten faster and more accurate.
  Here’s a quick demo showing how Monument 2 works:
If you are an existing Monument user, you are eligible to get an additional $10 from any price tier to upgrade to Monument 2. Please see FAQ for instructions. 

Diskless Models
Single unit
Twin packs
Built-in SSD Models
1TB built-in SSD models
2TB built-in SSD model
 Est. Delivery: May 2021

* International shipments may incur additional duties and taxes. These will be calculated and need to be paid separately after the campaign -before shipping starts.
* Refunds for the first generation Monument users: Please check the FAQ for further instructions. 

We can not thank our Kickstarter backers and early users enough for being with us on this amazing journey. Monument would not be possible without their help and feedback. 

Today, we're proudly serving over 20,000 users all around the world and help organizing photos as easy as taking them. 

Monument 2 is a result of all of our learnings from our first product. We see this campaign as an opportunity to introduce Monument to more users and help them keep their personal data safe -as it should be. 

We can not wait to introduce our new and improved product to all of you. We're excited to come back to Kickstarter again and being a part of this amazing community. 

A special thanks to our early users, investors, partners and our supporters who believed in Monument throughout our journey.


Production of the first generation Monument
This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarter launches with 1,400+ successful Kickstarter projects and over $500M raised in total.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Monument 2 is our second Kickstarter project and it is a culmination of years of experience in development, manufacturing, fulfillment and customer support. We have shipped the first version of Monument to users from 120 different countries and gained an invaluable experience. 

If we experience any difficulties along the way, we will be as transparent as possible and communicate every detail in a timely manner. 

- Software Development 
If you were a part of Monument 1 campaign, you may have experienced difficulties with our initial software. Thanks to our early supporters, we have improved the overall experience significantly. 

While the software architecture for Monument 2 is developed from the ground up, we're using a significant portion of the existing code base which is pretty stable. Monument 2 software is currently in internal beta testing. The foundation of the client apps is based on our existing software and we've been testing them internally. We are not expecting delays with the Monument 2 software. 

Additionally, we will ship review devices to our beta users before the mass production starts. Doing so, we can ensure the software meets our expectations before we start shipping all rewards.

- Manufacturing 
The hardware development of the Monument 2 is complete and the design is verified. We're working with our existing manufacturing partners and they're ready to continue with the production once the certification is complete. 

- Fulfillment 
We have an ongoing fulfillment operation and been shipping Monument worldwide. However, due to COVID 19, we have been observing delays with certain carriers and changing regulations depending on the destination due to lockdowns. This may result in additional delays for these regions. We promise to be as transparent as possible while working towards a solution if such issues arise.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

Production

updates.update_userinfo: One month in: Off to a great start
updates.update_content:
Hello!
It's been a month since finalizing our campaign and we're making a great progress. Before jumping into the details, we'd like to thank you again for your amazing support. 
Briefly, we're currently on track with our goals and working hard to ship Monument 2 as planned in May.

Hello everyone, 

We did it! After a 30-day campaign, we crossed the finish line today by raising $905,280 from 3,899 backers. We are so grateful for and humbled by your incredible support. THANK YOU!

updates.update_userinfo: 3100+ backers with less than three days to go!
updates.update_content:
WOW! We exceeded our initial goal and continuing to see amazing support from everyone. And now, with less than a few days remaining, we are super excited and need your help to get the word out about Monument 2 by sharing our campaign. 

Monument 2 Giveaway
To sweeten the deal, we're giving away(*) Monument 2 to three lucky winners! You earn entries by signing up on the . If you already backed Monument, we'll give you a credit for the same pledge amount you backed. We'll announce the winners after the campaign is over.

Hello everyone, 
We are now halfway through our campaign and passed $500,000 with over 2,000 amazing backers. We are so grateful for your support!

Now, let's dive into the updates:

New features added - Woo-hoo!

Hello everyone!

We're now hours away from passing the $250,000 pledge amount with support from 1,100 amazing backers.
Four yours ago, after exhausting preparation and sleepless nights, in a notoriously cold Chicago winter, we launched our Kickstarter campaign to introduce our little idea to the world.

campaign.story:
Introducing MICRO: Grow Superfoods on Autopilot
It fits anywhere and grows food for you while you do nothing. Simply add your favorite seeds and enjoy healthier meals while MICRO does all the work.
  Did you know microgreens have up to 50x more nutrients than other full-grown vegetables? This fact combined with its delicious flavors makes it perfect for at-home meals.

         But, growing them can be a big commitment, from properly watering them and fighting against mold…

         Now, MICRO takes care of all the dirty work, helping you enjoy nutritious micro-greens for tasty meals that impress your loved ones.
Imagine all the unused space you could use to grow nutritious & tasty superfoods at home, on autopilot.
Four Micros in a cupboard
The Trend of Home Gardening
Creating the Perfect Environment
MICRO’s contained environment gives it the perfect temperature and humidity to grow healthier microgreens, all while reducing the chance of fungi or mold without the use of harsh chemicals.
Growing microgreens isn't always easy...

Micro is the perfect self contained growing environment.
Three Agriolabs Micro's stacked on top of each other on a kitchen counter.

Now, Anyone Can Enjoy Effortless Superfoods At Home
Do you enjoy healthier eating but not the cost associated with it? Imagine being able to pay close to nothing to grow fresh superfoods in the comfort of your home, all with zero effort! You can add homegrown basil onto your next baked pizza or fresh, aromatic mint for your loved one’s chicken dinner.

        Growing micro-greens doesn’t have to be difficult… With MICRO, you can choose to grow healthy superfoods at home without the hassle of maintaining a home garden.
This device grows nutritious delicious microgreens, You can stack them, and it only requires water once a week.


 Easier Than Ever.
Meet Dirt-Free Growing. Meet Seedpad. 
Sustainable
Sourced from Alberta, Canada, Our Seedpads come with perfectly organized seeds held in place by an organic, rice-based glue.

         Once you run out, you can get more from our online store, or never run out by subscribing to one of our plans (starting at the cost of Netflix) that works for you. 
Or... if you're feeling really adventurous, feel free to experiment with your own growing mediums and seeds, we can't guarantee they'll be as awesome and effortless as using Seedpads though!
Why Hemp Fibre?
It is the perfect foundation for microgreens because of its ability to store water and create a healthier, more breathable environment for plant roots.

         It’s also great at preventing mold and makes it easy for you to harvest your plants without making a mess.
Perfectly Placed Seeds.
Our hemp fiber Seedpads are pre-seeded for your benefit. Uneven seeding can cause clumping, which can lead to mold and other headaches.

         With our Seedpads, you will always get the best yield.
Wanna use your own seeds? No problem.
Our blank hemp fibre Seedpads perfect for the growing enthusiast who’s eager to grow to their heart's content. Simply add your own seeds and watch the magic unfold!
As blank Seedpads don't have the built in black cover layer, we recommend covering and adding weight to your seeds while they're in the sprouting stage for stronger & healthier greens.

 How does it work? 
3 Simple Steps...







How Is It Powered? 
Micro and all of Agriolabs' future modular products will use the Powerplate.
The Powerplate and MICRO magnetically snap together, easily transferring power. Each Powerplate can power up to two Micros when used with any USB Charger and up to four micros can work their best when using the Agriolabs high power 3 Amp charger.

        Want to power more? Stack another Powerplate on top of your fourth micro and keep growing!
Harvesting Your Food Made Easy
Simply take your Seedpad and cut the Microgreens with scissors or a knife. 

No need to wash as there is no dirt and no chemicals used, just add your microgreens straight into your meal. Whatever you don't harvest can be left on the Seedpad to continue growing for up to 14 days*, ready for the next time you want to add something special to your meal.
*leaving it longer may result in overgrowth/suffocation which can lead to premature decay.
What Will You Grow With Your Micro?
What will you grow?

 The possibilities are endless...
It’s The Small Things That Matter.

MICRO is your personal gardener and does all the caretaking for you so you can spend more time living. All you need to do is pour water once when starting a seedpad, or once per week until harvest.
Micro’s controlled environment prevents bugs, rodents, and other pests from easily getting inside and harming your crops. Built for humans, the magnetic drawer keeps even the smartest fluffy companions out.
Say goodbye to invasive and unwanted lighting. The enclosed design makes even the largest collections of Micro's easy on your eyes.
Our Custom, In-house LED Matrix
Engineered for maximum food growth.  
We've tested dozens of light patterns with different diffusive and reflective materials. We’ve even looked at different curvatures to come up with the evenest lighting we can get in a compact space. Our LED system guarantees that all your microgreens will grow to a beautifully uniform height for maximum yield.
  Why Pink Light?  
There's a good reason you'll find pink lights in many indoor commercial farms, and Micro is no different. Using LED's that target the specific wavelengths of light where plants are the most efficient at their photosynthetic process allows us to be more effective with the lighting as well as use less power.
The Power of Modular Design
Every Micro has zero holes that you have to plug something into. Instead, they magnetically snap together, securely transmitting power to each other.

        All this is possible because of the Power plate which is the base of your stackable garden. But wait... The power plates are stackable too! Magnetically snap another one and make your garden taller.
 The Story Behind Agriolabs and the Micro
 S T R E T C H   GOALS
Stretch goals are reward tiers that become available for purchase or are automatically applied to applicable rewards.

Included Performance USB Chargers - Applied to Quad Stacks | Unlocks at $13,000
With the Agriolabs Performance USB charger, you can ensure that your quad stack will always be performing at its best without any dimming or loss of power. All Quad stacks and above will automatically have these added to their rewards when we surpass $13k!

Seedpad Include Label Stickers - All Tiers Containing Seedpads | Unlocks at $20,000
Keep track of whats in each micro, especially if you have stacks of them. We make these stickers in house, just like everything else. Every Seedpad will come with a label sticker.

Dishwasher Safe Water Drawer & Removable Drawer Fronts - All Micros | Unlocks at $30,000
Wanna keep an eye on your microgreens as they grow? Simply remove the front of the drawer after the microgreens have sprouted (doing this before may result in poor sprouting due to lower humidity). 
While the drawer water reservoir isn't that hard to clean with a sponge and some soap,  we'll make it extra easy by making it dishwasher safe. Just throw it on the top rack of your dishwasher and wash as normal! Easy peasy. 

Truly Wireless Powerplate - CAD$35 | Unlocks at $50,000
The Powerplate requires power via a USB-C Cable... Or does it? With the Wireless Powerplate, the Powerplate itself can be the power source for your Micro's. Simply charge it up, stack your Micro(s) on top, and it'll last you long enough to grow a delicious bed of microgreens. This add-on will allow you to have true freedom. Want to grow microgreens under your sink? Behind your toilet? On the top shelf of a secret closet? We won't judge, go wild, enjoy that absolute freedom.
We have some plans and drawings but haven't done all the calculations to finalize this design yet, but we'll make it happen if you make us!

Injection Molded Shell - Automatically Applied to all Micros | Unlocks at $100,000
The Micro is full of intricate details that all work together, and most of those details are impossible to injection mold. The outer shell is not one of them. 
What's injection molding though!? Injection molding is type of manufacturing where plastic material is melted, and injected into a metal mold. The mold cools and a solid plastic part is formed. Injection molding is how much plastic items are made and is known to have good surface quality, depending on the machine/finishing process.
Although our 3D printed build quality is not that far off from injection molded plastic, the outer shell of the Micro actually takes the longest to print. It's full of broad simple shapes that injection molding would do a fantastic job of creating. Thus injection molding our shell will result in a more consistent build, and quicker fulfillment. It'll also allow our specialized 3D printers focus on what they're good at.

Want to see more stretch goals? We're open to ideas. Chat With Us

Let's Go Hyperlocal... Wait, What Does That Mean?
Traditional agriculture is one of the leading causes of carbon emissions worldwide. Growing “hyper-local” means your food doesn’t have to travel thousands of miles to reach you and cuts out unnecessary middlemen all while delivering you healthier, more affordable food. This is our first step to making hyper-local the new normal.
Did you know the average North American throws out about $2000 of food a year?
        A majority of that food waste is organic content which produces methane gas, which is 25x more damaging than carbon dioxide.
Hyper-locally grown food reduces the demand for less sustainably grown produce, as well as tasting better and staying fresh much longer, reducing the amount of organic waste going to the landfill.
Beautiful, Sustainable Design
  ADDITIVE MANUFACTURING  
Is a term for when you add material when creating something instead of taking away material like subtractive manufacturing.

        The most commonly known form of additive manufacturing is 3D printing, which is used in most components of our products with a special high-quality, high-strength version of the bio-polymer called polylactic acid (PLA).
  SUSTAINABLE TO ITS CORE  
Your contribution to less global waste doesn’t just start at your first harvest. With additive manufacturing and high quality, compostable bioplastics, it begins the moment you invest in an Agriolabs product.
  HOW DOES IT WORK?  
Like nature, 3D Printing builds layer by layer, until the finished product is done. This efficient process allows us to use our material to its greatest extent and minimize waste which is good for the environment and our pockets
    THE CHALLENGE.  
Time. 3D printing takes a long time compared to more traditional forms of additive manufacturing like injection molding.

        However, with our print farm growing and constant advances in technology, we are slowly reaching up to the speeds of traditional manufacturing processes.

        We strive to have the best surface finish on all 3D printed parts, whether that means post-processing or working with our material supply partners & polymer engineers to source innovative materials to further improve the visual and structural quality.

The Humans Behind Agriolabs
Bragging isn't really our style, but we aren't lying when we say we've got the most amazing team ever. Agriolabs was made to tackle big problems by leveraging awesome technology and out of the box thinking. Everyone in the team is a natural problem solver in their own way and we all share the same mission to do good, sustainably. We start with the MICRO as our first step in our mission to get more people eating what they grow, reducing their waste output and carbon footprint. 

What we'll do with your support:
You've decided to support us with your hard earned money, you can bet that we'll use it wisely. From creating jobs, helping reduce food waste, or building vertical farms in the oceans, know that you're supporting a innovative startup that is willing to take massive action. 
 Are you looking for the stretch goals here? You'll find them about 3 sections up :)
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Why are seedpads Canada only?

Our seedpads contain organic seeds embedded in hemp fibre mats and covered. This means that most departments of agriculture will NOT allow them to be imported as they are unable to identify the seeds easily, as well as the possibility of certain species being invasive, and other reasons. 
At this time we are only offering our Canadian backers seedpads in order to keep fulfillment running as smoothly as possible.


Fulfillment time & process:

We're looking at being able to fulfill most units within the next 4-6 months of the Kickstarter completing. 
We'll be fulfilling units of earlier backers first, so if you backed our project on the last day, that's still fantastic and you'll still receive your reward, but it may take longer than some other backers. 

With the pandemic still going strong, please understand that there may be delays in the global shipping system. 

Backers's rewards will be organized and processed through our online store system, so you will receive details (such as tracking #'s) regarding your package and shipment by email or text from our site. 


The more we raise the quicker fulfillment will be:

Surpassing the goal by large amounts will allow us to bring more processes in house instead of sourcing them internationally. Allowing us to:
- Bring bio-plastic resins in house where they will be processed, extruded, and used in manufacturing all under the same roof. 
- Get more, higher quality printers and exponentially increase production. 
- Create some jobs! We'll likely be hiring someone to help automate the assembly line, someone to manage our print farm, and another position as well. 
- Get some awesome universal robots to help our staff do all the heavy lifting & repetitive processes quicker and safer.


Final Notes:

2020 has been an extremely unpredictable year so far, and we have no idea what to expect with our fulfillment window extending into 2021. 

No matter what happens though, you had our backs and we'll have yours. Expect frequent updates and reports from our founding team. Our goal is to be as transparent and authentic with our backers as possible.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
The Micro has a extremely durable build. You probably won't be dropping your garden a lot, but if you do, it'll survive the fall. 
The Micro is easy to clean with some soap, water, and a sponge. Allowing you to use and re-use it year after year.
Reusability and recyclability
With a durable build of over 85% biodegradable & compostable material, the micro will last as long as you will. 
However, if for some reason it ends up in a landfill, the Micro will decompose in as little as 5 years, compared to some plastics that take decades to decompose.
Sustainable materials
The main material used in the creation of the Micro is derived from Vegetable starches, usually corn and sugar cane. It is renewable, sustainable, and helps use by-product from other industries that would have ended up in the landfill.
Environmentally friendly factories
We're a vertically integrated startup. We understand that it makes it a lot more difficult but it allows us to control every step of the process. From the sourcing of north american made Bio-polymers to manufacturing & packing our own products. 
This ensures that we operate ethically and remain environmentally friendly. Our manufacturing facilities are also optimized to reduce waste as much as possible, and recycle waste product to be reused wherever we can. All in house.
Sustainable Distribution
All our products are packaged in recyclable/compost-able material. We ensure the contents of the package are safe while minimizing material required. Boxes contain at least 10% recycled paper.
Something else
The very nature of our product is carbon negative. Growing plants not only feeds you, but feeds into our sustainability mission.

support.title: 8 Blank Seedpads
support.descp:
A pack of 8 empty hemp fiber seedpads! This seedpad is designed specifically for use with the Agriolabs Micro, but can be used by itself.
Instructions to grow microgreens on an empty pad without a Micro
1. Place the pad onto a waterproof tray.
2. Evenly sprinkle your seeds of choice onto the pad, soak, and keep it in a place of complete darkness until sprouted (3-4 days).
For stronger, healthier greens put pressure on the pad (with a book/plate, etc.). Throughout the growing process, mist 2-3 times daily to prevent your microgreens from drying out. After the sprouting period is over, remove the tray from darkness and place the tray near a window or other source of adequate lighting.
From Seed to Harvest in 10-14 days!
This amount will last 2 months when grown in a single Micro.
INCLUDES:
8× Empty Seedpads

updates.update_userinfo: Full Province wide lockdown, New filament is good, New PCB's are ordered
updates.update_content:
Hi all!
First off, please let me apologize for the lack of frequent updates and thank all of you for your incredible patience. We've spoken to some of you and we are so grateful that we've been met with nothing but encouragement and excitement for the final product. 
It's been a wild ride here and boy do we have some updates for you.

updates.update_userinfo: Quick Update about the add-on store and production.

updates.update_content:
Hey everyone!
We’ve been getting a lot of messages regarding choosing your colours for your Micros and Powerplates.
It is on our part that we didn’t include any images of those colours in our last update. However, the reason we didn’t include pictures was that we don’t have any recent photos of Micro’s in Marble, Matte Black, and Metallic Silver.

This update we talk about:
1. What's the delay?!
2. A quality product made from quality bioplastic.
3. What we’ve been doing since.
It's GO TIME - A quick and dirty update.

updates.update_userinfo: Happy Holiday Update - Lab tour and exclusive talk with the team on manufacturing, new technology, and more!
Commercial Space, Covid Lock downs, 3D printers & Assembly
Update: Parts have arrived and assembly begins, USDA approval, modular fan design, and more.
updates.update_content: We are making major progress!

updates.update_userinfo: Major progress Exporting Seedpads to the US, Removable Drawer Fronts, Potential new lab & manufacturing space, and floating seedpads?
updates.update_content:
Progress report time!
We've made major progress getting Seedpads into the states!
If you remember from the previous update(s) and comments, we've been in contact with the US Department of Agriculture and have finally received the information needed to get the Seedpads into the US. They mainly required some certifications and as our seed sources are all certified organics, it was not an issue. The final step is to check with the Canadian Food Inspection Agency to ensure our Seedpad packing and manufacturing processes abide by the guidelines.

campaign.story:
What is Earth Filter?
Earth Filter is a universial attachable filter, that can easily add filtering ability to any fabric masks, face covers, bandanas and more. 
Simply attach the filter to your current masks, and it will turn your fabric masks into a true functional mask that provide N95 standard filtering quality.

The Problem
Due to the shortage of surgical masks, a lot of us has bought fabric masks to protect ourselves from the current epidemic. The problem is fabric mask itself, regardless cotton or polyester made one, does not have the capability to filter small particles. On average, fabric masks can only filter up to 20% of the airborne particles in the air.
In plain word, fabric masks alone is not good enough. Filter is needed to add the filtering capability to fabric masks. However, filters comes with different sizes and shape, which means you might need to pair a specific mask to a specific filter. 
Earth Filter Solution
Earth Filter is created to add filtering capability to your current fabric masks, or any fabric you are wearing. 
Every Earth Filter is made with 4 layers of top quality filtering materials, which provide filtering ability to N95 standard.
With our patented pending Earth Filter tap design, the mask can easily attached to your current fabric masks and add filtering ability immediately.
Easily Uplift Your Current Fabric Mask
Even on scarf!!
We need your support - and we are offering a awesome launch deal on Kickstarter!
To make Earth filter possible commerically, we need your support to reach a reasonable scale for us to negotiate with suppliers. Hence, we are offering a really special launch offers on Kickstarter - and please support us to make this happen!
Kickstarter Luanch Rewards
We know Earth Filter can match your current fabric mask - but we are also aware that a lot of you are not able to afford those overpriced fabric mask. Here is our solution - Our Kickstarter launch will come with FREE EARTH FABRIC MASK!
Timeline
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We have lined up existing qualified factory for this campaign, and we are going to do our very best for this new product. That being said, if there are surge of demand, there could be slight delay on delivery, which we will do everything we can to minimize it.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Reusability and recyclability
Earth Filter has 60 active hours, which means you can reuse it for 2-3 days. On a yearly could, you could save up to 200 + one time usage masks!
Sustainable Distribution
All packaging are reuseable plastic.

updates.update_content:
Hi all!

my name is Keith and I am stepping in for your shipping status. First I apologize for the late reply, Johnny has passed away in late October  and did leave an empty space on the follow up.

updates.update_userinfo: 80% shipment on its way - reminding by this week
updates.update_content:
Hi all!!! Just want to give you a quick update.
we have shipped 80% of shipment so far - you should received a link by EC-Ship and tracking number, and you can see it valid by tomorrow. If you are in the USA it should arrive to you in 7 - 10 days depends on where you are at. It's generally very reliable but do get in touch if you dont receive it in 2 weeks for our CS to check.
we have some supporters filled the form a bit later than the 200 + who filled in initally - dont worry, reminding shipment will b send out within this week.
thanks all and we are here to support if anything is needed!

updates.update_userinfo: 7 days to go! Help Us to Spread the word and get protected!
updates.update_content:
Hi All! Once again I want to say thank you to all your support. It has been overwhelming and we are very, very grateful for every support.
Going into our last 7 days of campaign - I am asking for a favorite from you. Please help us to share the words, give us a shout out on social medias like Facebook or Twitter, because we believe this is not just a commerical product, but a product that can safeguard our friends an families in difficult time like this.

updates.update_userinfo: We found an interesting campaign to share with you - with buy one get one free code!
updates.update_content:
hi all! Just want to share a really interesting campaign i found - some awesome mask design from our friend - Mystical Mask Campaign.
For those who are looking for an awesome design, this is a great choice. If you are supporting Earth Filter & Mystical Mask campaigns- Mystical Mask will offer you buy 1 get 1 free offer. A Great Deal!
Thanks for all and stay tune.

updates.update_userinfo: Thank you for all the loves and support - We hitted the target!
updates.update_content:
hello my fellow friends on Kickstarter!
just want to say thank you for all the supports - we have reach the target within 18 hours! it's incrediable!!
We are going to start the manufacturing process now - so we can ship it out once the campaign is completed.

Received mine today. The filters are simply some filter paper (of unknown and uncertain type, with no certification) sewed together with thread, with a seam down the middle (which is not generally considered safe) and absolutely no "patented tap system" or adhesive or any such thing that would help it stick to any material. That was a full blown lie and this campaign an obvious and clever little scam.

I reported the campaign to KS and would like to encourage people who feel they are scammed to do the same. So we can all together bring KS's attention. Although I think there is very little chance to get things corrected, but at least we can help to ban this unreliable campaign owner from KS.
So what is the status of the shipping of the product?!

You didn’t hesitated to take the money.? So what’s keeping you away to at least tell me if the shipment has been sent and what is the tracking number.

campaign.story:
With all of today’s essential electronics, most desktops are a tangled mess of cords, complicated adapters, storage gadgets, phone chargers, and other device accessories. We asked ourselves… what if we build a product that combines them all in one elegant, effective solution?
Introducing Fophie, a reinvented desktop partner. It’s a 7-in-1 USB-C hub that includes every port you’ll need in your daily life, and a convertible phone stand that provides up to 15W ultra-fast Qi wireless charging. Its versatility gives you a hand to get things done in an efficient and easy way.
Check the hands-on video from Unbox Fantasy 
The answer to that question is Fophie. It transforms a single USB-C port into 7 useful connections, including 4K HDMI, MicroSD, SD, 2 * USB 3.1, and USB-C power delivery & data transfer along with a 15W Qi wireless phone charger. Fophie takes care of all power needs, lets you make multiple simultaneous connections and cleans up your desktop!
For the ultimate in versatility, we created two versions, Fophie is equipped with a USB-C for Power Delivery and a USB-C for Data Transfer, while Fophie Pro is equipped with two USB-C Dual Role Port (both Power Delivery and Data Transfer).
 Compatible With Multiple Devices 
Laptop, monitor, hard drive, flash disk, sd card, even Switch, and more
Wireless charging is becoming the standard for flagship smartphones so Fophie utilizes the latest Qi wireless charging protocol that supports up to 15W ultra-high speed charging to juice your phone up fast without the need to carry an extra cable.
Wirelessly charge your phone flat or while upright, in landscape or portrait mode with a convertible phone stand that keeps your phone at the perfect angle for viewing, swiping, or taking calls. Fophie charges reliably in all positions with 3 built-in wireless charging coils to ensure that there are no charging blind spots. 


 Connect your laptop to Fophie using any USB-C port. 
Get centralized! With Fophie, a single USB-C port becomes the central hub for all your power and data transfer needs. It adds practicality to your MacBook or PC by seamlessly connecting all your peripherals instantly with every port you will ever need including 4K HDMI, MicroSD, SD, and dual USB 3.1 ports using a single USB-C.
 Thanks to the foldable and lightweight design, Fophie is ideal for on-the-go work. 
Fophie is a powerful desktop central connection hub but its compact design and portability make it just as good on-the-go. Take it with you wherever your busy day takes you for meetings and business travel. It adds power to presentations and efficiency to applications that benefit from dual monitors and fast data transfer.

Fophie also connects your Switch to a big screen for a better gaming experience.
Don’t settle for less when using handheld gaming platforms. Take Fophie along and supersize your Nintendo Switch output for big screen gaming at home or on the go. Elevate your gaming experience and level up fast. 

A Perfect Desktop Organizer
Say goodbye to tangled cables and messy desktops. Fophie immediately clears your desktop of redundant cords, cables and adapters so that you can work and think more clearly. Get organized, streamline your workflow and get more done with Fophie.
 Sleek & Compact Design 
Small yet powerful! Fophie is smaller than a typical smartphone and gives you unlimited versatility in a sleek, compact, modern design that fits in any pocket for go-anywhere convenience.
Since 2014, YOOTECH has been a worldwide leader in wireless charging. Our mission is to provide the best wireless power solutions that improve the experience for our users. Yootech wireless chargers are intuitive and easy to use and we are devoted to continually innovate with stylish, high-quality, and affordable products for everyone.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
With our years of experience in the wireless charging industry, we are very confident with our process and production schedule for Fophie.

However, we also know that hidden obstacles and challenges often occur. Because of that, we’ve made sure to account for some amount of craziness or unforeseen problems that may occur in our schedule. If something does go wrong, we promise to keep our backers updated and informed about any issues and about the way in which we are solving them.

Our team is making arrangements to expedite shipping now so that we can provide the best service for our backers when we reach our funding goal.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hey everyone!
It's been a crazy month! Kickstarter is now collecting the funding money. Some payments have failed. This may be caused by many reasons including credit card maxed out or expired. So if your payment failed, don't panic. Just update your payment information and Kickstarter will collect your money soon in these few days. For backers who have already paid the money, just wait for our survey!

Dear Backer,

We greatly regret the delay in the dispatch of your order.

We are now trying every possible effort to push the production. We will arrange shipment before 15th Oct and send you tracking No asap.

Dear Fophie backers,
We sent out a survey a few weeks ago and were really glad to get your feedback! And we found that there are 113 people who haven't finished their survey yet. Please fill out the survey if you haven't already done so. Otherwise, your shipping process may be influenced. Hurry up!
Here are some FAQs for your reference.

Dear Fophie Backers,
Some of you may have already found that we just sent you a PledgeBox survey through email to collect your information. The entire process should take only several minutes to complete! And we will get the shipping started as soon as we get your address and contact information.
The invitation will be sent directly to the email address linked to your Kickstarter account. Be sure to check your spam folder in case it was captured there!

updates.update_userinfo: We Made It! 💐 Thank You For Love Shared with Fophie! 🎉
updates.update_content:
Dear Fophie Backers,
Our campaign on Kickstarter is satisfactorily completed now. Thank all of you for making it happen!
For the past 30 days, Fophie has gathered 805 backers who supported us to reach the goal with $72,656 in total. Besides, what we valued much is every insightful advice that helps us improve Fophie to better serve each of you.

Dear Fophie fans,
Thank you so much for your support so far. We are heading to $60K!!
Some of you sent emails to us and told us that it would be better if there could be an Ethernet port on Fophie.
So, here we go! Introducing the Ethernet Pack...

updates.update_userinfo: What to Expect for Fophie? See What They Shared. 📝
updates.update_content:

Thank you so much for being supportive all the time. 
Together we’ve marched through half of the journey, now you may start looking forward to receiving & fiddling with your Fophie, right? Not sure if you have seen this hands-on display from Unboxing Fantasy on YouTube or not? Why not click here & feed your eyes first:

Hello.. Will wireless charger work with oppo or poco phones? I have oppp f3 and poco f1
Totally agree with you of "I want the 2 usb c ports, both with PD and data capability" , I want to same too.
Excellent!!! We love it.

Thank you for your response! Frankly, I still don't understand the benefit, and it almost seems like the Pro is the lesser option. In the non-Pro there are the two Type C ports including the cable used to plug in meaning that two Type C ports are available immediately. However, in the Pro option only one of these ports is available as the other is being used for Power. Requiring one of the two Type C on the Pro be used for Power effectively means there's only one usable Type C for peripherals on the Pro while there's two on the other model.
The main difference is that Fophie has a built-in USB-C cable, a USB-C PD port, and a USB-C data transfer port, while Fophie Pro is wireless and has two dual role port.
bye..

campaign.story:
Texts translated into French have the sign (FR) before.




So FUN! Throw SCRUBBIO on any metal surface you want as a fridge or a credenza.




Scrubbio is the latest generation of environmentally friendly silicone Brush for Kitchen & Bathroom. Magic for your Daily Life & Ultra Durable to preserve Nature.
Scrubbio is 8-in-1 multifunctional made with recyclable & ultra durable high quality silicone.
It is magic ! With its magnetic power, you can put it where you need it most and is therefore instantly accessible.
Scrubbio can be uses as :
A Dish brush 
A Pot holder 
A Trivet 
A Soap dish 
A Vegetable brush 
A Coaster 
A Spoon rest 
A Scrubber for bathroom 
And even much more ...
(FR) Scrubbio est la dernière génération de brosses en silicone écologiques pour la cuisine et la salle de bain. Magique pour votre vie quotidienne et ultra durable pour préserver la nature.
Scrubbio est multifonction 8-en-1 fabriquée avec du silicone recyclable et ultra durable de haute qualité.
C'est magique ! Grâce à sa puissance magnétique, vous pouvez la déposer là où vous en avez le plus besoin. Elle reste ainsi instantanément accessible partout.
Scrubbio peut être utilisée comme:
Brosse à vaisselle
Manique
 Dessous-de-plat 
Porte-savon 
Brosse à légumes
Sous-verre
Repose cuillère
Brosse pour salle de bain
Et bien plus encore ...



To generate foam, we recommend putting a few drops of soap in the middle of the hair of the sponge and rub it. The foam will appear and remain as magic.



With just a few drops of soap, dirty dishes can be easily washed.






We are Designers and we are constantly looking for solutions to simplify our daily lives adapted to our times.
The 2 main daily observations that created Scrubbio are:
We have far too many similar items in our kitchen & bathroom.
 To preserve Nature, we must drastically reduce our production of single-use products & daily products. We have to reduce our mass production.
We need more durable products
  This is why we created Scrubbio: to replace all similar and single-use products with only a simple product, thereby considerably reducing our production.
This product replaces many other products in your home and will decrease global production. You could also keep it and use it for years. Scrubbio is made with a recyclable & ultra-durable silicone. 
We must reduce our production of products to save nature. We have to produce durable and recyclable items easily.











So FUN! Throw SCRUBBIO on any metal surface you want as a fridge or a credenza.





The magnetic trivet function is just magic, very practical and incredible. Don't you think ?







 No risk of receiving a broken product because Scrubbio is unbreakable;)

* Except for Pack Pro.









Yannick HESCH was born in France. He  studied at the European  Design Institute of France and obtained a  Master of Industrial Design at the University of Salford in England. He  has worked for more than 15 years as an industrial designer and graphic  designer. He works between Lyon and Paris and has already advised more  than 300 companies. He is passionate about everyday objects because he  thinks that one lives better when one is surrounded by beautiful and  good objects. He loves cooking and that why he has invented the ORIBOARD, the canap GOOD MOOD, the table NATUA,  the MEOMITT and hundreds of other objects for branded companies. He has already won many awards for his work, including a medal at the Lépine International  Competition.
For the SCRUBBIO, for the first time, he will manage the project from A to Z.
(FR) Yannick HESCH est né en France. Il a  étudié à l'Institut  Européen du Design de France et à obtenu un Master  de design industriel à  l'Université de Salford en Angleterre. Il  travaille depuis plus de 15  ans comme designer industriel et graphiste. Il travaille entre Lyon et Paris et a déjà conseillé plus de 300  entreprises. Il est passionné par  les objets du quotidien car il pense  que l'on vit mieux quand on est entouré de beaux et bons objets. Il  adore cuisiné et c'est pour cela  qu'il a inventé l'ORIBOARD, le canapé GOOD MOOD, la table NATUA, MEOMITT et encore des centaine d'autres objets pour des entreprises. Il a obtenu de nombreux prix dont la  Médaille de bronze du Concours  Lépine et le Prix Lumières de la Société  Lyonnaise des Inventeurs et  des Artistes Industriels (SLIAI).
The SCRUBBIO TEAM was specially created for this project to monitor mass production, respond to your requests and make deliveries. It is ready to deliver thousands of SCRUBBIO worldwide before Christmas.
(FR) L'équipe SCRUBBIO a été créé spécialement pour ce projet pour suivre la production, répondre à vos demandes et réaliser les livraisons. Elle est prête à livrer des milliers de SCRUBBIO dans le monde entier avant Noël. 
SUZIE, the cat, is perfectly integrated into the project. He loves SCRUBBIO to get rid of his hair and have caresses. She also loves to play but is still very elegant and calm. She brings us a lot of happiness and helps the whole team to reduce their stress. Thanks Suzie.
(FR) SUZIE, le chat, est parfaitement intégré au projet. Il adore SCRUBBIO pour se débarrasser de ses poils et avoir des carresses. Elle adore aussi jouer mais est toujours très élégante et calme. Elle nous apporte beaucoup de bonheur et aide toute l'équipe à réduire son stress. Merci Suzie.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We are committed to meet your expectations without any possible delay in production or delivery.
We rate the risk of unexpected delay as being very low.

Even though this is our first project on Kickstarter, we have participated in other projects. We have also carried out other projects of silicone objects incorporating magnets and we are experts for this.

Thank you for your trust and your patience.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
Scrubbio was created to last for years to limit and reduce the production of kitchen and bathroom utensils.
Reusability and recyclability
Scrubbio is easy to recycle because it is only made of silicone. The magnet will also simplify its sorting in the recycling chain. Scrubbio can be transformed into bricks to insulate buildings.
Sustainable materials
Scrubbio was created with a high quality silicone to last for years.
Sustainable Distribution
Scrubbio was created with a high quality silicone to last for years.

updates.update_content:
Dear Backers :)
As we improve SCRUBBIO with better silicone and better mold, SCRUBBIO is becoming more and more popular in the world to avoid the waste of sponges and replace many products.

The best thing that SCRUBBIO can do is help us change our behavior: Don't throw away, let's reuse!

updates.update_userinfo: SCRUBBIO is getting more and more popular around the world. HELP US to make it even More Popular.
updates.update_content:
Dear Backers :)
THANK YOU to everyone who talks about SCRUBBIO around them and in social networks. Thanks to you, SCRUBBIO is more and more popular on the planet.

Of course in the United States, but also in Europe, in the United Kingdom or in Japan. The more becomes popular, the less disposable sponges will be produced (And other products).

campaign.story:
It is ultra strong. 
It is ultra stylish.  
It is ultra stretchable.  
And it's better for the planet. 
In addition to being stylish AirBag™ is an environmentally conscious product too. We don't want to be just carbon neutral, we want to be carbon positive. We will offset carbon emissions of manufacturing AirBags™ and shipping will be carbon neutral whenever feasible, subject to regional availability. 
Further to that, for every bag sold we will help protect a slice of precious wildlife habitat through the World Land Trust's 'Buy An Acre' scheme, best represented by their patron Sir David Attenborough. The World Land Trust is an international conservation organisation that takes direct action to save rainforest and other biologically important lands. Every backer will receive a card detailing how exactly we helped and we will quantify their personal share. It means you could learn that by buying AirBag™ you saved 3 trees, 1/2 of a chimp and around 55 caterpillars! How cool is that?!
The more you buy - the more rainforest we save together - the more Air to breathe!       
All pledges come with free shipping. Shipping logistics will be optimised with the aim to ensure no US or European customers will be taxed or charged extra VAT. Please note customers with shipping address other than in the EU and US will be responsible for duty, VAT and other fees applicable to the their location. We ship plastic free and carbon neutral.
Design credits
Icons made by Darius Dan, Smashicons, itim2101, photo3idea-studio, smalllikeart, monkik, Good Ware and Freepik from www.flaticon.com
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Manufacturing
We have developed dozens of prototypes of AirBag™, both in-house and with several manufacturers based in Asia and Europe. Having been able to compare a diverse range of pros and cons, we have chosen an experienced, reliable, top quality manufacturer based in the EU and we've agreed on all key terms with them such as lead times, minimum order quantities, terms of quality assurance and pricing. 
We are, however, not dependant on one manufacturer and we have a sound contingency plan. There might be no planet B, but we definitely have Plan B should there be a delay. 

Shipping
Our ultimate goal is to ensure that no US and EU based backer pays any import duties, taxes or other charges on top of their pledge. We have found a fulfilment partner who will help us deliver on that goal.

Timing
Our timeline published above includes some leeway for unexpected events, except COVID-19 and any other force majeure.

COVID-19
Our delivery schedule assumes manufacturing capability of our supplier currently affected by COVID-19 delays returns back to normal by mid-May. We will be closely monitoring the situation and provide you with regular updates.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
AirBag™ has been designed to last a lifetime. We've intentionally chosen a more expensive manufacturer because we want to be 100% sure that we offer quality to support our claim. We've chosen a special, high-strength and durability material and added ripstop technology to make it significantly less prone to ripping and tearing.
Reusability and recyclability
AirBag™ is made from partially recycled material and it is fully recyclable (at least in the EU and UK).
Environmentally friendly factories
We have compared a number of factories in Asia and Europe and the decision is to proceed with a factory in the EU, which meets a number of criteria from carbon offsetting, fair wages, meeting EU environmental standards etc.
Sustainable Distribution
Whenever available, shipping will be carbon neutral (currently we can guarantee this for customers in the EU and we'll be aiming for the same for orders from the USA as a matter of priority). All shipping will be 100% plastic free.
Something else
For every bag sold we will help protect a slice of precious wildlife habitat through the World Land Trust's 'Buy An Acre' scheme, best represented by their patron Sir David Attenborough. The World Land Trust is an international conservation organisation that takes direct action to save rainforest and other biologically important lands. Every backer will receive a card detailing how exactly we helped and we will quantify their personal share. It means you could learn that by buying AirBag™ you saved 3 trees, 1/2 of a chimp and around 55 caterpillars. How cool is that?!

The more you buy - the more rainforest we save together - the more Air to breathe!

updates.update_content:
Hi Fam!
Hope you are good and safe.🩺 Progress update on the manufacturing process. Due to the second outbreak and toughening up of rules, the production had to break for a while. This caused a great deal of anxiety to the team🥺 as we quickly had to replace the manufacturer. The good news is that we managed to do that at the end and the production has currently resumed though after losing money and time. So please accept our sincere apologies. We are currently trying to push for before the end of the year-delivery. On the bright side - once the production is finally over, shipping should be fast to make up for lost time.🏃🏻‍♂️
Kind regards,

Hi fam!👋🏻
Many thanks for submitting your surveys.👍🏻 Another reminder for those of you who still are behind the schedule - please ‘hurry up Cinderella!’, the surveys will be closing TODAY, 15 September, @23:59GMT.⏰
Keep rocking!🤘🏻

Dear fam! Hope you have been all keeping well.😷
The time has come for us to gather your colour preferences and mailing addresses!🪂 Check your inboxes. You should all have received those long-awaited surveys by now. Should anything change, you will still have the possibility to update your shipping address until September 15. 🗓
Lots of love

Hey guys!👋
Long time no see (yes, we know, so sorry!). No, still no trips to the Carribbeans but rather lots of work to start manufacturing. 💪 
We are talking to the manufacturer and we are discussing the quote based on the number of rewards and a few other points.

updates.update_userinfo: Working hard to move from production planning to manufacturing!
updates.update_content:
Guys and girls, ladies and gents you absolutely rock! 🤘🏻
Mega thanks to all of 1,097 of you, who supported AirBag™, donated your hard-earned cash and made this project a reality.💰You are our true inspiration and you keep us moving every single day! You can imagine how fast we are running around the block now to make sure the production will start on time! Please watch this space for further updates on our sprint!🏃🏻
Thank you from the entire MindBoxx team!❤️

Dear AirBag Tribe,
You have been simply PHENOMENAL for the last 27 days. It is incredible to see so many people care this much about the planet and all things sustainable. So thanks to all 1,037 of you.🤘🏻(and to those who will join later).
We’ve still got last couple of days to go. So if you want to upgrade your pledge or buy an extra bag for mama with 40% OFF retail price, it is your last chance! (you’ve been w.a.r.n.e.d!🔫). Otherwise we still love you unconditionally you know.🕺🏻

updates.update_userinfo: FINAL CHANCE to grab more AirBags!!!🏃🏻
updates.update_content:
Hi AirBag Fam!👋
Designers, programmers, fashionistas or simply nerds, whoever you are - you are OUR TRIBE, dear Kickstarter community! Your insane curiosity and passion for all things next keep us going every day. So THANK YOU for being part of this journey and getting AirBag 1,171% funded.🚀
Forever grateful we decided to extend our EarlyBird rewards. 🦆So there is still some space to push as we have additional 24 hours of Early Bird bonanza left. (till 8 pm BST, tomorrow, April 26!).🌞 Thinking of your friends and family or perhaps want to upscale your own reward?! This is the right time⏰

campaign.story:
We design and make amazing candles that burn like no other.
At Spiral Light Candles we believe candles should not only burn clean and smell great, they should also be fun to watch. Our unique, patented, two-candles-in-one design started with the idea that you could create a candle without the wasted wax left over from burning traditional candles. The idea is simple. Why not move the wick from the center of the candle out to the outer edge? Now you’re burning the side of the candle that normally ends up in the garbage. As the candle burns, the sides flow into the middle leaving you with a cozy, wood wick candle at the end.
We started Spiral Light in our garage in 2017.  The demand for candles has grown faster than we could ever have imagined possible. This leaves us with no choice but to seek out a new, larger facility and create custom machines to help make enough candles to keep up with demand.  This Kickstarter campaign means we don't need to "sell out" to investors or handcuff ourselves to big banks/venture capital firms. This enables us to continue focusing on independent retailers and resisting the demands to put our candles in big box stores or on Amazon. Don't get us wrong, we like our "Prime" too. We just also like shopping local and our candles give stores an exclusive product they can sell without fear of being undercut.
To find out more about us and to try some for yourself, click Back This Project. Or read on to hear more of our story.

PLAY





 Unique Design:
Spiral Light's unique design burns in a circle for the first three hours, filing in its hollow core. This is our "Party Trick!"
Long Burning Time:
When the hollow center is completely filled and the spiral portion burns out, you're left with a wood wick candle that you can enjoy for over 40 hours. That's the "Real" candle.
 Clean Burning: 
What's the recipe for a clean burning candle? It's a highly refined, food-grade, edible (please don't eat it) wax perfectly matched to the right sized, 100% cotton wick. It is phthalate-free scent oils mixed with vegetable-based colorants finished off with a locally sourced, softwood wick.
Great Scents:
We work hard to make sure every candle smells great. It starts with a bit of an obsession, add a little love and just a touch of family disagreement and voila, you have our candle scents. Seriously, we work with some of the best scent companies in the United States to bring you great smelling candles without the nasty chemicals.
Handcrafted in the U.S.A
Unlike a lot of candles, ours are all made in the United States from raw materials sourced right here in the U.S.  While we've been able to modify equipment to help us pour our candles faster, everyone of our candles is still hand-manufactured by our family and employees in our facility in Minnesota.


We could have just been happy that one of our candles actually worked and set off to make a million of them but we didn't.  We have three different sizes and burn times so that everyone can afford to try a Spiral Light and make them their favorite "go-to" gift item.

We can climb the highest mountain and scream out all the great things about Spiral Light Candles. But, in the end, we are only as good as what our backers think.  We know we have a great product that people will love but it sure is nice to see it in writing.

Loyal to the Local Store
If we had a dollar for every time someone asked us when we are going to "Sell out" to the big candle industry or show up on Shark Tank, we wouldn't need to look for backers. We are driven to remain the champions of smaller, independent retailers across the Country. We can do this without investors, without big box stores and without Amazon. Just our family, our friends and our backers making a great product for great people.
Manufacturing Capacity
Our Existing Factory  
When we started this adventure just over two years ago, we took a huge leap of faith and built out our current 2,500 square feet manufacturing space and small retail store. While it served us well at the time, It's already too small.

The New Space
This is the new home of Spiral Light Candles. At almost 8,000 square feet, we now have the space necessary to grow.  We need your help to bring in the new equipment and hire the people that will help us keep up with the growing demand.

Not sure how this whole Kickstarter thing works? Read on.
To help us get the new factory up and running, you must become a "backer" of this Kickstarter project. To do that, you pick a reward tier to support the campaign - you will essentially be pre-ordering one of our candles or candle packages. In exchange for your support, you will get a special backer discount and deals that will not be offered anywhere else. 
Shipping is expected to start in September of 2020, and your payment/credit card will not be charged until the campaign is over, which is May 5th, 2020. 
If you would like to add something additional to your reward that is not listed above, you can do so by using the Add-On Menu below. Any item (or combination of items) below can be added to your pledge by manually increasing your pledge amount after you choose a reward level. 
Confused? Send us a message - we would love to help!
 We hit our goal! Thanks to your amazing support we hit it in less than a week. Thank you so much. To celebrate we have unlocked two additional bonus rewards. 

Enjoy them on the patio
Working from home? Perfect time for a Spiral Light
Popcorn, a puzzle and a Spiral Light. The perfect stay at home survival kit!
Get Your Project Funded Today!
Get Cash Back on the Projects You Love!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
As with any Kickstarter project, there are certain risks and challenges must be overcome to produce a fantastic product for you. The good news is we have been making these candles for well over two years. We don't need your help to make a candle, we need your help to grow into a national brand without selling out to the big box stores or venture capitalists. While the ongoing Covid-19 pandemic has created a complicated environment for a lot of small businesses, we have managed to stay lean throughout our entire growth spurt. We do this by paying for everything we use upfront and we have managed to stay debt free through it all. We will survive and with your support we will use this time to grow stronger.
 
Your help ensures that we can grow to meet the demand necessary to stay independent and to continue to sell our super cool candles through independent retailers without the need to sell out. 

A lot of Kickstarter projects get tripped up during the shipping and fulfillment stage. Believe me, after this last Holiday season we've got this covered. We have the right tools and people in place to make it work.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
Our candles are by nature a consumable item. We do however get our long burn time by utilizing an extremely hard wax.
Reusability and recyclability
Our unique candle design was invented with very idea that we could completely use all the wax that is normally wasted in a traditional candle. When burned correctly there should be nothing to throw away except a tiny sliver of wax and a recyclable steel clip. With no jar, there is no glass to dispose of and the light-weight, hollow design means our shipping impact is less than half of traditional candles.

We package all our candles in recyclable kraft paper boxes and ship only using starch based packing peanuts and 100% recyclable shipping boxes.
Sustainable materials
Our packaging is manufactured from recycled kraft paper. Our wax is a food grade, edible wax (please don't eat it). We use 100% sustainable cotton and softwood wicks. Our scent oils and vegetable based colorants contain no toxins nor California Prop 65 components providing a very clean burning final product.
Environmentally friendly factories
Our new space uses LED lighting and a brand new and efficient heating and cooling system. We work very hard to keep our footprint as small as possible.
Sustainable Distribution
Our light-weight, hollow design means our shipping impact is less than half of traditional candles. We also spend the extra money to package all our candles in recyclable kraft paper boxes and ship using starch based packing peanuts.
