updates.update_userinfo: Trying to clear up any missing Items
updates.update_content:
Hello all.
It had been a crazy winter and covid continues to slow us all down as one of the machines we ordered back in June is finally arriving next week. 
Everything we know of had been fullfilled. We have tried to get any remaining items taken care of that might still be missing for various reasons. In more than one case we have sent multiple replacements to people and have delivery confirmations but yet they are coming up missing. In other cases it is a broken candle or a missing survey. In many cases we have had to send items later than we wanted because we can only make one scent per day and it takes us 20 days to get back around to a missing candle.

updates.update_userinfo: For those who have not completed a survey.
updates.update_content:
DIDN'T DO THE SURVEY?
We have gotten a few emails from those who say they have not completed a survey or gotten an email to verify their address. We did not use Kickstarter for fulfillment. Their interface is not conducive for shipping large number of rewards. We used a system called CrowdOx and if you did not respond to the survey it has send emails every month since June. 
If you need to complete a survey, follow this link. We cannot ship anything to you without this survey being  completed. https://app.crowdox.com/retrieve/spirallight/stop-burning-boring-candles

WE MADE IT.
Its been a marathon of sorts with lots of little bumps in the road along the way but we have finally crossed the finish line. Today the last international rewards went out. While there are a couple still hanging out there waiting for their shipping addresses, we can count them on one hand. There have been a few shipping mistakes that we have corrected and we had the one large batch of shipments go out without their "extras" but we were able to isolate it and get the extras out yesterday.

updates.update_userinfo: Shipping continues but not without small issues.
updates.update_content:
HELLO ALL.
We continue to ship about 200-250 packages a day. You will get an email with tracking when your order ships. We expect to have them all boxed and out the door by this weekend.

AN ISSUE HAS ARISEN.

HELLO ALL.
It's been 12 days since our last update and I wanted to get back to everyone. We are nearing the end. We have been making candles 12 hours a day and on weekends now for over a month. Along the way we have been slowed by COVID and the loss of two employees for just over 2 weeks. Despite all the hurdles, it has been our goal to finish production of all the candles by the end of October. While we will miss that goal by one day, I am happy to say it will be reached tomorrow.  We have had to take all of our shipping staff and move them to candle making to accomplish it but we are now nearing the finish line.

Hello All,
Just a quick update. We hope to have all orders shipped by the end of the month. We have 4,000 candles in 20 different scents ordered from 1,300 people and have been shipping as we get the scents made. It depends on the order of the backing and the scents chosen as we make the candles from light to dark in the color range. 
We were slowed a bit when two of our staff had to stay home for two weeks due to Covid exposure but are working through them as fast as we can. Thank you for your patience.
Warmest regards,
Todd and Tammi

Hello All,

As we mentioned before, we are shipping candles daily in the order they came in. We have thousands of orders to process and we are always working out bugs as we learn more about what our fullfillment process does and doesn't do automatically.

Hello all,
We have tried to be as transparent as possible from the very start so that everyone could feel confident in supporting us. We wanted to address a few comments we have been getting in an update as we cannot keep up answering everyone individually and make your candles at the same time.
From the start, our Kickstarter was designed to help us improve our existing candle not only in how they were made but the space and equipment we used to make them. We did in fact use the funds to manufacture new machines to change the very way these candles are made. Yes, we do sell our existing Spiral Lights that are made the old, slow and inefficient way. The candles shipping now through our Kickstarter campaign are all made in the new and improved and far more efficient way. Despite the Covid Pandemic slowing down delivery of our equipment and supplies, we were able to start producing and shipping the new candles to our backers this month as scheduled.

Hello All,
First off I apologize that it has been awhile since the last update. It has been a crazy time as we try and hire new employees and get new equipment in place during all the Covid unpredictability. The good news is we are now making and sending out the Kickstarter candles. They will be shipping over the next month as we get everyone fulfilled in the order they were received.

Hello all. Its been a but since our last update as we have been moving everything into our new facility and putting the final touches on the custom manufacturing equipment your generous support has allowed us to produce. We expect to atart shipping candles in the next few weeks.
We will uodate again as the boxes start going out.
Warmest regards,

campaign.story:
Simplicity and Objectivity.
 Auto sticking when it goes nearby.
You don't have to wait for it to be opened.
 No motor noise, the noise that scratch my nerves...
 Goes well with the car.
There is only one goal to achieve through 1PICK project. It is to help creating a safe and comfortable driving environment.
It is very dangerous to pay attention to mounting the mobile phone to the holder under the inevitable situation while driving.
Now, you don't need to look at it,  don't need to wait.
Just move it nearby! Enjoy your safe driving now!
So far, there's been a deadly problem for the magnetic holders.
We had to put a big, ugly iron plate on the phone. Many people want to use the magnetic holders, but they have given up on using the magnetic holders because they don't want to attach the ugly things to their smartphones.
 Which one would you attach?
 We thought carefully that... if the ugly iron plate is the problem, then why don't we use the pretty one?
Now 1Pick plate!
 The most important virtue of the smartphone accessory is "must be pretty and cool".
For people, smartphones have become an inseparable part of their daily lives and a fashion item that expresses them.
What does a car mean to you?
It may be your dream, a medium to express you and a precious being that brings convenience. We don't think anyone would want to ruin the interior of such a precious vehicle.
We think that good design is the concise one which can harmonize the complex things.
Magnetic holders are the best fit for that design. Because you don't need hands and feet to hold your smartphone!
1PICK changes the driving environment like this:
When we are boarding a car or getting off, when a call comes in or we are making a call, when we are bored waiting for a signal, we repeatedly hold and unhold the smartphones in the car.
Compare now. How is it different from your appearance?
 Magnetic Holder Testing
PLAY

PLAY

PLAY

PLAY

PLAY

The core of wireless charging is the wireless charging module. Module performance is all about charging performance, safety and failure. Most of the problems such as fire, charging error and slow charging during wireless charging are actually due to unstable modules.
 Module can be charged even at a distance of 7mm

1PICK supports up to 10W of wireless charging.
It requires 15W wireless charging functionality for both transmitter and receiver to be fully compatible for normal 15W wireless charging. The fact that the wireless charger supports 15W does not mean that all smartphones will be 15W wireless charging and even smartphones that support 15W wireless charging may vary depending on the 'standard' used. Even though the smartphone manufacture's 'original specification' has 15W fast wireless charging technology, most third-party wireless chargers do not charge 15W.
In short, most wireless charger specs you know and buy are 15W, but there is no difference in actual charging speed.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
5 years ago, in spring 2016, there was a product that I created with the idea of adding wireless charger to the magnet holder, the most convenient form. I thought, 'Let's use it until the right ready-made product came out'. So I decided to commercialize it myself and now I am trying to do more testing, research, hard work to make the right product because it is a product that many people should use.
We made our first appearance 1PICK through Kickstarter.
Most of the funding amount will be used for the development and mass production of 1PICK, Other funds will be used for the development of subsequent 1PICK products.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hello Dear Supporters!
First of all, I am really, really sorry for the late response.
While producing 1PICK magnetic holder, we found the critical bug!
Some mobile phones cannot be held on exact position because of the inner charger and camera etc.

updates.update_userinfo: Good news! Almost done! - New Update.
updates.update_content:
Hello Dear Backers,
First of all, we are sorry for the late response and delay.
We had a problem with the manufacturing company and we have been trying to solve the issues.
Currently, everything is going well. We are manufacturing the products and maybe ready to shipping soon. We really thank you to all backers for waiting us. We will post the new update when we begin shipping.

Thanks for your patience, dear backers!
We're happy to post this update with the good news!
Most of our team members have been healed from COVID-19 and we can resume working soon. We'll contact the manufacturing department to resume whole progress. Some of our products are almost in production, so we expect to start shipping for the super early birds next month.

Hello Dear backers,
Many members of our team are now quarantined by Covid-19. I am very sorry to share this bad news.
We are trying to solve the issue with everything possible. However, all we can do now is to hope that they are safe. Fortunately, none of the team members are in serious trouble.

Hello Dear backers,
First of all, we're so sorry to post the update in late.
We already completed manufacturing the products for Early Birds. But unfortunately one of our team members was infected with COVID-19. That's why we're not able to continue manufacturing and set up the delivery. We are trying our best to fix it asap.

Thank you all!
We reached 500% of our funding goal! Thanks for your firm support and love for 1PICK. With your support, we were able to raise over $10,000, bringing us one step close to our mission to provide comfortable and safe driving environment!

updates.update_userinfo: The campaign is ending soon, almost 500% funded!
updates.update_content:
Dear backers,
Thanks for your support! We have already reached 500%.
We are preparing the shipment for you. We promise that packages will be delivered in time.
Super early bird packages will be delivered by May 2020 and early bird ones by Jun. The others will be delivered after early birds.

Hello, Dear Supporters
Thanks for supporting our project.  We have hit almost 200%!  We were able to reach today with your help!
We updated the new videos for magnetic holder testing.

100% funded in just 4 days!
Dear Supporters,
We are excited to announce that we have hit 100% of our goal in 4 days.
Thank you so much for your support of this campaign!
A simple pack for super early birds will include the adsorption mount in default

campaign.story:
We are an independent design studio from the United Kingdom specialising in minimalist writing instruments made from exotic materials.
Welcome to our sixth writing instrument project on Kickstarter: Naos. 
The Naos is precision-machined from a choice of 3 materials, aluminium, bronze and Grade 5 Titanium:

Change the grip section to transform your Naos into either a fountain pen or a rollerball, and choose between a more minimalist or classic style with a removable clip. 
Extra grip sections can be purchased separately for £10, and clips are £8.





The Naos Aluminium is made from anodised aircraft-grade aluminium which protects the pen from scratches, and it also features a precision-machined stainless steel grip section and finials.
Three colours are available: Satin Black, Cobalt Blue and Aurora Green 
The Naos Titanium is machined entirely from Grade 5 titanium with a matt beadblasted finish on the barrel and a machined finish on the other parts of the pen. The top finial also features fine knurled details on the outside.
The standard stainless steel nib can also be upgraded to a titanium flex nib for an extra £45.
Bronze pens are very hard to find and usually very expensive, which makes the Naos a great opportunity to add one to your collection. Every single part of the pen except the nib has been machined from CuSn8 bronze, the same grade used in high-end watch cases. This material is very heavy and will form an attractive patina with age. 
We use only the best nibs, manufactured by Peter Bock in Germany. The Naos uses Bock 250 which is a large nib with a 6mm feed, commonly known as a #6 nib.
You can add additional nibs to your pledge. Your pen comes with a steel nib, but you can upgrade to more flexible material like titanium for greater line variation. The nibs use a screw-in assembly so you don't need any tools to change them.
Each material has a different character. Titanium has significant flex (considered a semi-flex nib). Steel is very smooth but provides little flex.
Stainless Steel sizes:  EF, F, M, B.
Titanium: EF, M
Titanium Flex Nib - EF






The Naos fountain pen can be used with international standard cartridges (short or long) or a refillable cartridge called a "converter" which has a piston mechanism inside to draw ink up through the nib.

As explained above, you can transform your Naos fountain pen into a rollerball and vice versa by changing its grip section (extra grip section required, add £10 to your pledge). 
The rollerball refill provided is the Schmidt 5888F in black with a fine tip, a very smooth writer that uses water-based ink which, unlike ballpoints, requires very little pressure to write. This reduces fatigue and cramping during writing sessions.

Keep your pen safe with our custom sleeves which are made by hand from high quality leather that has gone through the natural process of vegetable tanning.
Simply add £10 to your pledge.

You can choose options like colour, fountain pen/rollerball, and nib size in a survey that you will receive at the end of the campaign.
Interested in multiple pens? Pledge for a set and save more!


Want to add extra pens? Apart from the sets we offer, you can add extra pens to your reward simply by adding the following amounts to your pledge:
To have two writing instruments in one, just add £10 to your pledge to get one rollerball grip section with a Schmidt refill.
Add the following amounts to your pledge. The accessories will also be available to add in the survey at the end of the campaign.


Namisu was founded by Adrien Cols and Maria Millan, two fountain pen enthusiasts and designers based in Edinburgh, United Kingdom.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We have completed five large writing instrument projects over the past 5 years on Kickstarter and we will use this experience to successfully deliver your pledge.

Throughout this time, we have developed strong relationships with experienced manufacturers which is crucial to delivering a high quality product. We are using similar manufacturing techniques as our previous five projects and have developed a production prototype to validate the feasibility of the design.

We know that there can always be some unexpected delays during production but we have planned for this and extended our production schedule accordingly. Raw materials like metal rods can arrive late during busy periods of the year; machines can break down and require servicing. These are minor delays that may require a small extension to the delivery date of the project, but which wouldn't affect our ability to deliver the project.

Another common challenge is fulfilling a project that exceeds its project funding goal significantly. To solve this potential issue we are working with large manufacturers that can produce our pens in any quantity realistically possible on Kickstarter. We do not anticipate any extension of the delivery date unless the project exceeds 2000 backers, at which point we would need to revise the manufacturing completion target date.

We are also working with a professional logistics and fulfilment company which will handle all shipping and packing operations to avoid any delays during the shipping phase of the project.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hi Backers,
Good news! The clips have now been shipped to all backers who have ordered them. The clips should arrive within 4 days in the UK, 1 week in the USA, 3 weeks in the EU and 4 weeks in all other regions. Normally shipping would be much quicker but due to the global pandemic there are significant shipping delays that you've no doubt already heard about. We're sorry about the wait!

updates.update_userinfo: Shipping Update. Important info about the clip.
updates.update_content:
Hi Backers,
We’re progressing well with the shipment phase of the project. We will be shipping all Naos pens on time.
All Naos pens for USA customers (almost half of all backers) have already left our premises and are currently with our shipping partner. The pens will be shipped locally from Ohio via USPS.
All other pens will be shipped from our UK warehouse next week.
There has unfortunately been a delay with the production of clips, but we will send out all pens anyway and then ship the clips separately at a later time.

updates.update_userinfo: How to update your Shipping Address
updates.update_content:
Hi Backers,
To help us ship your Naos pen to the right place, please check that your shipping address is correct, especially if you've recently moved. We plan to ship all Naos pens at the end of the month on June 30, so we will "lock" all order addresses on Monday 22.
You can change your address in the PledgeManager survey app. You can either go back to your survey by clicking on the link we sent you in the original invite or in the reminder that we will send today in a separate e-mail.

updates.update_userinfo: Still on target for June shipping.
updates.update_content:
Hi Backers,
A quick update to let you know that we are still on track to deliver all pens by the end of the month.
As things stand, we have completed the machining and finishing of all the pens bodies, and have received the nibs from Bock in Germany. The leather sleeves are also done.

Hi Backers,
Just a quick update to say that production is going well and we are not anticipating any delays despite the current situation. We are still aiming to ship the Naos by June 30.
We hope that you are staying safe and that those of you who are confined at home are at least able to find a little more time to write with your fountain pens.

Hi Backers,
The survey is now available to all backers, please take a few minutes to complete it so that we can know which pen options you would like e.g. nib size, colour, as well as your delivery address. Below are some frequently asked questions about the survey.
How do I access the survey? We've sent a survey invitation to the e-mail you use to login to Kickstarter. Click on the link in this e-mail to access your survey. Check your spam/junk/promotions folder if you cannot see the e-mail in your inbox.

Hi Backers!
Thanks to your amazing support the Naos project is now happening! 
The next step is for us to send out the survey where you can provide your delivery address and let us know which nib size and extra accessories/pens you would like. We’re still working on the survey and we will send out another update when it is ready for you to complete.

updates.update_userinfo: New Kickstarter for HoldenArt Chess Set - Launching Tomorrow!
updates.update_content:
I hope everyone is doing well and enjoying their paper towel holders. That would be a unique thing... to enjoy something like a paper towel holder! But, please do let me know if there are any issues with yours.

I wanted to let you know that I am launching a new Kickstarter tomorrow for my chess set. The best deals are on the first day. And these prices will never again be this low!
If you or anyone you know plays chess, this is THE set to have!
Here's the link to the preview page: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/holdenart/your-new-favorite-chess-set?ref=elfgl8&token=1818d2df

With the exception of two Backers who ordered additional items (and close friends and family), all Rewards have been sent out. If you live in the USA, you should have received your PolarityGear. International Backers should get theirs in the next few days. If I accidentally did not include the tips and assembly instructions, they are here.
I have not received any feedback, hopefully folks are happy with their items. If there is anything unsatisfactory with your PolarityGear, please let me know! If you like yours, please consider spreading the word.

Again I appreciate everyone's patience. We've received all the parts and we're assembling them this week. Your paper towel holder will ship later this week. Thanks for your support!
-William

Happy 4th of July and Thank-you for your support!!
We have sent out surveys and almost everyone has replied. We are focused on fulfilling the Kickstarter orders which consist of the Countertop models (Black and Aqua) and the Magnetic Mounted model. These three items are all in production as we speak.
We wanted to package the items in a pulp paper molded structure, but we have decided against it for this first run; the expense of tooling is too much at the moment for us.

Dear Backers,
We hope all of you are staying healthy and making-do during this unique time. 
It appears that the PolarityGear products will go out in June, hopefully sooner. We were forced to change suppliers for the magnetic base. To get the cost to a similar price point as the original supplier, we decided to make it aluminum. With it being  aluminum, we wanted to beef it up a little. Aluminum is a better fit for the item and the end result looks even better. It will be either powder coated black or anodized black. We’re waiting on samples to see how they look. When the survey goes out (in a few weeks) to get everyone’s address information, folks who ordered the magnetic mounted item will have a chance to cancel or change their order since we presented it as stainless steel during the campaign. Photos will show the new aluminum magnetic mounted paper towel holder so you’ll be able to see what it looks like.

Dear Backers,
I hope this update finds you healthy. Likely, the PolarityGear product is not high on your list of concerns these days. But I felt it was time to send an update nonetheless.
There are too many unknowns to accurately predict when exactly we'll be able to ship the products out. I was hoping to get them out in April, but that is not likely. I feel like May (the original delivery date) is still promising without any major hiccups.

Again, a Huge Thank-You to all Backers! We're excited to get PolarityGear out to folks to experience first-hand. We're confident that once people use it, it will get traction and do very well. Manufacturing is on-schedule and we plan to fulfill Kickstarter orders in late April. These will be our first products out of the gate. We'll reach-out with a survey in a few weeks to get your address to send-out the products. We will never share your personal info.
In early May we will have a booth at the National Hardware Show in Las Vegas. We're planning to have a full lineup of products from production.

I'm stoked you got funded for this campaign. The product seems high quality and I can't wait to start using it in my own home. In the update you stayed the countertop tooling is finished already. Will those who back for both have to wait for both to be finished before delivery or will they come in multiple waves.
yes, it does, thanks William!
Hey Holden love the design. If it goes through will local pick up be available? If the KS doesn't get fully funded would there be a chance to buy a prototype version from you?

So, here's the deal. People get "backers fatigue" when a project keeps being cancelled or moved from platform to platform. I'm back again for the 3rd time because I love this idea but I'm sure other won't be back. If it doesn't work this time around, take a breath, do some research on successful campaigns. Raise a little money some other way to be able to advertise to get the word out, partner with some of the kickstarter promoters that will help you get the word out. Failure to raise the money you need is better than canceling because you don't like the trend you're seeing. Please don't cancel this and then come back a month later without a different plan, you'll only get the same result.

campaign.story:
Turning an idea into reality is never easy. During our journey, Zeropoint has gathered over 7,000 backers supporting our innovations. Without all your constructive support and comments, we wouldn't have the perseverance to strive for excellence. Therefore we would like to thank you by creating better products, not only bring you joy, but also make our lives better.
After the boom of I'm the smallest bag, I'm the smallest pack and I'm the anytime tote we are pleased to announce our forth milestone: I'm the foldyroll bag
I'm the foldyroll bag continues the simplicity and functionality of previous design, with enhanced shape and colors.
The auto-folding feature presents tidiness and cleanliness, overturning the traditional design of eco-bags.
   After constant review, persistent research, and serious testing, the foldyroll bag is a significant enhancement. The new design is remarkably precise in form, flexible in shape and classy in color.
The foldyroll bag has insisted on its splash-proof function, to keep dry and clean.
Single roll out to open
Rapid speed to re-organize
Auto fold in design
Simple reverse to original size
Avoiding crumple, fragility and messiness in usual bags, the foldyroll bag presents tidiness and toughness.
It is flexible in form, compatible with small items to large objects.
Made by tough material with triple stitching that holds up to 20KG.
  To cater your different needs, I'm the foldyroll bag is available in 2 sizes. The flexible design fits for small items to large items (e.g. 16" MacBook Pro).
The foldyroll bag has a significant breakthrough in providing 8 wonderful colors. Each of them is the specially picked, representing different characters. Varied from dull to bright, it is best to bring along to express your daily mood!
All backers can get limited edition, please see our update #9
The foldyroll bag is flexible and expandable to fit for variety of items. With its updated design and stronger material, we are confident that the foldyroll bag will be your best storage solution every day.
 There is no doubt that pollution is putting our earth at risk. Among all the pollutions, is was reported that plastic polluters have won in 2019, including plastic shopping bags, packages, bottles and clothes. By 2030, plastic production is expected to grow 40% by 2030. Even we can’t do huge rescue to change the environment, we can take small steps by changing our behavior. Therefore, we hope this project will not only be an innovation, but also a contribution to environmental protection.
Project timeline
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
By the experience of 3 campaigns, the most significant challenge is to breakthrough the mindset from previous ideas and not be limited to it. For this time, we have done so many researches on product and campaign design, hoping to give our dear backers some fresh features. Other than new designs, we have remained the signature features of bags collection, keeping it small, strong and stylish. We believe our experience accumulated in previous projects will make us be more mature, which brings backers a smoother operation and service.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Reallyslim briefcase is live on Indiegogo!
updates.update_content:
Dear Backers,

Reallyslim briefcase is live on Indiegogo!

comments.content: Mine arrived this week as well. (US)
Mine finally arrived.
I'm Backer #830 and still haven't received my bags. Where are they???
HK, Arrived at processing centre (Electronic customs information submitted) 2021-05-03 16:52
I have still not received this. Please advise.
#1344 , where is my order?
How is there an update for another Kickstarter when all we want to know is when this one will be fulfilled?
Again, where is my order? I'm thinking that this is a scam as I see others with the same issue.
Anyone else?
K
If you don't like uncertainty, don't invest in uncertainty...
Indiegogo Foldryroll bag backer #238 haven't received anything, was ordered in December and "Shipped" end January, a response to my communication would be nice...

Okay. I will wait for this. AND YES, obviously as anything on Kickstarter, there is a certain level of risk and uncertainty, however if there would have been clear communication and transparency, then we wouldn't resort to calling this specific project a scam.
Same here. they've moved on and I never received anything, despite contacting them. I find it really hard to believe that it was lost in the mail... twice? I don't think so.
Still nothing
Will I be getting my items soon?
Thanks. Keep your damn bags, I'm getting my money back.
I’m backer #1560, haven’t received my items yet nor the response needed emails. What’s going on?
I still haven't recieved my bag. Any information on what's going on?
Hello, I haven't received anything so far
Reply to my DMs creator!
Thank you!
Still waiting Zeropointdesign - and I’ve paid extra for tracked shipping, an update would be nice...
Please respond.
Backer 1384, and I haven't seen anything yet. What can we do about it?
Backer #1423......I’m still waiting for my set of 2 bags. Please advise how to get we can get this straightened out. Thank you
I have not received my order yet.
I regularly receive packages from different countries!
I have also not received my bags... sounds like I am not alone.

Obviously others have had problems with poor packaging, no shipment at all, and disappointment with bag size. I have no expectation of ever receiving the bag that was lost in transit. I will join with others in flagging the new project.
Thanks, Fernando. I’m joining you.
Where are my bags??
Where's the bags? Shipping or tracking info?
I never got mine. Or a tracking number for that matter. What happened?
thanks, got it and replied
Still haven’t received mine. Not even tracking number.
thanks. I can take a photo if needed and show you the damaged shipping envelope.
I’m still waiting to receive my bag............
@Zeropoint my bag has still not arrived. Even with covid, there's no way it would take almost 5 months for for my backer rewards to ship. What happened?
Oi! You gonna give us acknowledgment of having seen our messages?

You informed us that the Earlybird rewards had shipped on 18 May and asked us to be patient. I have been very patient and its now four months later and no sign of my bags. Please tell me what you will do about this.

@Zeropoint team- My rewards shipped on May 5th and I have not received them. I have sent a PM with my new address. I turned the keys in yesterday to the apartment and won't have access to that address. I look forward to hearing from you about how to proceed.

Mirabile dictu! The two bags I backed I-don't-remember-how-long-ago (April? May?) just arrived. The package is stamped 20Apr2020, so apparently it takes about five months for items to ship from Hong Kong to Maryland USA. This logistical detail would have been good to know earlier. Quality of bags is good, small easily holds two 1-liter bottles of water.

I got part of my order and it’s disappointing. This bag looks great but the size is very small, basically useless as a reusable bag. Won’t carry nothing except small things like candy bars. And when is the last time did you go to the store to get just candy bars.
Subbu.
To my surprise 2 packages with 1 bag in each arrived, but as I know I only backed for 1.
Aside from that, they appear very well made, and I tested them out by loading them up. They are stronger than they look! So I'm satisfied.

I finally received my bags. Like others have mentioned, the dimensions are terrible and significantly smaller than promised. No idea what these are supposed to be used for. I thought the Large bag was the Small until I opened up the other....that was a disappointing surprise.

ok arrived just after the comment, they are surely smaller than expected (i have the small and large ones); i think all the photos are with the large version and are quite misleading, also the material seems cheap, will see how long they last!
Backer 669 - STILL no bags. Oh where oh where have my (apparently very) little bags gone, oh where oh where can they be???
I have not yet received my bag.
I'm sorry. I meant to get back to you. I received the bags the day after I posted this so all good. :)
So my parcel arrived. Only problem, there was no bag inside....
Does anyone else with a tracking number have a similar result?
My husband and I just bought a house. I'll moving over the 2 weeks. How should I go about updating my address?
Hi I am backer #1597. When will you ship my reward?
Feels like a rip off and definitely the last time I backed something from this creator.
Just got mine and I'm with everyone else: this thing is way smaller than I expected.
I just recieved two small and two tiny bags. However, the colours are nice.
Just received mine in Germany. Well ... they are really small, don’t know what to do with them atm but maybe in the future there will be the right use for them.
I'm still waiting for my order here in the US. Update please? Has it been sent? Lost?
Did you get my answer?
Hello, up to now there has been no arrival of my bags. Can you please provide information or a tracking number? Thank you

Backer #669, ten MORE days have passed and there is STILL no sign of my two bags (one large bag, one "regular" bag) - it has been well over three MONTHS since these bags were shipped on 5 May 2020. Will they EVER arrive??? Am I in a Beckett play ("Waiting for Godot"?)
the bags are a bit smaller than what i expected.
Any plastic or reusable bag has 3 times more volume that this. And this is the bigger size bag.
Just received my two bags, delayed a bit along the way, but very nice and worth the wait!
So here in Cali and nothing...
P.S. - I kept the package in case you need photos. Just let me know.
got mine today. dates on the package were Apr 20th from 0. and the stamps had Jun 30th.
I GOT MY BAG!!!!!! Sorry, didn't mean to yell. It's great. I love it.
Sent you all a message a month ago and never received a response.
I’m backer # 1617, my pledge are for 2 x Original and 2 x Grand. I only received 4 x Original bag. I want my 2 x Grand Foldyroll bags.
I'm backer #1,512. I just received a "package", but the package was empty. There was a note attached by USPS to say that there were no contents. Please advise on how you can rectify this situation?
Hey, still haven’t received the bags yet. Anything I could do atm to get them ?
So where are the bags. Backers deserve an answer. I'm #860 in the US but by the number of comments I see below - looks like the majority of us haven't received them.
Just reported that project to kickstarter
I have also reported it, I just don't get any message back from the creator. I have also tried to contact them via facebook.
Still haven’t received my bags in the UK.
Backer #669, STILL no sign of my two bags (one large bag, one "regular" bag) - it has been close to 100 days since these bags were shipped on 5 May 2020. Over three months - where are they???

Given that even un-tracked mail should have arrived to their destination countries by now, I would have hoped that as backer #4, I would be considered one of the earliest backers. Alas, nothing in Canada yet, and I don't seem to be the only Canadian without their order. I would like to continue supporting your company (for which I've backed nearly all products to this point), but at this rate, I'm not sure I would back your next project, given the lack of communication and service. Still, I understand that the current conditions are unprecedented, so hopefully that's all it is vs. a lack of transparency. Good luck, all the same.
cheers!
Backer #1423. US. I’m still waiting to receive my rewards. Should be here by now. Any updates or more info?
Support the call for an update/tracking numbers - STILL no sign of bags that were supposed to be shipped to Maryland in early May.

I’m not sure there are tracking numbers. Mine were in a regular paper enveloppe with just regular stamps and obviously sent as a letter, with no tracking number. From the the comments I’ve read of other people who received theirs, it seems to be the same for them.
I have not received my two bags yet. I did fill out the survey but have not received them. To arrive in the US. Please look into this for me.
Tracking numbers?
Please provide tracking number to verify and provide an update immediately. This was supposed to arrive in April and it is now August.
Got one of the four bags. The other three were lost in the mail. I spent a lot of money for a very small bag.
Hey, still nothing here in Germany. Anything you could do to solves this circumstance?

Extra early bird backer and still no sign of it in Canada. Also, every time I make a post like this here, the creator sends me a pm of my pledge. Like I get it, untracked airmail. Still doesn’t explain why it hasn’t arrived after all this time
Backer #4, still haven't received my pledge reward.
If your envelope tore as mine did (luckily address still visible) your items are probably in lost postage offices all around the word!
Don’t be too stressed (apart from loosing your money) as the bags are quite unusable, the are way too small & I got the larger size
They're smaller than I expected, but otherwise alright.
Should note that I never got a tracking number either. It just showed up.
I haven’t received mine either. Also no tracking number. I am in the US
Just received mine. Also a super early bird backer.
Please investigate and provide an actionable statement.
Finally got mine today and I'm a super early bird backer and was told it was shipped out in May just happy they finally arrived.
Can you tell from where are you from? waiting for mine also from May.
I'm in the USA
A general update would be great to get some new information about the status of the parcels.
Backer #697 located in the US. STILL no delivery or information about my order. PLEASE let me know what's going on and when I might expect delivery. Thanks.
A cheaper solution would be to add better instructions on a proper way to fold the bags back again to avoid this problem.
Still not received (#1328) ..
I have not received my order yet either. Why aren't you posting a general update so we know what is going on? Please let me know the status of my order. Thank you!
I completely agree; instead of sending these dumb copy and paste responses one by one, just post one big update for everyone to see...
I’m still waiting for mine. Patient but starting to wonder where it might be. Any updates?
thanks.
same here!
Also nothing here in Massachusetts!
I also haven’t received my bags, and also didn’t receive a tracking number.
yes, received mine 2 weeks ago. (London)
I got mine today
Backer #715 in Canada. Has anyone in Canada received their bags? The tracking number I received hasn’t provided an update in 2 months.
I'm Backer #141 and my Super Early Bird rewards haven't arrived. Can you please look into this for me?
Backer #669 - STILL nothing in MD, US. Trying to be patient [drums fingers on desk]
A little in convient when its so small. i can barely fit a 6xpack of beer or 4 liters of milk.
I cant even fit 3 Liters of MILK!!!! wtf.. that was a bit tooo small compared to what you said would be done.. I can see the seweing is not the best either, so thats maybe why you hold as much??

Arrived in Northern California. Spent a looong time in shipping, but did arrive. As others have commented, smaller than expected but quality seems in line with expectation. I'm guessing that the materials were bulkier than expected and to keep the rolled size down compromises were made…. Anyway, they will be useful for going for a walk and coming home with a few unexpected groceries, and that, for me, was the point.
Still nothing in Canada.
Same here, also nothing yet in The Netherlands
Just received a tracking email from Asendia, is that to do with this shipment? It doesn't mention what it's for...
Seems like they moved to Indiegogo.
California here as well, I haven't gotten anything yet but this gives me hope I'm receiving it soon

Received in Switzerland. Both sizes are about 1.5 cm or >5% i.e. statistically significantly smaller than stated & they were kinda thin in the first place. So basically kinda disappointing but, hey we don’t do Kickstarter for stuff we really need & they weren’t exactly expensive right? We live & learn & this time I’ve learnt the foldyroll people deliver - which is definitely better than some - but not enough to make me feel like backing them again. As they say better to under promise & deliver beyond expectations than to over promise & disappoint.
Has any one in the USA received theirs yet?
I'm still waiting for mine.
Nothing yet in Maryland. :-(
Backer #1502. 2 x grand bags received in Australia. Great product and have put it to good use already. Thanks.
Hi. I haven’t received my items. Any updates are greatly appreciated. Thanks!
I received all of my bags! Thank you!!
I didn’t even get a tracking number
I also have not received anything from this campaign.
Nothing in France still waiting
Same here
Still haven’t received anything in the UK
Backer #584....hope it shows up soon so excited to use it!
Backer 971, still nothing
I am dissapointed from this product.
Received my foldyroll bags today, they are great thanks so much.
Backer #669 - have received NOTHING so far. Please can you advise if your records indicate my reward was sent?
Hi, I don't have received any information about my pledge, could you help me?
Right? They don't even acknowledge it in the replies. The closest to it was the previous reply you got. We are all complaining and their reply is "Cheers mate"!
Yeah, they just don't seem to have a clue...
Hey, I haven’t received my bags yet. Any information for me about shipping ? Are they lost on the way ?

Came on here to see if others in the US have received their bags....found out I’m not alone. Has anyone had any communication? Between incorrect bags received and the bags being smaller than promised cannot honestly say I’m excited for them to arrive at this point.
I have not received anything. Super early bird, repeat backer.
Still no tracking or delivery here in Canada.
And it's been a month!!!
Also the tracking number seems to be useless, you cannot trace further details than it being handed over to the carrier if you're from Canada, US or Netherlands.
Still haven't received anything 🤷🏻‍♂️. Losing faith.
Nothing here in UK, tracking still shows '20-05-2020, handed over to carrier'
Can you please let me know when my bags have been shipped. I have not received anything. Thanks
Received mine in japan, Thanks!
I'm an extra early bird backer and I haven't received a tracking number or parcel yet.

I’m a super early bird backer in the uk and also haven’t received anything yet. I also haven’t received a tracker number nor have I received a response from the query I sent the creator several days ago regarding this.
anyone in the UK got theirs yet?
Alessandro
I'm a super early bird backer and I have yet to receive any shipping email or have gotten the product. Please provide an update ASAP.
I have not received anything or a tracking number. Please help.

Hi team, I'm a super early bird backer and I have yet to receive any shipping email or have gotten the product. It has been close to a month now since the update that all super early bird backer reward are ship can I possibly get a status update on my shipment. Thank you
Received both in the mail today, the Super Early Bird batch. Thank you Zeropoint, it really works! So easy to keep it back into shape. Good quality material, stitching, with long handle. Keep it up!
Neither the tracking number nor the bag has arrived. Any problems?
Or did you deliver the wrong size to me?
Backer 241, where is my product?
Thanks!
Hi there, I didn’t get my tracking number although my pledge was super early bird
Lana
Is shopping already started?
How can I change my address?
6. and they don't tell me the forwarder so I have a problem to prepare the invoice they ask for
Congratulations. Pics are fine. Looking forward to my foldy bag. Thanks for the update.
I finally changed my emjoi sad face to the happy face today - had been a sad face when I couldn't click to update my address etc. Hang in there. fellow kickstarter supporter.

campaign.story:
Why are so many toiletry bags poorly designed? We've blown through lots of age old zipper nylon and ziplock bags. Standard bags leak, break apart, mix everything together and makes traveling a hassle! 



Report Counterfeits: We appreciate if you can help us to report counterfeits: hello@escpade.com 
This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 900+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $390MM raised between them.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We are working with a high quality, reputed manufacturer. They process high volume orders from best bag companies in the world. However, there are always some unforeseen risks in a new project. But we have consulted the best experts in manufacturing and logistics. 

All the possible risks and challenges have been covered.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
Highest quality materials in the market ensuring lifetime warranty on Escpade!

updates.update_content:
Dear Backers, 
The day is finally here! Shipping of your rewards started last week on August. Our shipping partners are processing orders as we speak and you will soon start getting emails with order tracking information.
Please Note: Some backers might receive tracking email earlier or later than others. This is because the orders are shipped out in batches and it will take some time to process all orders.

Dear Backers
First of all, a BIG thank you for all your support and patience! We are excited and happy to announce that we will start shipping out the bags first week of August as promised in our last update!
Please note: We will close surveys this Monday EOD. So please complete the surveys.

updates.update_userinfo: Starting Shipping | Surveys close in 2 days!
updates.update_content:
Hello Backers!
Great news! Production of Escpade bags is complete!
The Escpade bags are ready to be shipped out! The quality check of the bags will start next week and then they will be packed and ready for our courier partners for pickup.

updates.update_userinfo: Rewards Survey - Last Call + Shipping Update
updates.update_content:
Dear Backers
Hope everyone is safe! These are difficult times for all of us. When we started this project, like everyone else, we had no idea how the world will change in few weeks! With your support, we were able to vastly surpass our goal and YOU brought our dream to reality. 
We are posting after some delay, as we were trying our best to meet the June deadline for delivery and only inform you after confirming everything. We have had some delay on 2 fronts: the raw material supplier had supply chain problems so he delivered the material little later than expected. Secondly, the shipping world is upside down right now. The shipping rates are higher than we estimated before Covid when we launched the project. Some routes are not even open yet.

Dear Backers,
Hope you all are doing great and keeping yourself safe!
So, what’s been happening?
Surveys are hugely important for us and we wanted to be completely sure with what we promise. It took us a while to send out the surveys because we wanted to be sure the manufacturing and shipping was in place and on time before promising you anything. We are delighted to say that manufacturing is going on as scheduled. We are still working with our shipping partners to make sure rewards will start going out in June as promised.

updates.update_userinfo: Surveys are out! Plus an exciting Add-on!
updates.update_content:
Dear Backers,
WE MADE IT!! Thank you!! 🤗😘
We can't thank you enough! This 5 weeks of journey with you, dear backers, has been amazing! With nearly 5500 backers and over $300,000 in funding, you have blown us away! We owe all the success to your support and trust. We can't wait to ship out the bags so you can start enjoying this functional and high quality product!
Next Steps

updates.update_userinfo: You are wonderful! Thanks for making Escpade a reality! 🙌
updates.update_content:
You guys are incredible! Because of your love and support, we have reached 4350+ backers!
We highly value your faith in us and are working hard to make sure Escpades get delivered before promised June 2020. 
Share us on Facebook!

updates.update_userinfo: 4350+ backers! Thank you for the enormous support!
updates.update_content:
Thank you! Thank you! Thank you!
Funded in 8 hours and now we have crossed $50,000 being 1250% funded! We are so humbled and excited by such a tremendous response and the love shown by you guys. This wouldn't have been possible at all without your support. 
We are closely listening to any feedback you give us and strive to jointly create a truly great toiletry bag! Again a big thank you from the whole Escpade team!

campaign.story: As one of the first crowdfunding marketing agencies, Enventys Partners has brought more than 750 crowdfunding projects to life through lead generation, campaign page creation, public relations, email marketing, Facebook Advertising, campaign management and more.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
If the Dash BANDO 2.0 gets funded, we will make sure everything goes according to plan to meet the promised deadlines. Projects often have trouble completing production and meeting the expected deadlines for shipment. The project could face possible challenges if the quality of the product or packaging does not meet our requirements. However, we will personally be in charge of assembling and shipping all of the pledge rewards as soon as we reach our goal. Our last project was fortunate enough to deliver earlier than expected.
If the volume overwhelms us, we will get assistance from a professional post-production company. Our team is experienced and has been preparing for months to ensure that post-funding will be like clockwork when the time comes.
Although we do not see any direct risks and challenges, there are always indirect or unseen tasks that may present itself during the process of productions. We hope to run everything as streamlined as possible and also ahead of schedule.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Livestream recording demo on Youtube @ 8 AM EST January 24th 2020. 
 Sound is all around us, all the time. Sometimes we ignore it, sometimes we cherish it. 
But why is sound so important?
We spend everyday hearing and listening, it is part of our lives.  Sound is influential, it can be informative, educational, conclusive, emotive, and many other things for us.
The problem is people remember only 30% of what they hear. Smartphones can do the ‘work’, they are certainly not built to be digital voice recorders. 
So why not try the better solution?
Born from a team of researchers and engineers who spend many hours in front of a computer, TileRec is our constant reminder to take a walk and "stop and smell the roses", so to speak.
We designed TileRec to exceed even our own extremely high personal standards.  

 Thin: Only 1/4 inch thin. Fits easily in the slimmest wallets.
 Small: As small as a piece of a chocolate bar ( 2.48 square inch).
 Light:  The same weight as a US penny (0.5 oz).
 Simple: Simple everything! Easy to use, easy to recharge and easy to playback.
 Long-lasting Battery: 24 hours on one charge. Designed to be used the entire day.
 Surround Recording: 360 degrees recording in a 15 feet range. Meeting, lecture or simple discussion - all sounds are easily captured with HQ clarity.
 Resistant: 100% recycled aluminum casing. Sleek design that blends discreetly in the everyday setup.
When we say "World's Smallest", we mean it. Measuring in at a staggering 1.6 inch in length, and 1/4 inch in height, weighing only 0.5 oz nothing else on the market comes close with the discreet portability offered by TileRec.  
TileRec is so slim and small than it can fit almost anywhere you can think of. It blends discreetly with everyday objects - in your pocket or wallet, between the pages of an agenda, on your desk or even on your child's backpack.
Traditional voice recorders were bulky and uncomfortable, limiting day-to-day activities.   
The idea of a voice recorder so slim and thin that it can be used as a  personal assistant is to improve the daily productivity of its user. And is practically indestructible.
You can drop it, step on it, even run the car over and then resume recording. 
The aluminum casing ensures complete protection for worry-free use.
When you combine these benefits with excellent audio quality, you get a voice recorder that is perfect for lectures, interviews, meetings, and dictations too! 
Most smartphones have a built-in voice recorder app that you can use anytime, so they can do the ‘work’, but certainly are not built to be digital voice recorders. 
Small, discreet and efficient, Tilerec is the latest voice recorder designed by ATTO DIGITAL, created to encompass the ideal balance between form and function. 
So, what makes TileRec so superior to smartphones when it comes to recording?  
TileRec is perfect for anyone that wants to work simpler, faster and better – without compromising quality. 
TileRec is recording Hi-Q MP3, using a 128 kbps bit rate. You can choose to set it to record in continuous mode or in voice-activated mode to capture sounds in a 15 feet range (360 degrees).
In voice-activated mode, the ultra-performant sensor of the microphone will initiate ad start recording only when sounds are detected in the range of the recorder (15 feet) thus avoiding recording long silent periods and saving memory time.
The built-in Li-Po 3.7 V battery (240 mAh) needs only 1.5 hours to fully charge (DC IN 5 V 500mA), even when connected to a computer and will be up and running for more than 24 hours.
Record the entire day then just plug & play all your recordings. 
*no additional software needed
 TileRec can also record while charging so you will not miss any information that matters to you.
Let’s get nostalgic for a hot second. Reflect on a childhood memory, recalling an exact time or event — what you were wearing, who you were with, the sights, smells, tastes. Try to remember how you felt, specific noises like, I don’t know, shrilling crickets layered under siblings’ laughter or, the sound of your mother's voice.
It’s difficult, right? Unless the event was recorded, the memory is likely pretty hazy.  
TileRec is designed to record your daily meetings, activities, and ideas in a non-intrusive way and carries our belief that “wear-ability” is the utmost goal in the design of everyday carry technology. 
You live in a fast-paced world where TIME is MONEY and you are searching for the best tool to improve productivity and save time?  
 Here are  some situations  TileRec can help you with:  
The perfect solution for professional use
Lawyers may use them to take voice notes while preparing cases, while criminal investigators record digital notes in the field, and doctors use it to record important info about cases. If you make a living in one of these fields, you may find a portable voice recorder invaluable.  
Using a voice recorder has never been easier. 
So why not take the leap into the digital era? Stop wasting time and paper trying to keep track of all the information. 
Just slide one button to record and enjoy the Tilerec experience.
Use the USB cord to connect your TileRec to any computer and select the audio file you need to playback.  It's just that simple: 
PLAY

Check on Soundcloud the audio sample recorder with TileRec.
The Li-Po built-in battery of TileRec is re-chargeable for more than 1000 charging cycles. It takes only 1.5 hours to fully charge the battery, then it can record continuously or in voice-activated mode, for more than 24 hours. 
Have you ever wondered how much paper we use yearly? 
Americans use 85,000,000 tons of paper a year; about 680 pounds per person. The average household throws away 13,000 separate pieces of paper each year. 
Using TileRec for your daily notes and meetings saves time, effort and also 1 tree/ person/ year from becoming paper. 
All this while increasing productivity, saving time and keeping all your information organized with time and date stamp!

 Find a reward that works for you and your family, office or team, there's something for everyone.  We are particularly excited to offer fast shipping in the US and EU.
 This is ATTO DIGITAL's  2nd product launched via crowdfunding.  We always deliver. We've learned a ton over our first Kickstarter, helping develop a good sense of our capabilities and timeline.
The satisfaction of our users is paramount!
That is why we want to make sure that when you enter the ATTO  family you feel the care and support.
Our Customer Service team is  24/7 available to offer support in more than 5 languages. And because we really do believe in the manufacturing quality of our recorders, we offer lifetime warranty for TileRec.
We, the ATTO DIGITAL team, have more than 10 years of combined experience in designing, producing and selling sound recorders and surveillance equipment.
Download Press Kit 
Our mission and passion are to listen, so it is also paramount for us to listen to our customers' feedback to better understand how the ideal mini voice recorder should be. 
 Our team is ready - so is the manufacturing - now we just need you! 
It has been a long adventure. From brainstorming to product design, engineering, and branding, it has been a trying, monumental amount of time, conviction and expertise.
It has been a stressful, exciting and thrilling experience to design a product from scratch. We want you to be part of our experience! 
This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 1000+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $430M raised between them.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We have been working non-stop the for last 3 years developing this product and we feel that the amount we are trying to raise is realistic with what is needed for fulfilling the project. We know that the Kickstarter journey is a long one and that there might be several surprises along the way - including foul weather, or maybe even (shock!) our phones running out of battery.

Unfortunately, there are always risks involved in getting a product from the prototype phase to the market, but we have done everything possible to minimize these risks for our backers. Extensive planning has gone into the costs needed for raw materials, labor and shipping and we feel confident we will be able to meet our outlined delivery goals.

Our biggest challenge is the timely delivery of all of our components. In order to keep TileRec at such a small size, parts must be assembled simultaneously, meaning if one shipment gets delayed, our entire process may get slowed down. Hopefully, everything goes according to plan, but if not, we have multiple suppliers for each component, always ready with a plan B!

The second biggest concern is quality control. While we are using the best manufacturer in China who was the previous supplier for one of the top international consumer electronic brands, we need to inspect each TileRec to guarantee 100% satisfaction. This dedication to detail is time-consuming, yet necessary to ensure a quality product.

We promise to keep all of our backers informed if anything happens or our timeline changes! If we encounter anything that might affect the product, its development, and/or shipping date, we will make sure to notify you about it with frequent updates. This project is our #1 priority and we will do everything we can to bring the TileRec to its full potential.

_
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

The TileRec has a rechargeable battery that lasts more than 1000 charging cycles. Also, the aluminum casing is ensuring long-lasting durability, protecting the technology of the recording even in case of falls, drops or other accidents.
Reusability and recyclability
We use aluminum recycled from soda cans for the TileRec casing.
Also, by using TileRec for 1 year you will be able to save 1 tree from being cut down to be turned into paper.

updates.update_content:
Hi everyone,
The end of May is now close and many of you didn’t submit the CrowdOx Survey yet.
The deadline to submit the survey is May 31st. It is really important to submit the completed survey as quickly as possible in order for us to resume fulfillment for all of you.
We would like to give special thanks to all of you for being so awesome, patient, and understanding with the current situation. Although we work 24/7 to keep in contact with the postal services worldwide and make sure all parcels are getting delivered in a timely timeframe, we cannot expedite the process.

Hi awesome backers,

 We hope you’re all staying safe during these strange times.

 After China Post stopped shipping internationally we had to find alternative providers and this took us a bit longer than expected. It has been a difficult time for postal services, with many flights being canceled, impacting airmail across the globe.

Hi awesome backers,
Even if many of you have already received their rewards and filled our hearts with awesome feedback, some are still waiting to receive their TileRecs. We do understand this but at the same time, we do have to ask for your patience. 
Business is not as usual for many domains, transportation included. Despite our continued efforts, there are fewer international flights, while efforts are directed more to ship essential supplies. Also, some countries, like the United Arab Emirates, Philippines, Norway, Rusia, India, Switzerland, Chile etc., have paused their postal service for individual packages, so even if we did ship the packages, there are pending transportation.

updates.update_userinfo: Project Update: Shipping and new Software
updates.update_content:
Hi all,
We know that all of you who helped make this project are excited about getting your rewards as we receive a lot of messages and inquiries from you regarding shipping dates and tracking numbers. 
As you know, we started shipping late March and some of you already have their rewards delivered.

Hi AWESOME backers,
Many of you are asking about shipping TileRec, especially since - considering the global pandemic - many restrictions were applied by several countries.
We do hope all of you understand that the global situation is affecting us all in many ways and that, given the current situation and restrictions (that change sometimes from one day to another) we do our best to adapt and make sure we keep our promise to you.

Hi AWESOME backers,
Many of you are asking about shipping TileRec, especially since - considering the global pandemic - many restrictions were applied by several countries.
We are happy to let you know that we managed to meet our promise and already started shipping. First backers that will be able to get the Kickstarter TileRec are from Japan, Singapore, Taiwan, Hong Kong and China. We are in the process of updating the tracking numbers for each of them. Their rewards were shipped starting Monday, this week.

Hi AWESOME backers,
We managed to get the first round of TileRec(s) to selected beta testers to experience and play with and everything is progressing well. 
The main thing that we are focusing on at this point is consistency. There are a lot of steps in the process of making the TileRec, so together with the factory, we continue to update production to ensure that they can continue to reliably manufacture the devices without high scrap rates.

Just a Friendly Reminder!!
Hey guys! I just want to reach out and remind all y'all that the next two weeks represent the last chance to make any changes to your surveys, add-ons, and credit card information (CC info is only required if you added items beyond what you pledged for or if your original Kickstarter pledge didn't go through)!!

While some great ideas are being suggested in these comments, I would urge caution, as there is a danger of 'feature creep'. Adding in new functionality at this stage of a project is likely to significantly impact on costs and delivery dates. Personally, I would still support the change to USB-C if this can be done, but I think unless security such as password protection or encryption is rock solid reliable, it is best not to introduce it. I'd rather have an unprotected device I can use, than a protected one I can no longer access because something doesn't work.
Would it be possible to add a little cover for the port to keep dust and stuff out? I have wireless headphones that have that and it's made a difference for longevity.
Seconding Joseph P here! And/or a more general clip so it can be attached to a bag, breast pocket, etc.

Regarding password protection, since you already have a microphone in the TileRec, you could let the user record the password onto it and then speak it to unlock. This may be problematic if the user has a cold, etc. A better option might be to use an accelerometer and the user would have to input a certain sequence of taps or twists/turns to unlock.
I'm a product manager myself, feature creep is my biggest worry
What about transcription from voice to text?

I don't understand companies not using a Type C connection. Micro USB is terrible and eventually after several times inserting the cable the wrong way, the charging port gets messed up and you throw the device in the garbage. Forget adapters. Wow, sounds like you're either being quite forceful with the cables or you've got low quality items to begin with. Sadly I do know quite a few people in my life who are quite rough with their electronics. oh well ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ . USB-C for futureproofing is fair enough though

The adaptor cable is a nice gesture, although a USB-C port in the device would help to future-proof it. I note that you are already geared up for manufacturing. Does this make it impossible to consider changing the current port in the device for a USB-C one? From an environmental point of view, having a replacable rechargable battery would be a major plus. Password protection or encryption seems to be a concern for a significant number of backers, and it would be good to have your thoughts on this.

Good to hear you are working on a poll. Thanks for the extra information on the battery, but what happens when it eventually wears out? Everyone should now be factoring in end of life repair or recycling for electronic devices.

Exactly. Some type of password protection is necessary. I can't believe it is not a must-have feature on their list. It is so unsafe to carry this around and accidentally drop it somewhere.

I'm more worried about accidentally leaving it behind. And then someone sees it and plugs it in. I understand hardware encryption will add size. But can you please do more research to see if you can somehow integrate file based password protection without sacrificing size? Please research it, there must be a way.

For encryption, you don't need to make hardware modifications, or increase size. You can use a software encryption. When you connect it to USB and open a file, it should ask for password or something. First time, the user can setup a software password when connected to USB.
