updates.update_content:
All rewards have now been sent, and you should all receive yours very soon ! 
We would like to thank each and everyone of you for your kind support . We will now work hard to try and come up yet again with an innovtive  idea !
THANK YOU !!!

Thank you all so much for your patience, sendings have started, and tracking numbers will be uploaded on Backer Kit as the process goes,  starting later today. You have never been closer to receiving your rewards !
Wishing you all a fantastic 2020 with many words to write....

Production is running smoothly and we are pleased to confirm that sendings will begin at the very end of this month until mid-January - We will give you an update when all rewards have been sent out and last but not least we wish you all a blissful end of the year and wonderful holidays to everyone !!

You have 24 hours left to fill in your survey ( for those who have not yet) , all those who still have not by that deadine will be imposed their(s) pen finishing and tip size(s) at time of reward sending.
We are indeed almost there, surveys were sent, most of them filled, but for those who haven't filled theirs yet, there are only 3 days left !! So please hurry, not to be left out ;-) !

Hello everyone and thank you again for your support! Thanks to you, we have passed the 300% funded goal!
Don't hesitate to share the campaign, there are only a few days left before the end :)

We also wanted to share one (and only one) crush we had for a campaign: GPCA Carabiner - Most Funded Carabiner Ever
For every reward package , you will be able to add, at survey time, any extra that you may need ! (tips, inks, pouches..)
2 Ink bottles and 2 boxes of cartridges are also provided in this package, you can pledge safely and be assured that they will indeed be included in your reward !
Thank you all so much, could not have been done without you !!!

campaign.story:
Our EDC BamPen is an irreplaceable thing for each person and one of the most practical and interesting things. Our handle is perfect for any pocket, and its stability on the surface will amaze you! You no longer have to worry and fuss. 
The shape of bamboo perfectly combines with ergonomics. The elegant arc fits fingers and is easy to control. Each arc of the body and corner angle is calculated accurately and tested for measurement bringing your writing to life! 
EDC BamPen uses a bamboo bud design and refillable long life German ball-pens that can fully meet your daily use . The pen looks and feels so good in your hand. The Bamboo Pen and Graver Knife combination is a working piece of art.  Everyone you know will want to borrow it! 
Unlike the pens on the market, EDC BamPen's caps are designed with a magnetic cap to prevent the cap loss. You can magnetize the other end of the pen in instant. 
Magnetic forces pull the cap onto the pen
We designed the EDC BamPen to have a perfect balance in your hand. So your writing will always be in maximum comfort. 
From creative minds comes a creative pen - natural and unique. Write your legend. 
The G2 Refill is a very large refill that can be written to 10,000 meters long and 25 times that of a regular refill. We used a G2 refill because we love the way it writes. With the G2 Refill bringing you an experience of quite smooth writing. Who doesn’t like variety, right?
The refills by German company ensure that the EDC BamPen provides a smooth ink flow and the best writing experience for you.
We added anti-slip beads to the broken window cap,  No matter what kind of table you put the EDC BamPen on, it won’t slip. 
Anti-roll design of Bampen surfaces
We wanted to design a pen different from others. Not just for the exquisite workmanship and appearance, but also does more than just a precise writing tool. We combined Paper Carving and a well-writing pen together that allows you to excite inspiration and release stress in your everyday life.
Hand carved
DIY and hand-carving to increase the fun and inspiration of life
The blade of the engraving knife can be taken down at any time, and the new blade can be replaced when the blade is broken. We will give you 10 blades for free. 
The other end of the pen is a window breaker. You only need to open the cap to use it as a window breaker. Whether in the car or in any dangerous situation, you can protect yourself as a tool. 
EDC BamPen is precision machined from brass. These remarkable materials have the highest durability.
The finishes consist of hand blasted, hand polished and PVD. Of those three surface techniques we offer you four different colors: Silver, Rose Gold, and Black. A different choice for  whatever moods you happen to be in. You can give a friend, girlfriend or family. Or just make an original gift to yourself.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Trusting us you are helping our project to life and see the light in order to extend it. We use only high quality and genuine materials in our products, so you should not worry! 

We understand and acknowledge that no project comes without risks and challenges. Despite our planning, there are circumstances that may be out of our control. If we are met with these events, we promise to communicate with full transparency to you, our backers, and work to resolve all issues in a timely manner.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Alpha™ Pillow is a carbon infused memory foam pillow, with air cell breathability, ultra soft bamboo, pure silver fibers, and ice silk technology for instant coolness.
The Cooling Ice Silk technology helps wick away moisture and body heat to help you feel cooler so that you can fall asleep faster. Providing instant coolness and ultimate comfort.  
Silver has been used by NASA, US Special Forces, and Olympic athletes to create germ free textiles. Bamboo charcoal’s activated carbon absorb toxins, prevents mould growth and purifies air by absorbing harmful gasses.
Air Cells increase comfort and breathability that is linked to sweating and snoring during sleeping. The combination of the textiles wick moisture away twice as fast as cotton, reducing the humidity in your bed by up to 50%. 
The problem with traditional pillows is that they require porous materials to create a soft comfortable feel. In as little as 7 days, millions of colony forming units of bacteria can grow inside this permeable space where mold and other pathogens can thrive. This leads to allergies, skin irritation and many illnesses. 
Alpha's bamboo charcoal infused memory foam allows the pillow to mould into the shape of your head and neck, supporting the sensitive pressure areas to help you relax and help with insomnia. 
Impinged nerves can trigger migraines, ensuring that your spine is alined correctly in its natural position it will minimize nerve irritation. It will also help to relieve muscle tension around the neck area. 
Alpha allows your spine to be alined and it elevates your upper body, unblocking the airways and opening nasal passages so you can breathe easier. Alpha's Dimensions: 60 x 40 x 12 cm.
Silver binds to essential cell components like DNA to neutralize their harmful effect. The process of minimizing the bacteria helps with eliminating odor, prevents allergies such as skin irritations, pimples, asthma, runny nose, sneezing and more. It has taken years of development for silver fabrics to arrive at this level of quality.  
The benefits of silver used by NASA, U.S. Special Forces as well as Athletes, providing effective antimicrobial properties, which means it naturally destroys odor-causing pathogens.
To add any of our Alpha™ Collection products,  please click on your “Manage your pledge” button (on top side when you open the project page), than click “Change your pledge” and simply add to the total cost. For multiple quantities please multiply the product's cost. 
You will be able to select your preferred size or weight in the survey after the campaign ends. 
*Additional International Shipping will apply during the survey for all add-ons. 
Ivana T. Lowchareonkul is a Product Designer. She has a passion for simple interfaces. She is the ultimate problem solver and loves to create innovative products.
Science is something that she greatly enjoys. "It challenges ideas that we think are ‘right’! There is always something new and interesting to discover and the journey to get there can be really, really exciting.” said Ivana.
Ivana has played critical leadership roles in 14 successfully funded and fulfilled Kickstarter projects that have raised over $3,000,000 to over 17,000 backers. Her keen eye for innovation has given her multiple opportunities to create successful products. Her experience in manufacturing has been perfected and she is very excited to bring Alpha Sheets to volume production. 
Our past projects: 

Get Your Project Funded Today!
Get Cash Back on the Projects You Love!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Our biggest challenge is to ensure that the quality meets our expectations. We will work very closely with our manufacturing partners to make sure Alpha™ Pillow is made and delivered with highest premium quality.

We are all ready to start manufacturing and together we can help to improve the lives of millions. The future of sleep is here today.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

Fun Fact: Tariffs are not paid by the country it is against but the company bringing in the goods and that goes to the consumers. Trump in the US wants to increase tariffs on goods from China. It isn't the Chinese paying that, but the company importing the goods from China. That company then passes on the cost to the consumer. The way a tariff is supposed to work is by raising the cost of the imported good higher, the consumer is more likely to buy the local version that is cheaper to buy. But that isn't the case anymore when those products aren't made in your local country anymore.

campaign.story:
NativeRepublica is a little Australian company that celebrates heirloom Australian native wildflowers and spices. Australia’s long isolation and vast area has created an ideal setting for nature to express its incredible diversity. More than 90 percent of the 30,000 different plant species found in Australia are found only in Australia! Our aim at NativeRepublica is to bring some of those truly unique flowers and plants to the rest of the world. To share something that will grow and blossom. 
OUR STORY
....................................
Just over a year ago my husband and I travelled around Australia camping for 5 months. We set off from my hometown of Newcastle, Australia on what was to be the most amazing adventure. What really struck me about that trip, besides the vast size of the country, was the range of amazingly beautiful, vibrate and burley wildflowers. Colours and forms truly unique to Australia. Mid last year my husband and I moved to his hometown in Switzerland and I began to deeply miss the unique smells and sights of Australia. That was when I decided to bring a little bit of Australia with me. I started NativeRepublica to showcase and celebrate the joyful heirloom wildflowers of Australia and bring their beauty to the rest of the world. We have since been working on sourcing the best native Australian wildflower seeds to share with the world.
VIDEO
....................................
OUR RANGE
....................................
We’ve selected six of the most unique Australian wildflowers:
THE PRODUCT
....................................
Our eco-friendly packets of native wildflower seeds are sold individually or as a gift pack of three. Each vibrant packet of seeds contains sowing and care instructions, native seeds and a sowing label.
THE GIFT PACK
....................................
Our gift pack of three individual seed packets. 
As part of this Kickstarter campaign we are offering a special on our gift pack of Bottlebrush seeds, Kangaroo Paw seeds and Blue Rottnest Island Daisy seeds (special only available through KickStarter).
Now that we have reached our streach goal we can introduce two new gift pack options!!!!
THE FLOWERS
....................................
1. Sturt’s Desert Pea
The Strut’s Desert Pea is the most iconic and unique Australian wildflower. Not only that, it’s also the emblem of South Australia. I spent a good part of our trip intensely looking for this amazing flower in the wild. Originating from the deserts of South Australia and the Northern Territory the Sturt’s Desert Pea eluded me. I can only imagine what Charles Sturt would have though seeing its distinctive elongated red flowers and piercing black eye on his 1814 journey into the depths of Australia in search of an inland sea. Nothing else in the world compares to the Sturt’s Desert Pea. The red beauty looks like a tough customer but is actually very endearing. They love to be in frost-free positions with excellent drainage, either in a container or sandy garden bed.
2. Bottle Brush
The vibrant red flowers of Bottle Brush played such an important part of my childhood. The memory of being fascinated by their soft bizarre brush head is so vivid in my mind. This magnificent flower is an iconic plant, well-recognised in Australia and increasingly in gardens throughout the world. It easy to grow, hardy and very adaptable. The vibrant red colour is a magnet for wildlife and birds, they just love it! This versatile plant in also known by indigenous Australians as a beautiful tea, what a superstar!
3. Blue Rottnest Island Daisy
As if Australia was not isolated enough! This little beauty originates from the even more remote Rottnest Island, located off the coast of Western Australia. It’s long slender strokes are topped a striking pincushion like array of petite bluey purple blooms. Insects love the pretty blue flowers including snails so be sure to protect them when they are juvenile. Blue Rottnest Island Daisies are super easy to grow so no garden has any excuse to be without them.
4. Wattle
In Australia you know summer has arrived when you see those big blooms of glowing golden Wattle flowers. I can’t remember a summer where I didn’t stop and admire Wattle’s vibrant presents. This plant has the amazing power of being able to immediately infuse happiness ☺ Glorious Wattle is our national flower in Australia. We even have ‘Wattle Day’ on September 1 every year! That’s how much we love this plant. Wattle belongs to the same family as the more common Mimosa and Thorntree variety of Acacia. Staggeringly 950 of the 1300 Acacia species abound worldwide are native to Australia. This plant is not just a pretty face, although undoubtedly highly ornamental, wattle seeds plays an important part in ingenious Australians medicine. Easy to grow, this plant is a must in any garden.
5. Geraldton Wax
Geraldton wax is having a comeback moment. Its long been appreciated as a hardy plant with profusely long lasting pretty pink waxy flowers. It is an iconic Australian plant and one of the world’s best cut flowers. The aroma when crushing the foliage between your fingers is to die for. This flower is super robust, fast growing and most importantly copes well with irregular watering so its perfect for the lazy gardener ;) Use the cut flowers in the home as they will last up to a week.
6. Kangaroo Paw
Kangaroo Paw plant is stunning full stop. With its long elegantly flattened leaves and beautiful brilliant green flowers bloom that fans out like a cluster this flower is truly truly unique. Each Kangaroo Paw flower has a bright red ovary which, with the unusual paw-shaped flowers, gives the flower its very fitting name. Its paws are soft and velvety with fine brightly coloured hairs covering the entire surface. This fury little guy sturdy stem is a natural perch for birds. The blooms are long lasting and make amazing cut flowers.
OUR PEOPLE
....................................
Green thumbs who want a truly unique garden full of heirloom native flowers
Travellers who want to bring a little unique magic home with them
Givers of unique eco-friendly gifts. 
People who want something uniquely beautiful that will grow and blossom for years to come 
The Goals
.......................
Raise $1,000 AUD to buy supplies and packaging
The stretch goals: $2,000 AUD introduce new wildflower varieties to the range $3,000 AUD introduce fruits, herbs and spice plants to the range.
WILL THEY GROW?
....................................
Australian wildflowers have evolved to fill every available habitat on the huge continent from hot dry to frosty mountaintops. Our range of wildflowers grow naturally in USDA hardiness zones 5-12. Outside of these zones they can be grown in a green house.
Best of all most of our flowers are perennial! with the exception of Blue Rottnest Island Daisy it is erect annual or biannual. Re-propagation shouldn't be an issue. For more info on the botanical aspects please check out the following link:
https://www.anbg.gov.au/index.html https://florabase.dpaw.wa.gov.au/
THE SEEDS
....................................
CAN YOU BRING SEEDS INTO THE COUNTRY?
....................................
Great question! Each country has its own rules about bringing in plant and plant products (i.e. seeds). It’s always best to check with your country’s customs and quarantine laws before making a pledge. Most countries allow non-commercial quantities to enter without any paperwork however some require a Phytosanitary Certificate. 
UNITED STATES
If you live in the United States, "up to 50 seeds per species" can be imported under the Small Seed Lots Permit without a Phytosanitary Certificate. https://www.aphis.usda.gov/plant_health/permits...
EUROPE
Similarly in Europe "Small quantities of plants, plant products, foodstuffs or animal feed that their owner or recipient will use for non-industrial, non-commercial purposes or consume during transport" do not need a certificatehttps://ec.europa.eu/food/plant/plant_health_biosecurity/non_eu_trade_en
CANADA
"Small lots" of seed, i.e., quantities of less than 5 kg of large seeded kinds such as peas, beans and corn or quantities of less than 500 g of small seeded kinds such as carrot or alfalfa, are exempted from providing an import declaration or a seed analysis certificate and do not require an ICA. Most seed imported by Canadian gardeners would fall under the "small lot" category. http://www.inspection.gc.ca/plants/seeds/imports/small-packet-seed/eng/1470410938949/1470410961778
NEW ZEALAND
We don't recommend purchasing our seeds for delivery to New Zealand due to our strict quarantine requirements.
ARE THEY INVASIVE?
..........................
Each native environment is unique and diverse. Sometimes introducing a new species into the harmonious balance can result in disastrous results. Our mission is to enhance not destroy the local environment. Whilst each country has its own list, NON of our flowers are classified as invasive species in the US, Canada and Europe. 
UNITED STATES: https://www.invasivespeciesinfo.gov/plants/main.shtml 
CANADA: http://www.rbg.ca/archive/cbcn/en/projects/invasives/i_list.html
EUROPE: https://www.eppo.int/INVASIVE_PLANTS/ias_lists.htm#IAPList
Botanical names of our flowers:
Geraldton Wax CHAMELAUCIUM uncinatum
Bottle BrushCALLISTEMON glaucus 
Blue Rottenest Island Daisy TRACHYMENE coerulea
Sturt's Desert Pea SWAINSONA formosa
Wattle ACACIA drummondii
Kangaroo Paw ANIGOZANTHOS flavidus 
NOTE: We don't recommend purchasing our seeds for delivery to New Zealand due to their strict quarantine requirements.
STRECH GOALS
...................
I'm happy to say we have reached both our stretch goals which means we can introduce three new seeds to our original range of six!
First up is Billy Button!!!
Available as a Combo 'Stretch goal -add on' reward and as part of the 'Multi gift pack' rewards
As part of the second stretch goal we are thrilled to introduce a new reward...Bush Fruits and Spice Seeds! Quandong and Old Man Salt Bush :)
Curious as to how these taste? We've got a tasting rewards lined up as well. Receive these beautifully packaged native bush spices for tasting.
First up is ground Quandong fruit: Funny name, delicious flavour! These sweet, glossy fruits, also known as ‘wild peaches’, are packed with vitamin C, protein, complex oils, iron and zinc. While you can eat them straight off the tree, our dried ground quandongs are great to add to cakes, juices and fruit salads or with fish and Asian food.
And Old Man Salt Bush Milled leaf: Old man saltbush is salty! Many different varieties exist across arid regions of Australia. Traditionally used by indigenous Australians in dampers, this spices is great as a general spice and amazing with roasted potatoes. Contains 15g. Store in a dry cool place for up to 6 months

updates.update_content: We've are already over the half way mark in the second phase of our campaign. We are all or nothing so spread the word. http://kck.st/2OslYwN

As promised we are ready to launch our new range of Australian native bush herb and spice products. Over the last year we've been busy sourcing the very best growers from across Australia, from the desert to the rainforest and created a modern range of easy to use bush spice infused oils and infused sugars as well as the pure spices themselves. 
http://kck.st/2QnAFyM

We've had a few requests from backers who would like to upgrade their rewards. 
Now that the campaign is over it is no longer possible to adjust your pledge via Kickstarter. However if you'd like to upgrade your reward there is still time! 
Please send us an email at nativerepublica@gmail.com or drop us a comment/message on our Kickstarter page. We will then send you a Paypal link for the difference and that's it!

We are into the home stretch with only 5 days to go. We've been thrilled with the result so far all thanks to you guys!! Things are moving on our end too. We've ordered most of our supplies and are working hard to get these amazing seeds to you asap.

whoops...I was just made aware that you can't pledge two or more rewards. So in light of this I've added two more combo rewards for those who wanted to get "The Lot" + "The Add on" or 'The Exclusive" + "The add-on".  Look for "Combo" rewards. Sorry about that!
Don't forget you get free shipping of the 'Stretch goal - add on' reward with any 'The Lot' or 'The Exclusive' deal pledge combo.

We are now officially over the half way point in our campaign....13 days to go!!! Thank you so much for making the campaign so successful.
Can't wait to get these seeds your way. The wheels are in motion and we've started ordering and packing.

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
There are always potential risks and challenges when bringing a new product to life. That being said, this isn’t our first ‘dog and pony’ show when it comes to doing a Kickstarter Campaign or bringing a product to market for the first time. Also, consider that we have been selling and launching watches since December of 2015, so we feel like we are WELL prepared for any challenges that come our way. 
 
We have well-nurtured, personal relationships with our suppliers and manufacturers. We meet with them regularly in-person to build those relationships and iron out business details effectively. And we are super confident they will go above and beyond to get your Woodgrain Watch manufactured and to our fulfillment center safely and as timely as possible without risking an ounce of quality. 
 
Given the timeframe of this campaign, we understand that you may be buying a Woodgrain Watch as a gift for a loved one. We take that to heart and want to tell you we will do everything in our power to get our watch to you in time for the holidays. That being said, if our order count exceeds the high thousands, we may have a hard time getting the watch to you before the holidays. Also, special cases will be delivered after the holidays. 
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Pre-Order Still Open!
         AFTER THE CAMPAIGN VISIT US  @  http://www.KoreEssentials.com
Ultimate Belts are 800% more adjustable than most traditional belts with holes, and 140% more adjustable than other ratchet style belts (we use a longer track). This 10” track is sewn into the back of the belt to create over 40+ size positions to adjust with. This means you can adjust your Ultimate belt in ¼” increments and achieve the perfect fit. So whether you just ate a big meal, or just started that new diet - your Ultimate belt is going to provide the perfect fit, every time. It's like a giant zip tie for your waist - only more fun to use. As a matter of fact, once you wear an Ultimate belt – you’ll never want to go back to a traditional belt. To release or adjust the belt, just pinch the small tab under the buckle.   
        After the campaign visit us @ http://www.KoreEssentials.com
Ultimate Belts (1.5" wide) are constructed using 3 key elements. First, the exterior is a handsome nylon webbing test rated to over 500 lbs. Inside is a poly-urethane core center for added strength and stability to support gear, and yet flexible enough for comfort. On the inside is Super Fiber, a hybrid material that's both extremely durable and water resistant. These 3 elements combined make this the toughest belt you'll ever own and the last belt you'll ever need. 
Ultimate buckles and nylon belts are interchangeable with ALL our other EDC (1.5" wide) belts and buckles featured on our website.  

                 See >>  http://www.KoreEssentials.com    
                   After the campaign visit us @ http://www.KoreEssentials.com
Get Cash Back on the Projects You Love!
  At Kore Essentials creating innovative, quality products for men is what we do. Actually - it's ALL we do - it's our occupation. So we take it seriously and in doing so, strive to improve whenever possible. These unique, reinforced poly-core belts (1.5” wide) are constructed using top-grade nylon webbing. The back of the belt is a Super-Fiber that's tough and water resistant. The buckles (2.25” x 1.5”) are a high-quality zinc alloy with a hardened gunmetal color finish. As always our products include a 30 day full money back guarantee and 1 year replacement warranty.  
X3 Buckle & Black Reinforced Nylon Belt
           After the campaign visit us @ http://www.KoreEssentials.com
Ultimate belt comes in “One-Size” that fits any waist from 24” up to 54”. When you receive your new belt, turn it over and locate your Pant Size using the printed ruler marks. Then add 4 inches and cut using sharp scissors. So for example, if your pant size is 36" - cut your belt at the 40" mark. Then snap the cut end into the buckle receptacle (teeth) and put it on.  If it's still too big - you can trim off more, an inch at a time. It's liberating to be able to adjust your belt up to 5 inches in either direction – in or out - in tiny ¼” increments.  
                     "This is the best fitting belt you’ll ever own."  
   < Backer Comments From Our Previous Kickstarter Projects >
“I love my Trakline belt! I show it off to everyone. Great product, so glad I became a backer!” - Mike Goodridge

“Have to say the Trakline belt is the best Kickstarter item I have backed so far. The quality is great and is now my favourite belt!” - Thurstan Johnstan

“Got my two belts and buckles and they're amazing. The quality is top-notch.” - Casus Belli

“I love the belt and the quality in manufacturing and design is evident in everything.” - Scott Burns

“Seriously, I can't get over how much I love this belt. I totally forget I'm wearing it because it's so comfortable.” - Thomas Ella 
Despite our success, we’re still a small company and launching a new product requires a lot of resources and funds up front. This means we need your support to help pay for tooling and enough starting inventory to keep the costs down. In return, we’d love to give you one of these awesome new belts, or several if you like. Either way – we promise you’re going to love it.  
X2 Buckle & Tan Reinforced Nylon Belt
   Once the Kickstarter campaign is funded, we will send out surveys to all backers to gather reward choices (buckle styles, leather colors, etc.) and shipping address. Once we get the surveys back we’ll commence production. Based on the factories estimate, this process should take about 30-40 days to complete dependent on volume. We're going to make the belts at a responsible factory in China that we've done a lot of business with. One of our partners (Mauro) will personally be on hand to oversee and ensure that the best quality standards are met. Once the production is completed, we will ship the belts to our warehouse in San Diego, California (2 weeks) and then repackage individual orders to ship out to backers (1 week). So all in all, you should get your belt about 60-70 days after the campaign ends.  
          After the campaign visit us @ http://www.KoreEssentials.com
X3 Buckle & Tan Reinforced Nylon Belt
   A number of years ago my wife bought me an expensive belt for my birthday. Unfortunately, my waist was “in-between” the belt holes at the time. We’ve all been there. This time I boldly decided to poke a few holes of my own in the leather and “fix it” myself. Bad idea. I completely ruined the belt. I learned several key lessons that day. First – belt holes are bad. Second, never puncture a gift from your wife. It never turns out well. The good news - it set us out on a journey to create a better belt for men.  
Our original Kickstarter Trakline belt campaign from 2013
Flash forward - after 18 months of designing, prototyping and testing we launched our first evolution of Trakline belts right here on Kickstarter in 2013. We were fortunate enough to attract over 4,000 backers and were on our way. So here we are… back again to introduce our latest incarnation our new Ultimate belt.  
X1 Buckle & Tan Reinforced Nylon Belt
  Karl Kozak: Sales & Marketing
Mauro Bove: Manufacturing & Quality Control
Steve Olson: Product & Web Design 

The three of us have been friends and business partners for over 13 years now. Here's a little of our background and relevant history. For the past 15 years Mauro has been in product manufacturing and quality control. As a result, he's manufactured a wide variety of high-quality retail products for some of America’s biggest retailers. Steve on the other hand, is an all-around talented designer, who's been crucial in creating our product designs, drawings and the website. My background has been in business management and sales. Over the past several decades, I've successfully launched, grown, managed and sold several companies. Together, the three of us make a great, motivated team that’s focused on creating and marketing great products.  
Our Pledge Management Partner
  X1 Buckle & Black Reinforced Nylon Belt
 As of 2017 we have a total of 5 patents on our unique Trakline ratchet belts including one on a ratchet belt system with reinforced belt core to support gear. Why all the patents ? We’ve spent a lot of time and money perfecting our proprietary technology and we'd like to keep it that way. 
   
               Visit us online @  http://www.KoreEssentials.com 
Get Your Project Funded Today!
                                THANK YOU FOR YOUR TIME & SUPPORT 
           After the campaign visit us @ http://www.KoreEssentials.com
X1 Buckle & Black Reinforced Nylon Belt
   X1 Buckle & Tan Reinforced Nylon Belt
   X2 Buckle & Black Reinforced Nylon Belt
   X2 Buckle & Tan Reinforced Nylon Belt

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is our 7th Kickstarter campaign since we launched our original Trakline belt project back in 2013. Since that time we've managed to launch and successfully deliver 6 new products to over 15,000 backers. And I think we can say with some certainty, that we met, or exceeded, most backers expectations in regards to product quality, design and function. 

Of course, along the way we've learned a few valuable lessons. 

For example, we make a habit of communicating frequently and openly with our backers regarding the manufacturing progress and shipping status. We do an update every 1-2 weeks after the project is completed. 

Goal # 1 is to deliver a well designed, quality product that exceeds Backer expectations and that backers love. As proof with past campaigns - after receiving their Trakline belts over 40% of the backers visited our online store to purchase a 2nd, 3rd and 4th belt .

Nevertheless, we understand moving forward this is a new project, with its own set of challenges and that past successes don't eliminate all the future risks involved.

The biggest challenge as always for us when creating a new product, is timing. We strive to get our projects completed on time, with no snafus. There are molds and tooling to create and we test at each step of the process. But if delays do happen, we keep backers "in the loop" as to what's going on and the new timelines. 

Based on our track record - we feel like backers can be confident and assured - they're going to get a great product.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

The excess belt is too big to fit through most belt loops, so it sticks straight out to your left. Very disappointed, this was my first Kickstarter I backed, if this is the junk I will receive, I won’t back any more.

All in all, it's a sturdy belt and looks great. I'm hoping it breaks in a LOT more, but I'm not that optimistic. Having said that, it feels like a belt that will last me a VERY long time. Looking back, I wouldn't have paid $45 for this belt because, while it's very well made, it still carries its daily frustrations.
I am still thrilled with my belts from the initial Kickstarter and really like the buckles from this one, but the belt strap itself is not something I can recommend. Thanks!

I personally love the belt. Due too my line of work I have a multitool, flashlight and as a first responder aspect a CPR mask and radio on my belt. It holds my pants and gear without any problem. If I had to change anything it would be the end that took some getting use to that gets threaded though the buckle due to the end raising up a tad. From time to time I have problems and I can see it being the first part having problems with later in life due to wear. If it was flat I would have no problem with this belt. So besides that problem I love and will use this belt as my go too belt.

Can also be good for some heavy industry but definitely not for a personal use unless you wear it over body armor... Sorry to say but it is so far my biggest Kickstarter disappointment.

@Doug You summed up my feelings perfectly. Though I don't have the digging in issue, but the stiffness and poor fit through the buckle really disappointed me. Their leather belt is amazing. This one....not so much.

@Brenda I have to agree. The leather EDC belt is much better than these. That said, I've been wearing one for a few days and they do flex a bit more. But yes, this might be a swing and a miss by Kore. I love the leather belt, but I just like these.

When I opened up the box, I had NO idea that these were considered belts. I bought them for my grandson and they are so stiff that there's no way he's going to be able to wear them comfortably. It's a great design but the material is terrible for use as a belt. I guess that's why there are considered indestructible...they are so hard it would take decades to soften these puppies up. Nice try guys.

Very disappointed in the belt. It's so stiff that I have to remove it from my pants to hang them on a hook. It's so still it digs into me when I sit in the car for more than an hour. The tip is so blunt it's hard to get through the buckle. I feel like I'm wearing a piece of steel around my waist. I fear that this won't be in my line up for long...too bad as I was really hoping to have a more casual version of the leather belt that I absolutely love....
Got my belt this week. Absolutely love it. It just feels so solid in your hands. I can see this lasting me for years to come.
Hello! Will tracking numbers be sent to International Customers? I am only wondering since USPS Tracking only goes as far as the Airport and I haven't gotten a number yet.
Pre-Shipment Info Sent to USPS, USPS Awaiting Item
Got my belts in today! I really like them they definitely feel like they are built to last. I love the trakline feature and they fit perfect! Thanks Kore team it was well worth the wait!
Pre-Shipment Info Sent to USPS, USPS Awaiting Item

So I got my belt, I do enjoy it and works well for my purposes however for future you may want to consider tapering the end that goes through the loops for two reasons, one, so it isn't so hard to get through the loops, and two, so that it doesn't dig into your side when you are sitting down, just food for thought, thanks
Still no tracking number.so it means you are in the process of shipping out the belts, right?
I still haven't received a tracking number yet (eu/nl). Can I expect it soon?
Got the belt, wore it today. I also have the leather ones. This one is way too stiff, its unusable for me and hurts to wear it.
Wow. I’ve worn it for a day, and I already love it. The quality is superb, though probably a little stiffer than I thought. I’m glad I got two of them with one serving as a backup.
hey guys! love the belts. the quality is stellar! thanks!
I didn't get my tacking number
Jut got mine this afternoon - I really like the look of both the belt and buckles. I am also assuming that the stiffness of the belt will reduce over time.
Super disappointed these won't be here for my two guys for Christmas. It's just not the same telling them on Christmas "they will be here soon". Hopefully they are worth the wait.

I love the look. I love the mechanism. I love the buckle. I am not in love with how stiff the belt is. Based on your experience will the belt limber up with use? Anything to speed up the process? I did not expect supple soft leather but this is quite a bit stiffer than expected.

Just got my KORE belt and have used it the last two days. What an AMAZING product. Thank you, thank you, thank you. I am a Concealed Carry Holder and have carried daily for almost 5 years now, my usual belts last 4-6 months with the wear and tear and most are uncomfortable. My KORE belt has been completely different. Super comfortable, adjustable, and built to last. The sizing diagram on the back was super easy to figure out and my only regret is not purchasing a second one. You've got a customer for life, and I will be telling all my fellow CC about this awesome belt. Thanks again.
Wow!!! Far stiffer than I anticipated. Extremely hard to loop through my belt loops. Will it soften up? Break in over time? Since it looked canvas based, I anticipated a much more flexible material.

From your message, it clearly shows that you're shipping by geographical location and obviously USA first. Yes, your a US company, so shipping to US first is not a problem but just be honest and transparent.
What's your reward fulfillment priority ? By backer no. ? By geographical location ? or just random ? If by backer no., I'm no. 273 and should at least got a tracking no. instead of nothing.

I was also wondering when the request for the type of belt and address will come in.
Was wondering when will you request my address and what belt I want
Hope I can get 2 types of belts. The tactical offered will def come in handy for my open and concealed carry. Will love it!!

campaign.story:
Your go-to kitchen knife 
You arrive home with fresh ingredients, eager to prepare a great meal. You lay everything out on the counter and reach for a knife - your favorite knife. The one that’s dirty, but you stop to clean it anyway. The knife that makes you a more confident and creative cook. The right knife.
We’ve made that knife. By combining the very best of eastern and western knifemaking, we’ve created an incredibly sharp, beautiful, premium blade - and we’re bringing it to you for a non-premium price.
The right blade
Your chef knife is central to creating nearly every dish. Whether you’re mincing chives, or cutting apart a whole chicken, the chef knife can do it all.
However, your choices at the store are confusing. Cheap knives are clunky to use and dull quickly. Even if you're willing to spend more, unfamiliar features and a wide spectrum of prices can make the options overwhelming. Finding the right blade can be a frustrating experience, but we don’t think that needs to be the case.
 An incredible knife for a fair price 
The world of chef knives is out of date. The big knife brands are operating on outdated sales margins that inflate the price of knives sold at a retail store. By avoiding the traditional retail sales model and bringing our product to you directly online, we have created a great knife for a fraction of the price.
Don’t waste your money on a knife block filled with knives you’ll never use. Get the one knife you’ll reach for again and again.
Comparison of the costs that go into bringing you a knife
One great blade
A good knife stays sharp and is comfortable to use. A great knife is the one you reach for.
We’ve put a ton of attention into how people hold and use their knives, and we think we’ve designed the ultimate hybrid. A knife that takes the best elements of western and eastern knifemaking, and combines them into one blade.
After experimenting with dozens of blade profiles, grip shapes and types of steel, we’ve created an incredibly sharp blade that feels right at home in your hand. A long deep belly helps with effortless chopping, while the lowered tip makes slicing and finer work more approachable.
  Grip & Bolster 
The grip and bolster are designed with intention. The contour of the grip makes it feel secure regardless of your preferred grip style or the the size of your hands. Olive Wood - a durable hardwood - keeps the handle grippy whether it's wet or dry.
Even when holding the blade in a pinch grip, a thumb groove in the bolster makes for a more confident and comfortable grip on the blade.
A well balanced blade.
 Layered Steel
The vast majority of stainless steel blades are made with soft steel that won’t hold an edge. Our blade has a cutting core made of Japanese VG-10 steel. This innovative high-carbon stainless steel holds an incredible edge and won’t corrode like other high carbon steels.
This cutting core is then sandwiched in 66 layers of alternating stainless steels. This technique - sometimes referred to as “San Mai” which is used in traditional Japanese sword making - allows the VG10 to be used for the edge while the other layers form a jacket around it. This layering protects the cutting core, while providing a beautiful layered finish on the faces of the blade.
How sharp? Very sharp. 
Many knives on the market are sharp, but few stay that way for long. Being as sharp as possible isn’t necessarily best, particularly if you’re trading off the knife’s ability to retain that sharp edge. A scalpel may be sharper than a kitchen knife, but it would dull quickly.
If your steel is too hard it becomes brittle, and if your edge angle is too fine it will dull quickly. We experimented until we found the right steel and edge profile that maximizes edge retention. The result is a blade that’s razor sharp and stays that way.
Our steel is hardened to between 57-59 rockwell hardness, which allows for a more finely sharpened edge. The blade is then tapered to a 17 degree edge angle, allowing you to glide through even the toughest of root vegetables.
  Testing… Testing... 
We’ve tested our blade with both chefs and home cooks to develop something that feels intuitive for everyone. After more than a year of designing, prototyping, testing, and manufacturing samples we’re ready to go to production. Dozens of revisions have helped us to develop a knife we can’t wait to share with the world.
Stretch Goals
Custom textured ABS Blade Guard. Image is a mockup.
  1000/6000 combination grit whetstone. Image is a mockup.
Why we need your help 
Our knife is ready for production - now we need to raise $25,000 to fund the first production run. All the funds raised will go directly towards sourcing the materials and expert labor needed to create these handmade blades. We have the suppliers and manufacturers lined up and ready to go, we just need your help to bring the blade to life. 
Timeline 
Who are we?   
  Get Your Project Funded Today!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Our biggest risk is manufacturing delays.

We already have fully established relationships with our suppliers and manufacturers. All of the knives you see here in this kickstarter were created by our committed manufacturing partner. However, unexpected hiccups can happen along the way. If they do, we’ll be open and upfront. We know how important transparency is and we commit to always keeping you in the loop about the status of our campaign.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

comments.content: I've been using this knife for years, it's been a pleasure to use and my go to for most cutting.
Love the pairing knife! Suggestion for next creation....how about a set of steak knives?
@ Jesse: i'm using my bulat everyday and it's still pristine. Hope they can solve your issue !

Got my knife in the first round of kickstarter campaign. Been using it daily. It's a nice knife, but the "Damascus " pattern has almost completely faded and there is bubbling in the steel on the reverse side of the blade as the bulat stamp.
The olive wood one is out of stock, do you plan to make new one ? Would love one to go with my bulat chef knife..
Received my pairing knife. Looking forward to using it for Christmas Eve dinner! Thanks for the great knives. How about doing a full set of steak knives?.
Are you offering any deals to your backers for your new knives? Like pairing knife? Free shipping even? Would be great to email your backers a discount code for their support.

The Knife is great! Only the quality of the wooden handle was really disappointing when it got delivered. The wood was really rough and I almost got a splinter. I had to smoothen it with sandpaper for a while until it was nice. I also treat it with mineral oil. Happy now :-)
I love my Bulat! I treat the handle with mineral oil to keep the wood from drying out. The grip is so comfortable and the knife has a good weight to it. It's a real joy to use!
Are there any plans to do a serrated utility knife?
I really love this knife, however, I'm still having trouble getting it as sharp as my shuns. Guidance on sharpening would be appreciated.
I will not miss the ks for the pairing knige this fall!
Best regards
Haven't gotten blade either, in U.S. I did email questions@bulatkitchen.com, any help would be appreciated.

Hey I got my Kife its awesome! beautiful to use feels good in the hand balance wise, but I was very surprised how rough the hand felt in my hand and the wood is untreated. I decided to do something about it and treated the wood with some Tung oil (Disclamer DO SOME RESEARCH Some is food safe some is not!) from Lee Vally Tools. It makes a nice water proof hard coating.
I'm yet to receive my knife as well. Can you assist with an update please? Thanks.
I haven't received the knife, any ans.
Woo hoo!
Just wanted to say I love using this knife. Thanks for making this a kickstarter project.
I haven't received any part of the order yet. Any update? Thanks, and hello from the UK

Update: It seems I received a shipping notification on May 12, but according to the tracking information website, the knife didn't make it past Frankfurt and seems to be stuck there. Any idea why?

Oh, @Tami: I use mineral oil on the handle after washing and drying. It's kept the wood nice and smooth.

BRAVO !

Can you post some instructions on how to use the sharpening stone?

Stunning blade, and weighted perfectly! Absolutely cannot wait for the next one!

However, I do have a question about care for the damascus blade. Usually damascus steel requires special care because of the high carbon content and susceptibility to rust, but I haven't noticed any of that with my blade. Denmark.

Beautiful knife, very sharp, great weight. Well done on a successful campaign. Looking forward to your next one.

Received my 2 knives today. Very nice, very sharp. "Ciseler" the first onion was a delight. A few minor imprecisions in the wood-steel transitions, the walnut being a little better executed than the olive. Both woods a really beautiful and haptically pleasant though. The blades are thin enough for good gliding through stuff and high enough for shoveling stuff rapidly from the board to the pan. My first overall impression: unbeatable high qualitiy/price ratio - and I own 12 japanese as well as german and french chefs around 8" in a 30€ to 400€ price range. The Bulat struck me as one that succeeded in marrying the best of both worlds, japanese and european.

Just got my knife!! Gotta say I'm super impressed with the fit and finish of the grip, there are one or two tiny divots, but I've got big hands with long fingers so I don't notice it. You can't really see them and they don't hinder my grip on the blade, so there isnt a problem, and I'm not worried about it. The blade is also a real beauty. Super sharp OOB, and that Damascus finish is awesome. For those people having a problem with the grip, if you have some crafting skill take a really fine sanding sheet or strip and slowly grind down the areas the at you have a porblem with and apply a coat of beeswax. Dont take too much away though. Take just enough that it smooths over the wood, and hides any imperfections. Remember it's an almost hand crafted product, there will be imperfections and sometimes those imperfections make each individual blade unique. If your problem is a bit more serious like the blade came in chipped then ask for a fix.

yes but I was more thinking about the process for THESE knives I have looked into Damascus folded steel before but I would love to know the process behind these knives going to mass manufacture. while the same techniques would surely be present ( the multi step billet and numerous fold techniques) how do those steps roll over to mass production?? is it all pre pulled from the one bar and then cut? like a mother steel type scenario or is each blade hewn on its own from start to finish? THIS is what I'm interested in I want to see the journey our knives are taking from paper to final product!

Edit to my previous comment. Its roughly* not essentially* the same. im tired and wasnt thinking. The knife we backed is using VG10 only and has a lot of folding. Damascus steel is forged from 2-4 types of steel and is continually cut, hammered, and formed untill it has this pattern.

@Justin Lane, you could try looking up the forging process for Damascus steel blades. Its essentially how this blade was forged. If im not mistaken its the folding process that gives the blade its gorgeous pattern.

campaign.story:
INTRODUCING A SMARTER CHARGING CABLE
EXPECT MORE FROM YOUR MOBILE CHARGING CABLE！
           A HIGH QUALITY CABLE WITH A UNIQUE + CREATIVE DESIGN:
Fine Nylon Threading + Sleek, Smooth Finish Aluminum
Quickly change modes on USB functions by switching from the MALE to FEMALE inserts and receiving options.
Fit all Android phones with OTG functions.  Also charge you iPhone:
Connecting to a Keyboard has never been so easy and convenient. Typing on mobile phones is often a dreadfully slow and challenging experience. Not anymore!
Change a second phone using ONLY one charger cable (Android only). No need to carry extra external power banks and chargers. Our lightweight, easy on-the-go charging option keeps you or your friends covered! 
Want to upload new music to your phone or remove those pesky big files that slow mobile operation? Use the Havit Smart Cable to quickly add or remove files from your device.
 Controlling your game from a mobile screen proves an awful challenge on today small touch screens. Certainly controlling options was not a priority for developers making smart phones. Luckily, the Havit Smart Cable allows you to connect game controllers directly to your mobile device for streamline control and tactically advantageous game play!
Taking photos from your phone and transferring them to a computer for printing is one needless hurdle in the printing process. No longer do you need to waste time connecting and uploading, scaling photos, adjusting print settings and on... Now with one smart cable you can connect and print directly from phone!
For those photographers and photo loving folks, now you can quickly and easily browse all the photos on your camera that you shoot from your main camera with one smart cable connection! Choose your favorite photos from your camera that are "keepers" to remove from your camera to share and show off from your phone.
Connecting to projectors and multimedia devices is often a tedious, IT pain in the neck. Not any longer. Easily connect to projectors and devices directly with one cable, allowing all your future presentations to get along without a hitch!
Why do cables only come in one size? We wondered the same. That's why we've developed the Havit Smart Cable in two different sizes that best fit each users lifestyle and purpose. Keep the short cable in a backpack or purse for quick access and on the go use; and select the longer cable for any connections that need more length for connecting. 
We've selected and sourced ONLY the top grade materials for the creation and assembly of the Havit Smart Cable. We've cut no corners or saved of expense in creating a cable that's sure to last the years to come. We've taken the necessary steps to test the product by a certified third-party QC company and have passed with flying stars. Rest assured, you are going to love this smart cable! Want to see close up shots our the product? View our FAQ section where we've shared a link where you can see High Resolution images of the Havit Smart Cable.
REWARD LEVELS
Havit Thanks E-Letter - $1
Havit Team Postcard- $10
1X Havit Smart Cable Without MFI - $15 (Super Early Bird Special)
1X Havit Smart Cable With MFI - $23 (Super Early Bird Special) 
1X Havit Smart Cable Without MFI - $17
1X Havit Smart Cable With MFI - $25
2X Havit Smart Cables Without MFI - $33 (Early Bird Special)
2X Havit Smart Cables With MFI - $49 (Early Bird Special)
3X Havit Smart Cables Without MFI - $48 (Limited Backers)
3X Havit Smart Cables With MFI - $73 (Limited Backers)
5X Havit Smart Cables Without MFI - $80 (Limited Backers)
5X Havit Smart Cables With MFI - $112 (Limited Backers)
10X Havit Smart Cables Without MFI - $150 (Limited Backers)
10X Havit Smart Cables With MFI - $215 (Limited Backers)
20X Havit Smart Cables Without MFI - $240 (Limited Backers)
20X Havit Smart Cables With MFI - $390 (Limited Backers)
ADD-ON ITEMS
USB-C Adapter - $3
Custom Cable Length: 6-FEET - $4
Cable Carry Case - $4
CABLE LENGTH OPTIONS
25cm / 9.8 inches
100cm / 39 inches
182cm / 72 inches (Add-On Item)
STRETCH GOALS
TIMELINE 
PROTOTYPES
Early prototype designs
PACKAGING DESIGN

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Here at Havit Electronics, we've created a number of great consumer electronic products. Our team's experience and knowledge in product design lets us take creative concepts and bring them to life. We follow a development timeline to execute tasks ranging from ID design, prototyping, factory production, management, and shipping logistics. We not only design products, we manufacture them. Our factory has been a trusted manufacturer for many large and small companies. We thoroughly know the in’s and outs of manufacturing and are established as a registered trademark brand in over 60 countries.

We are sure to be transparent with our contributing backers during the campaign from start to finish. We love engaging with our supporters and early adopters- together we can quickly move from creative concept to real world, actual product!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
We love a good candle, but we're men, and we found very little if anything on the market in the candle world that catered to us. So we set out to create something that spoke to our style. What we thought would be easy turned out to be very difficult, and we took the challenge head on. Through attending perfumery classes, and consulting with with some really amazing perfumers, we gained the background we needed to create a line of designer grade cologne scented candles. 
While we've done lots of test runs, we need funding to launch our first full scale line of production.  The costs of packaging, vessels, custom wax blends, and most notably our fragrance oils (which are as high quality as any on the market) are expensive and we need funding as capital to place orders.  Once we are funded, and we have the materials we need, we will be hand pouring and packaging each candle ourselves.
NOTE: the candle glasses shown in our video have changed a bit for the better since we shot it. They are now in a taller 14 OZ. double rocks glass, as opposed to the 10 OZ. used in the video. We also stepped up the print work on the glasses and packaging.
You can read up on the details of what we're doing below, or feel free to check out our website www.carlstonco.com
                        Due to kickstarter guidelines, we are not allowed to donate any funding to charity. BUT we have partnered with HONEY, an organization dedicated to stopping the silence of the subject of sexual assault, to bring you the "Consent" candle. $1 of all future sales of the consent candle will be donated to Honey, and you can check them out at thetasteofhoney.org
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We have already had samples produced of our glassware, our packaging, and our fragrance oils. These companies are standing by awaiting our order placement, and at this point, the only set backs we may incur would be in the delay of their delivery to us. We fully anticipate being able to deliver our product promptly, assuming those we contract out to, maintain quoted turn around times. 

Nothing will stop us from making sure you get your sniff!!!!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hi Everyone,
We are so excited to update all of you that we are shipping all Kickstarter orders next week Monday.  This has been such an incredible journey and we are so happy with how our product has turned out.  We hope you will love them as much as we do.  We know the delays were inconvenient and we can't express enough how thankful we are for all the patience and support.  Each pivot or adjustment we made was with the intention to deliver a product that we would be proud of, and at the same time, each of you would be stoked on.  We just wanted to do it right.

Hi Everyone,
First of all thank you for your patience.  We are so grateful for the support and positive feedback we received after our last update.  We are starting our candle pours today and feel very good about how the fragrances have macerated.  We are so excited to send them to you and get them in your hands.  If you still have not completed the survey in order for us to know where and what candle you would like us to send to you, please make sure you do that.  Privately message us if you can't find the email with the survey link to fill out the information we need.  We can add it to our shipping spreadsheet. 
Please also message us privately or change the survey response if there has been a change of address since you filled out the survey.

Hi everyone, 
Last week we received our finalized batch of the iterated fragrance oils. Because we are a little new to the technical chemistry of fragrance, we have had to run a large number of tests to ensure that each different fragrance oil compound works correctly with our specific wax blend and wick combination. In our initial tests, we experienced diminished "throw" in a few test candles when we did not allow for the correct amount of maceration time of the oils. Maceration is a technical term that involves giving the various fragrance ingredients time to bond and react. We attempted to rush this compounding process to see if we could get these out the door quicker to you guys but there are no short cuts, and they aren't real great without proper maceration and cure time.

Hi Everyone, 
We deeply apologize that we haven’t been able to send out an update in the last couple of weeks since our surveys have been sent. We haven’t had a lot to report so we didn’t want to just update you all with anything pointless. After meeting with our perfumer in the beginning of February, we made a very important decision to make a few tweaks to the fragrances for our first line of candles. We had this discussion prior to placing the bulk orders of our fragrance oils because we felt very passionately that if there was even a little room for us to improve and give everyone the best possible product, we would do it. After meeting with our perfumer, we were hopeful that the delivery of our fragrance oil with the final iterations would arrive towards the close of February 2016. We still felt confident in delivery because we do our own pours and could fulfill the order of 700 candles on our own in a couple days. Unfortunately, delivery of the fragrance oils has been delayed. We are now anticipating them to arrive to us in the middle of March 2016. Our fragrance oils are made right here in Los Angeles so we hope you feel reassured that delivery to us will not take a significant amount of time once completed. We will be delayed in our original ETA, but we will follow up and update everyone as soon as the fragrance oils are ready.

updates.update_userinfo: WE DID IT, THANKS TO YOU
updates.update_content:
WE CANNOT THANK YOU ENOUGH FOR ALL OF THE SUPPORT!
We Are Successfully Funded!!! I know we have expressed this over and over again in previous updates, but we just want to reiterate one more time; THANK YOU THANK YOU EVERYONE! We are now successfully funded and we can’t wait to send you our candles. We have been busy finalizing costs for everything on our end now that we know the exact amount of candles we are fulfilling. We just want to let you all know that will be sending out the survey in the next couple of days. This survey essentially is where you will specify to us which candle(s) you would like us to send out. If you are unsure which specific candle you prefer, we can make recommendations for you. Please also be on the lookout for us inquiring about methods of payment, if the payment you have listed in your Kickstarter pledge has any issues.

WE ARE FULLY FUNDED! WE ARE SO GRATEFUL TO ALL OF OUR PLEDGES, AND EVERYONE WHO HAS BEEN SPREADING THE WORD!
WITH 34 DAYS TO GO, WE HOPE TO GET OUR SCENTS IN THE NOSES OF SO MANY MORE.

campaign.story:
While researching and developing our sustainable algae ink to replace regular ink, found in everyday printers, something unexpected happened—the ink changed from one day to the next.
Our goal of replacing toxic ink remains the same, but the discovery Living Ink is too fun not to share with the world.
We took our discovery and turned it into a fun little product to share with you, the Kickstarter community.
We are hoping to raise funds to further our research and help save the planet from the damage that producing and using regular ink is causing.
The Problem
Regular ink has a problem that most people don't know about: It's dirty, dirty stuff.
Most colored pigments found in regular ink are made up of heavy metals like cadmium, copper, chromium, iron, lead, and aluminum.
Carbon black is the most common pigment used in black inks. It's most commonly made from of the incomplete combustion of heavy petroleum products such as tar; that's right, TAR! It's a product that is labeled as carcinogenic by the International Agency for Research on Cancer.
Ink isn't only made of pigments, a considerable amount of ink is made up of binders, carriers, and solvents. Most carriers are petroleum oil, while most solvents used in inks are volatile organic compounds (VOCs), all of which have detrimental human and environmental impacts.
The Solution
Develop an ink that is safe and sustainable. Living Ink is produced in cells using sunlight and CO2 from the atmosphere; its only byproducts are oxygen and clean water. This means Living Ink is actually great for the environment. Living Ink is the first step in weaning the world off of regular ink and moving towards a safe and renewable solution.
If you love science too, or want to know even more about the technical details behind Living Ink, shoot us an email. We’re scientists at heart and we love talking shop, anytime.
While researching and developing our sustainable algae ink to replace the regular ink we use everyday something unexpected happened—the ink changed from one day to the next.
As scientists, we began analyzing the “problem.” It didn’t take long for us to realize that this “Living Ink” was really cool.
After sending Grandma Elle a Living Ink birthday card, seeing how much our kids loved drawing their favorite stories, and watching actual artists use it in creative ways, we knew we had to share it with the world.
We are here on Kickstarter because it’s a creative community that supports art and science. Until this point, we’ve been deep in the science (something to the tune of 10 years studying and researching algae). But, our goal has always been to see something useful result from all of that research.
We know that Living Ink will be incredibly useful to all types of people, but we need help to take this from R&D to actual product.
That’s where the Kickstarter community comes in. The majority of funds for this project will go directly to manufacturing the world’s first pen that writes in algae. The remaining pledges will allow us to purchase materials and produce components in bulk, in order to get the cost low enough to get Living Ink into the hands of all you artists, creatives, inventors, DIY'ers, and genuinely interesting people.
Environmental Protection
If you haven’t figured it out already, our Living Ink is made of Algae. Algae is the planet’s superfood—critical to the existence of thousands of species, the water we drink, and countless other life sustaining functions. It is our priority to ensure that our ink helps protect the environment through responsible business practices, and through educating our customers about the importance of maintaining a healthy ecosystem.  
Empowering Storytellers
Even before we had ink, humans were sharing their past, explaining their present, and dreaming up their future through stories. The desire to be understood transcends all cultures and eras. It’s our goal to continue to inspire and empower storytellers to excel at their craft.
Sharing Science
We believe that science is the most exciting way to improve our lives. We hope that our project will inspire the next generation of scientists to turn research into awesome products that advance society.
Scott and Steve are two scientists who have dedicated the last decade to developing new ways to use algae as ink, to replace the inks we see and use every day. Steve is the mad scientist. For him, if it’s not a well-documented process, then it’s not worth doing. Scott is the Clark Kent of Science. Sometimes he’s just a normal nerdy guy, and then he turns into this scientific super hero of sorts. They teamed up with some of their smartest friends to help them pull off this Kickstarter campaign. Jared and Tyler are the creative force behind this campaign and the products we'll be shipping out. If you spot one of the many small details of awesomeness, it surely was their doing. David brought to the team his proven Kickstarter strategy that he has honed while "monkii'ing" around. He tells our story in a way that has propelled Living Ink as a brand and product to new heights.
Most importantly, it took friends and family to fill in the gaps. Now, we look to the Kickstarter community to join our team and make Living Ink come to life!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
1. Ink formulation stability.
We have developed the first pen formulation that is capable of growing and we are really excited about this. We also have added other components to the ink so that you can see where you are writing as you make your masterpiece. These added components disappear from the page under an hour, so that your message becomes a mystery to anyone but you. This formulation has been quite a challenge for us to get perfect, and any deviation from this formulation may change the rate at which the ink grows. We’re constantly working on ways to ensure that this isn’t a problem when we ship out the product and this successful Kickstarter will help ensure nothing but the best product leaves our lab. 
 
2 Variability in growth conditions.
While our inks can grow in low light and cool conditions, they’d much rather have bright light and warm temperatures all day long. Here at Living Ink we are dedicated to clearly communicating how much light is required and the right temperature for your ink to grow the way we say it does. Low light conditions and cooler temperatures may cause your ink to grow slower than expected. While we currently use an algae strain that is sensitive to these changing conditions, we are also researching other species of algae that allow for a much wider range of light and temperature conditions.

3. Shipping logistics.
We package living algae cells into the pens that are shipped to your door. These microscopic organisms are very robust, but conditions outside of their comfort level can cause them to die, which doesn’t make for good growing ink. We believe that our scientists have developed formulations that prepare the cells to live in dark conditions for long periods of time, but problems in the shipping process and/or cold weather may cause the ink to improperly function once you start using them. Not to worry, though. We’re on it and believe that when you get your ink, there will be more than enough live algae cells to make your images come to life, no matter how long it takes to get to your door!

4. We're scientists
We've never shipped a product before! We knew we had a lot to learn in this regard, so we teamed up with people who have successfully designed products and fulfilled large Kickstarter campaigns.

Throughout the entire campaign, and if/when any challenges arise, we’re committed to being transparent and communicative to our backers. This means you’ll get regular campaign updates and be involved during the entire fulfillment process.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Thank you and Remaining Backer Surveys
updates.update_content:
Hey Backers,
What a crazy last couple months it has been! So far we have shipped out nearly 850 products! It’s been a steep learning curve from scaling up manufacturing, packaging and shipping out the rewards. 
We did Kickstarter to go through this process and help us better understand what it takes to make a product and delivery it, and now we know! We can confidently say that this experience has changed our perspective when it comes to the time and effort it takes to deliver products. We thank you backers for the patience, support and feedback that have helped us improve in so many ways.

Hey everyone, 
Scott and I thought it would be helpful if we shot some "how to" videos for the various kits.  Hope this adds more explanation to the included instructions that were a part of each kit.

Hey Backers, 
We have been working hard in the laboratory, growing algae, ordering all necessary pieces and even spending a weekend at Steve's house making handcrafted wood blocks for the original editions (video below). Two molecular biologists + electric sand + router + chop saw = questionable. Overall the bases look great and no major injuries occurred!
