campaign.story:
The forest is growing fast! As caretakers for kodama, the tree spirits, you must keep the forest a healthy and lush home for your little friends. Over three growing seasons, you must cultivate trees with the right mix of flowers, insects, and branch arrangements to make your kodama as happy as possible. Whoever cares for their kodama best will be remembered for generations!
From the designer of the hit game Kigi, Kodama branches out into a fun new way to play! Grow your tree by placing cards in clever arrangements, being careful to leave room for future growth. At the end of each season, one kodama will award you points for how well your tree suits its needs. With beautiful art and innovative mechanics, Kodama is an inTREEguing game for the whole family.
Kodama: The Tree Spirits is the newest Small Box/Big Fun game from Action Phase Games, playing in under 45 minutes for 2-5 players. We encourage you to view the videos directly below for more information. Or simply peruse our rule book here.
 
The Deluxe Edition of the game includes the below components in addition to the ones above:
The story of Kodama is an interesting one indeed. Initially, we sought to publish Daniel's game Kigi, but felt we could help to develop a few elements of the game. Two months later, we realized that we had a much different game than Kigi and Kodama took seed! (You can read more about this here in Daniel's Design Diary.)
While both games come from similar roots, Kodama provides a very different game experience from its predecessor.
Here are the differences in Kigi and Kodama:
THEME: In Kodama, players cultivate homes (trees) for the kodama.
PLACEMENT: In Kodama, there is no pruning, but rather a 10 point scoring cap for placement that encourages diversity while leaving players with a beautiful tree by the end of the game. Additionally, players now only place branches on their own trees.
FEATURES: Not only are all of the features updated to help represent the theme, there are now six features as opposed to five.
GOALS: In Kigi, goals came in the form of Commission cards that were shuffled into the branch deck. Now, players are dealt four kodama cards, three of which they will score over three seasons.
SEASONS: Play is now divided into three seasons: Spring, Summer, and Fall. At the beginning of each season a Decree will be revealed which will add or amend a rule in the game--adding more replayability and strategy to placement. After placing four branches, players will select one of their Kodama cards to score. At the end of three seasons, players score a final Kodama card and a winner is determined!
Kodama: The Tree Spirits is the fifth project from Action Phase Games and was designed by the very talented Daniel Solis. With the successful execution of our first four projects, we have become experienced as publishers. We will confidently execute this project to the same high standard.
The deluxe edition, containing additional content and upgraded components, will not be available in retail.
Daniel Solis has successfully designed a game that is accessible to gamers of all ages and levels of experience. Kodama is innovative while remaining easy to learn and play. Because of these factors, we have every confidence that this game will be played for years to come.
People who have demoed and play-tested this game have uniformly loved it for its original mechanics, charm, artistic beauty, and accessibility. While the game takes under 45 minutes to teach and play, it offers a surprising amount of tactical depth and replay value.
All of the art assets (with the exception of the 3 Become a Guardian pledge levels) are complete.
The game is full of charming illustrations by the extremely gifted Kwanchai Moriya, with graphic design by the equally talented Scott Hartman.
Not only do we offer free shipping in the US, but this project is EU friendly, too.
Kickstarter is the world's largest funding platform for creative projects. Every month, tens of thousands of people pledge millions of dollars to creative projects in dozens of categories.
A person who supports a project is called a "backer." The process of giving money to this project is called a "pledge."
In return for your pledge, we (the creators of the campaign) are able to offer "rewards," depending on the amount you pledge.
For example, if you pledge $19 to help back the project — we'll offer you a copy of the game along with any over-funding goals we achieve as soon as it is manufactured. You'll get access weeks before it's made available to everyone else!
Pledge levels vary from just $1 to several hundred dollars. And each different level opens up a new creative reward. (For a full list, check out the right side of this page, or scroll down a bit more).
You can become a backer in just three easy steps:
Step 1: Read through the pledge levels and rewards we're offering in the right sidebar of this page.
Step 2: Click the large, green "BACK THIS PROJECT" button to the right of the trailer video at the top of this page.
Step 3: Enter your pledge amount, and complete the steps for filling in your information. This process takes just a few seconds! That's it! It's really that simple! Thank you for backing!
Once you've backed this project, we encourage you to share this page on social media platforms, such as Facebook and Twitter, and to tell your friends. Also, be sure to like Action Phase Games on Facebook and follow us on Twitter for real time updates about this project and more!
SAPLING (Pledge $1 or more): Every contribution counts. The Guardians of the forest appreciate your help.
TREE SPIRIT (Pledge $19 or more): One copy of Kodama: The Tree Spirits with stretch goals. Free shipping in the US. Other shipping rates based on location.
KODAMA (Pledge $27 or more): One deluxe copy of Kodama: The Tree Spirits, which includes additional Kodama and Decree cards in addition to wooden player components and first player marker. Stretch goals included. Free shipping in the US. Other shipping rates based on location.
GROVE DWELLER (Pledge $52 or more): Two deluxe copies of Kodama: The Tree Spirits, which includes 16 additional Kodama and Decree cards, as well as wooden player components and season marker. Stretch goals included. Free shipping in the US. Other shipping rates based on location.
BECOME A FOREST GUARDIAN (Pledge $400 or more): You will be immortalized as a Guardian of the Forest. Your likeness will be used on all of the backs of one of the three decks of Decree cards, making you the Guardian for that particular season. This pledge level includes two deluxe copies of Kodama: The Tree Spirits. Free shipping anywhere in the world.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
As this is our fifth campaign, we have learned how to streamline the game publishing process. In our first campaign, we encountered a handful of issues due to third-party partners and elements outside of our control. In our second campaign, as well as with the reprint of our first game, we managed to successfully avoid all of these issues.

As evidenced on our prior projects, we are willing to go the extra mile to solve any problems that may arise. The scope and scale of a small box project like this is less susceptible to the potential problems we have navigated in the past. We have every confidence that we will be able to deliver Kodama on time and that it will be of the highest possible quality.

Our greatest obstacle is simply funding the manufacture of this game.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Catch the Tree Spirits Before It's Too Late! Kodama Forest Kickstarter Ends Today!
updates.update_content: FINAL HOURS FOR KODAMA FOREST!

When they grow older, every Kodama is given a tree of their own, and it's their job to watch over it and help it grow healthy and strong. From trunk to twig, they must keep it green and growing, the perfect home for flowers, mushrooms, and critters of all kinds. Even other kodama love to travel around and visit new trees. Now it's your turn! Create your own masterpiece of branches and leaves, and make the forest even more beautiful!

updates.update_userinfo: Kodama Duo - final hours on kickstarter, sooooo close to all stretch goals being unlocked!
updates.update_content: Kodama Duo is in its final hours and we are so close to unlocking all of our stretch goals I can almost feel it.  If you haven't taken a look at this new stand alone game for two and Kodama expansion, then please do before time runs out.  Here is a quick peak at all the goals we've unlocked, and our final stretch goal:

updates.update_userinfo: Kodama Duo - a new game of Kodama for two, and expansion to play Kodama for 6 is now on kickstarter!
updates.update_content: We are excited to expand the Kodama universe with Kodama Duo - a two-player game that shares the core game play of Kodama with exciting new twists such as spirit tokens and an "I split, you choose" mechanic tailored to enhance the two player experience.

updates.update_userinfo: Less than 12 Hours to go for Kokoro!
updates.update_content: Just a quick reminder that Kokoro kickstarter project is almost over.  If you haven't taken a look at this great little game set in the Kodama universe, please do before its too late!

Just a quick heads up that we just launched Kokoro on kickstarter!  Kokoro is a re-release of the very fun, fast game Avenue - that we've added the fantastic artwork of Kwanchai, Daniel Solis' graphic design and the development efforts of the Action Phase team.
It is a beautiful game - looks & substance, so please take a minute to check it out by CLICKING HERE.

Quick update here today, folks!
Our newest Action Phase title BEEEEES! just launched on KS! Do take a minute to check out this very fun new game. BEEEEES! is a real time dice game with true gamer appeal. Just click here.

Hello, all!
Very quick update. Last week Action Phase launched Daniel Solis' new game Trickster: Champions of Time. We thought it pertinent to inform all of the Kodama backers, as Daniel was the creative force and designer behind what has proven to be our most popular game to date. With art from the equally talented Beth Sobel (Viticulture, Tuscany, Lanterns).

Hello, all!
Very quick update today. After a very long hiatus from Kickstarter, we are extremely proud to announce that we have launched the first of our awesome 2017 catalog: Delve! We strongly encourage you all to take a moment and check out the project here.

Hello, all!
Sorry for the prolonged delay in response concerning the discs and stickers. It took us some time to come to an agreement with the factory about, how to address the issue, and then wait for them to be shipped from China. Well, they just arrived in Longbeach yesterday, and we should have them by the middle of August to begin fulfilling those that require replacement parts.

I didn't see an answer to your question, so here it is: Just look at the tokens (front and back) on the token sheet for the regular game; these should tell you how to apply your stickers to the wood discs. For example, you have four firefly stickers (one with a "100"). These four stickers should be applied to both sides of two wood discs.

If I buy something form a local store and it's not the way it should be, they replace it, not tell me it's a manufacturer issue and tell me how much it's going to cost them to replace it. I am truly not trying to be a jerk about it in anyway, I love the game, just dissapointed it how this issue is being put forth.

2a. This is a more extreme variant. If there are n players, then each round the players must take n turns before Auto's turn. A player may take more than one turn this round, and a player may take no turns this round.

If the wildcard feature makes Auto too powerful, then here is a less-powerful variant: Auto's trunk feature can match any feature for purposes of scoring, BUT it can only be considered one feature for any particular scoring round. So if Auto's trunk feature is a mushroom, then any given mushroom can act as a star for star scoring, or a caterpillar for caterpillar scoring, but not both. Two different mushrooms can act like two different features.

I'm always interested in solo versions of games. (The goal being simply to get as many points as you can; you could easily have a "rating" system based on the number of points you achieved.) Have you tried playing this game solo?
I think either interpretation is reasonable (rules-lawyering aside); you may want to include an example or clarification in the rulebook so we're sure of the correct scoring.

campaign.story:
So guys...24 hours left!
ONE last day - ONE last offer.
This time Fabrikators - co-founders of ONELID - threw in their best selling scrubbing gloves to the deal. The gloves have made it all the way to the Oprah Winfrey magazine and have sold more than 3 mio. pairs. Get your hands on these and cleaning potatoes and vegetables is a breeze.

So for now - hopefully you'll like this deal. We will be in touch with all backers shortly after the campaign has ended.
Thank you all!!
The ONELID Team


ONELID
The world’s first truly universal multifunction lid that actually looks good and works like a dream. Once you try this - we promise you’ll never want to go back to using your old lids. Well maybe for drumming that is...
ONELID was originally spawned by the ambition to make a lid that would minimize the risk of over boiling - but along the way we learned there were so many more annoying things related to the regular lids we use, like finding a lid that fits, burning hands and difficulties draining.
Meet ONELID 

The only lid that is :
Universal - will fit most of your pots (up to 22 cm/8.75" diameter).
Reduces over boiling -  intelligent groove system will let out just the right amount of excess steam.
Has an integrated strainer – draining a pot has never been easier or safer, just grab your pot or pan and pour.

Does not transfer heat - even when boiling for extended amount of time the ONELID handle stays cool to the touch.  

Makes no sound - soft on the outside - yet sturdy on the inside makes for safe handling and silent operation.
Danish Design at its best - we are pretty proud to have fit all these features into a design this modern, sophisticated and elegant.
Is dishwasher safe - naturally...
So, if you are like us, and would like to get your hands on one of the first ONELIDS, please sign up - and we will do our utmost to make your cooking experience easier, safer and more enjoyable for years to come. For a little more in-depth knowledge - please read on...  
ONELID - HOW DOES IT WORK?
SIZE - having trouble finding a lid to fit?
Not to mention the cacophony of noisy metal striking metal when desperately trying to find the right lid inside your kitchen cabinet? ONELID offers 4 ingenious features combined with great modern design in one elegant lid that will fit all your existing pots (up to 22 cm/8.75").
Ever experienced boiling over?
Depending on what you’re cooking, every pot will tend to over boil if you turn the heat up too high. The bigger the pot - the more steam is let out. ONELID greatly reduces this tendency by letting out just the right amount of excess steam. The intelligently designed grooves on the underside of ONELID are shaped to match the size of your pot and release just the right amount of steam to prevent over-boiling. Simple :) 
And you know the moisture that drips from your current lids onto the stovetop? ONELIDs patented convex underside ensures the drops that form will run back into your pot, so your stovetop stays cleaner.
Draining  - no more burned fingers or spilled pasta in your sink
Tired of burning your fingers on metal/glass lids during cooking or while pouring? Ever tried sliding your conventional lid a little to the side allowing that boiling water to drain, but ended up soaking your pot holders and getting peas and pasta into the sink? Yeah - who hasn’t!

Well no more. Because of the unique air-vents doubling as strainer (draining) holes, you now have trouble-free draining. ONELIDs silicone surface ensures great friction against the pot so your ONELID will stay centered and safe – even when held vertically. Your peas and pasta will remain in the pot where they belong.
Perfect for casseroles too. The ONELID handle have taken many forms to reach this final design. ONELID now boasts superior ergonomics - both for 1 and 2-handle pots. And with a diameter of 23 cm/9" ONELID will cover all you pots up to 3,5 liters. (covering 90-95 % of all private cooking). 
Just check your old pot diameters before signing up.
Heat distribution - cool to the touch
This FLIR-photo comparison shows how much better the heat distribution of ONELID works compared to a steel lid (and btw. glass lids are the same). Other than the hotter steam areas (away from the handles) the ONELID handle has the same temperature as the room and is barely affected by the boiling process within. No matter where you grip ONELID, your fingers are safe from burning. The better insulation will also save you power !
Early tests on temperature...
PLAY

CHECK OUT THE VIDEO BELOW HIGHLIGTING THE MAIN FEATURES 
PLAY

THE BACKGROUND
The initial idea behind ONELID was spawned by professional chef, and ONELID co-creator, Sylvester Vantore. He observed how chefs would use tin foil as a substitute for the right size pot lid. This simple technique furthermore had the adjustability to let out just the right amount of excess steam in order to reduce over-boiling. Although functional, it’s not very practical nor pretty. Understanding that there must be a better way, Sylvester eventually came up with the idea of an oversized lid (to fit varying pot sizes) designed with under-lid grooves to allow excess steam to escape.
Sylvester brought this discovery to the attention of prominent Danish designer, Martin Sonne. Martin eagerly took up the challenge to make the 'perfect lid'. From that point on, the lid began to evolve, but it would be years before the form and function were perfected.

CHALLENGES PRESENT OPPORTUNITIES
We knew we had to let out just enough steam to minimize the risk of over boiling without wasting energy so we added some more grooves and came up with the 'swing' to the channels so the vent holes 'adjusts' to the diameter of the pot. Small pot, small holes - larger pot, larger holes. It was only during early tests that we discovered that the vent holes provided the perfect effect for straining. And again - the bigger the pot the faster the water is let out so it was a win-win.  
We also came up with the now patented convex underside in order for the lid to fit multiple pot sizes. This had added benefits too: The lid will 'automatically' center on any pot and stay securely in place - and it takes very little effort to hold while pouring because it more or less 'hangs' from the friction created by the silicone. The condensed steam forming on the underside of the lid will flow back into the pot and not onto your stove top.
Even though it didn't exactly made things easier, requiring the silicone surface was a big priority. The benefits are many: 260 °C (500 °F) heat resistance, non-stick easy clean-up, non-toxic, and very resistant to microbiological growth. Add to that, ONELID makes a fashion statement in any kitchen. It not only looks and feels great, ONELID provides exceptional ergonomics, because the friction created when the lid is on the pot is far superior to metal. You’ll immediately feel the difference when you handle the pot - the lid just stays more securely in place.
THE PROCESS
Along the way we have tested several designs. Below is an array of the various designs and prototypes ranging from the first 360 degree design through to a more solid design - unfortunately proving impossible to make but leading the way to the beautiful final design we have today.
THE PRODUCTION
Finally we have the details right - It did take us years of work and a skilled manufacturer. A true professional and we even needed to go to the other side of the world to find him. Kenny is his first name, KONG his surname. We call him "King Kong" as he helped us nail the final procedure. So we worked out a 4 part procedure to make a lid with 4 functions - makes sense :) 
Step 1 : Mold inner core in nylon with Stainless insert
Step 2 : Full silicone overmold
Step 3 : Mold lower handle in ABS
Step 4 : Mold upper handle in ABS

Mount and UV weld, pack and ship to you guys in the sturdy packaging so you too can start enjoying the ONELID life ;)

THE IP
ONELID holds a patent based on the concave shape and the ingenious groove system on the lower side.
More to this we have applied for a design protection since we find it worth the money to try and  protect the signature design by Martin. There will be copies sooner or later - but we aver none with the qualitiy of our design, material composition and finish.

MILESTONES
September         Kickstarter campaign launch
October              Mold start-up
December          Production 1 roll.
January 2016     Production start - start shipping
February  2016  Shipping done 
April 2016          Shipping Glass lids
ABOUT US
Martin Sonne - with more than 20 years of designing products and working with visual communication, Martin is still striving for the simplest solutions to the most complex problems. Designing ONELID has been a journey in just that - trying to fit all these unique features into a lid so simple and so clean that one would think it is just another lid. Staying within that comfort zone of what people expect a lid to look like and then add a little evolution on top seemed to be the right approach.
Sylvester Vantore - the man with the 1000 ideas. Sylvester is on a quest to make good things better; To find that little thing that will make a normal item become a unique item. Being a chef and having learned from the best (Rasmus Kofoed - world champion chef 2011) Sylvester knows what makes for good kitchen tools. So it comes as no surprise that he was the man to invent ONELID.
We couldn't have done this alone though. With great production expertise and patience from Lars Forsberg (from Danish company Fabrikators) we are now ready to move into production. 
Want to know more about Fabrikators go to www.fabrikators.com

And Kenny Kong the man will make sure tooling and production is second to none once we get there. 
So 5 years down the road and we are ready to let you guys take us the rest of the way. We can't tell you how much we want this to happen. We want to let the world try how cooking can be if you have the right tools. This lid is made like it should have been in the first place - ONELID - is all you need. So please help us get this baby to take its first steps...

STRETCH GOALS
40,000 USD     GET'S US STARTED - ITS ALL WE NEED !
ONELID standard edition - comes in pale grey or dark grey
ONELID Kickstarter limited edition
70.000 USD    GET'S THE GLASS VERSION ON THE POT
Same functions - same materials - and still have the grooves...only this time with a glass center so you can tell what's cooking'..
ONELID glass edition
If we do hit 70k we will do a special Kickstarter version just for you guys. This will show your support and make your ordinary pots look like a million..
ONELID Kickstarter limited glas edition for the early birds
PACKAGING
Maybe you want a lid for yourself - maybe you find it could be a great gift for your avid kitchen cooking sister, mom or good friend.
Therefore we will ensure your lid arrives in a nice box.
DANISH "HEERING & HYGGE EVENT" 
HYGGE : [COSY - HAVE A NICE TIME]
PLAY

   SO LETS GET STARTED   I   ONELID   I    FOR THE LOVE OF POTS
Get Your Project Funded Today!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We move into new waters of production.
It is a bit of a complicated proces but we have the right team.

The finishing touches:
- Will the UV weld of the handle be perfect?
- Getting the right Silicone surface look 
- Getting thickness of the Silicone just right
- Getting the colours as deep and pretty as we want

Only getting it done will show us!
No matter what obstacles lie ahead we promise you we will be 100% transparent in our communication to you. We want the best - and we know you do too. 

Thank you all for your support - if means the world to us.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
DEAR ALL,
SHIPPING has been a nightmare - but finally we have some tangible and solid news 
* BACKERS WHO HAVE NOT YET RECEIVED THEIR PLEDGE *
Lids have landed in Europe now and are ready to go the last bit. We expect Europe backer delivery within 3 weeks from now.
USA/CANADA will follow in 3-5 weeks. We expect North America backer delivery within 3 weeks from that time.

DEAR BACKERS 

Maybe the word "backer" does not apply anymore ?
Maybe we should start up with 

DEAR FELLOWS - DEAR MARATHONERS 

We have shipped all lids our now to those of you that live where direct shipping is needed. The rest is on the way to EU and USA/CANADA as this way we are sure to avoid duty, tax hold up and a lot of hassle... so it is still on the way. TOK TOK

We have received some great feedback until now and we hope that will continue.

This one is from our friend Michael in Japan

DEAR ALL 

THIS MUST BE YOU THINKING OF US..

Hi everyone. Finally - we're ready to ship all remaining orders out.
Here's the deal: All orders will ship bulk to USA, EUR and "Rest of the world". Orders will then ship to you guys directly. This is to make sure we don't get customs issues, thereby ensuring you will get your order delivered to your doorstep without problems. 
North America: Expect delivery late Sep or Oct 
EUR: Expect delivery late Sep or Oct
ROW: Expect delivery late Sep

updates.update_userinfo: THE LAST OF THE LAST (CONFIRMATION CALL)
updates.update_content:
Dear still to be a ONELID backer.

ALL PRODUCTS ARE DONE
We have started shipping the remainder pledges out.
All of you should by now have received the final confirmation email from the CrowdOX system.
As of today all... and we mean ALL products are ready and allocated in our ware house.
More than 4,000 lids nicely packed in boxes.
Unless something catch fire (God forbid) they will all be on the way to you within the next few weeks. You will have your X-Mas present ready well in time and we have proven that our own pledge all the way was not Fake News as some people continue to claim.

Dear Backers of ONELID

Some people say 
Anything worth having is worth figthing for 
That's gotta be us 

Some people say 
Anything worth having is worth waiting for 
That's gotta be you 

W.C Fields is famous for the quote below

DEAR BACKERS

We know we are not like other campaigners that update more frequently.
We have set out our reasons before so no need to repeat again - but again reiterate and ensure you all that we will always update when we have some useful tangible information. I.e. you wont get "we are waiting for more information" or "working on it" - especially now as we are in the very final stages of our campaign where all that really matters is when you will get your pledges.

It goes without saying or at least it should .. that of course we are working on it...every day of course. And of course we too are not satisfied with our overly optimistic time projections and the overall delays of the project. We feel that we have already apologized all we can, and there is really not much more we can do now other than "keep walking". It is pretty stressful to get complaints and remarks that we are con men, cheaters, stupid etc  (no matter how well deserved it might be) and not really having any ammunition to go against it or reverse the situation. We want to feel like Homer!

Dear Backers of ONELID

"Good news and not so good news and above all hope, patience and perseverance"
[note : If you just wanna know the progress of your pledge scroll down to the
¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤¤ line]

We too are backers of many Kickstarter projects,- and the above line seems to be most prevailing headline of all.

So for all it is we are not alone 

How come ?

The simple explanation is that innovators, inventors, creatives and entrepreneurs are more stupid than average. Although we think there is some truth to the fact - we hope for our own sake and yours that there is more to it :)

Dear all 

We have seen in the news that some people believe the moon eclipsed the sun yesterday. Well we have proof that that was not the case....

....YES...WE'RE STILL SHIPPING... 
First things first: Regarding shipping .. This is important to be clear about:
For orders with SOLID lids ONLY: You will receive your order if it contains SOLID LIDS ONLY (about 50% of you) within the next 3-4 weeks depending on where you live.

campaign.story:
Escape back to a time when sails were raised, and unknown lands were waiting to be discovered! In Virgin Seas you control a fleet of ships in a race to discover and control islands in the uncharted oceans. Confront, and seize control, of your opponents vessels in this quick and strategic game of area control. But you are not alone in the ocean! Deep below the Kraken awaits, and when she arrives the game ends!
Each player draws from their own personal fleet deck. Each fleet deck is the same. Most of these cards are ships, but there are three islands in each deck. Players control when and where these islands appear on the board and thus can place them to their own advantage. Islands simply have a set point value that players will score at the end of the game if they control the seas surrounding it. However, whenever you place an island card, you must draw an event card. Events often reward the player with a unique strategic action, but there are three Kraken cards in the deck, and when all three are revealed, the game ends immediately! 
More game info below in the Overview Section, including a FREE Print & Play, Draft Rules Download, and a Tutorial Video!
Why Pledge Now? 
Discount - By backing Virgin Seas you will get your copy at a nice discount. The MSRP for Virgin Seas will be $25, plus you are getting a $7 shipping credit (Free Shipping within the U.S.). That means that by pledging now, you will save more than 35%.
Backers First - We have made it a priority in the past, and will continue to in the future, to ship games to backers before we open up sales to the public. It is only fair that those that helped make the game happen get their copies first!
Your Feedback - We value your thoughts and ideas. Being part of the Kickstarter allows you to be heard. We have used numerous backer ideas in the past and are open to your suggestions. So be part of the process, and let's build this game together!
Stretch Rewards - By backing Virgin Seas you will actually affect the outcome of the final game. The more we raise, the more that can be approved or added. See the "Stretch Goals" section for more details.
We Simply Need You! - We have paid for the artwork, graphics, prototyping, and playtesting out of our own pockets up front, but we need your support to help pay for manufacturing and shipping.
  Red Fleet Deck (14 square cards) Unlocked! 300gsm linen finish
Blue Fleet Deck (14 square cards) Unlocked! 300gsm linen finish
Green Fleet Deck (14 square cards) Unlocked! 300gsm linen finish
Yellow Fleet Deck  (14 square cards) Unlocked! 300gsm linen finish
Event Deck (16 cards) Unlocked! 300gsm linen finish
60 Wooden Tokens (15 red, 15 blue, 15 green, & 15 yellow) WOODEN SHIP MEEPLES!
Full-Color Instruction Booklet
2-Piece Setup Box
Unlocked! Poseidon Event Card
  PRINT it! PLAY it! and then BACK it! Click the image below for the PnP-lite files!
Click the image below to download the PDF draft rules!
Check out this tutorial video and learn more about how to play Virgin Seas!
What is Red Beard's Booty?
Red Beard, like many pirates, was a hoarder, but he was smart enough to bury his treasure on many different islands scattered about the open sea. Unfortunately he and his crew met their untimely end before being able to retrieve the precious gems! Now you must collect these gems to gain fortune and fame and be crowned king of the Virgin Seas!
Red Beard's Booty is an exciting expansion for Virgin Seas that adds a fabulous red velvet pouch, 48 beautiful gems (same type used in Dig Down Dwarf), and an instruction mat, all housed in a reusable clam-shell case. Instead of each island being worth the set amount indicated on the card, players now draw random gems from the bag and seed the island. Players draw a number of gems equal to the number on the island card. Each gem scores in a different way and this adds a new layer of strategy and excitement to the game! 
If we fund, we promise that Virgin Seas will be a thrilling and rewarding experience for you and your family and friends. However, if we over fund we will be able to expand the game in both quality and quantity. You see, the more we raise, the more units we will be able to manufacture. This equates to a lower unit cost. These saving WILL be added back into the game in the form of additional content and better quality components. Below are these additional goals and rewards.
$20 - THE SAILOR Free Domestic Shipping!
One copy of Virgin Seas with all stretch goals
Access to our premium print and play library
$30 - THE QUARTER MASTER Free Domestic Shipping!
One copy of Virgin Seas with all stretch goals  
One copy of the Red Beard's Booty Expansion
Access to our premium print and play library
 $50- THE NAVIGATOR Free Domestic Shipping!
Custom Gold Tin (Signed and Numbered)
Custom Chessex Die (To determine start player)
2 Velvet Pouches
One Copy of Virgin Seas with all stretch goals
One Copy of the Red Beard's Booty Expansion
Access to our premiun print and play library
 $85 - THE CAPTAIN Free Domestic Shipping!
One copy of Virgin Seas with all stretch goals
One copy of the Red Beard's Booty Expansion
One copy of the Trainmaker
One copy of the Dig Down Dwarf
One copy of Of Dungeons Deep!
Access to our premium print and play library
 $100 - THE MERCHANT Free Domestic Shipping!
Five Copies of Virgin Seas with all stretch goals
Five Copies of the Red Beard's Booty Expansion
Access to our premium print and play library
Customize your pledge by adding any of the listed items to your pledge. Simply add the dollar amount, next to each item below, to your pledge amount. You can make changes to an existing pledge by clicking on the "Manage Your Pledge" button above. We will send out detailed surveys after funding to gather the info needed to customize your pledge. Enjoy! Worldwide shipping included!
Simply add $20 to any pledge (that includes a copy of the game) and you will have it upgraded to a Collector's Edition! You could even add $100 (5x$20) to the Merchant Pledge level and get 5 copies of the Collector's Edition! Mind Blown!
The cost of shipping Virgin Seas is factored into the pledge levels for U.S. Backers. I wanted to explain the shipping costs to everyone, so that you can see exactly where the numbers come from. Below is a nice chart that shows the dollar amount you need to add to your pledge depending on where you live and the shipping credit that is applied at each level. Whatever the cost is to ship within the U.S. becomes a credit that is applied to Canadian, EU, and International shipping. Example: It costs $7 to ship one copy of the game within the U.S. and it costs $13 to ship the same package to Canada, so $7 is taken off the cost for Canadian Backers, thus you only have to pay $6 for shipping instead of the full $15.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Our goal is to make a quality product and we understand the challenges of doing so. Our focus is to stay engaged with both our manufacturers and backers to keep everyone on the same page and informed. An informed backer is a happy backer.

If challenges arise, we will hit them head on. Sometimes an issue can cause a delay, and while delays are typically avoided, producing the the best product is always our end goal. Again, open communication with our backers is key.

All fulfillment will be done in house via the use of USPS. We have our quotes from manufacturers in hand and all artwork is close to complete.

We also have experience with Kickstarter, having run 8 successful campaigns for Plague The Card Game, Zogar's Gaze, Tasnia, Neptune, Four Tribes, Dig Down Dwarf, Of Dungeons Deep!, and Trainmaker. We feel that this experience gives us a good advantage if and when any issues arise.

All of our previous projects have been shipped to backers with the exception of Trainmaker, which is not due until winter 2015/16. Again, we always keep an open line of communication with our backers.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hello Folks!
First of all, I wanted to let all of you know that we are close to being complete with shipping. The final few dozen copies will be out in the next few days! We are using USPS for all our shipping, so be on the lookout!
We have a couple of issues that have come up and I want to attack them head on.

Hello Captains!
I have fantastic news! Virgin Seas just showed up today! So grab your spyglass and your compass, because you are going to be sailing the high seas before you know it! I just have to get these guys all inside and I should start shipping next week!

updates.update_userinfo: Delivery Date, Custom Dice, and New KS!
updates.update_content:
Hello Folks!
Just got word from the Manufacturer that we should have the order on the 19th, which is next Tuesday! WOOT WOOT! Now it may not show up on Tuesday. Sometimes they process it at the Chicago Fedex warehouse and then send it to me on a smaller truck. However, I am certain the order will be here next week! I will have to sort through the order, but I should start shipping the following week.
Update your address if you need to!

Hello Folks!
I have just a quick update for all of you. The manufacture states that the order should be in my hands within the next couple of weeks. Woot Woot! I should be able to start shipping by mid to late July! That is a bit sooner than they had said a few weeks ago. I cannot wait to post pictures for all of you!
I also received a few goodies that I would love to show you.

Hello Folks!
The samples for Virgin Seas have arrived! They look fantastic! We have one issue that I will cover down below. Let's not waste time with words. Let's look at how much game we packed into a small box this time!

Hello Folks!
Just a quick update to let all of you know that surveys have been sent out. You may change your address up until I send out a final shipping update in a few months. So if you move in the near future you are able to change you address .
We are working on the PnP now and should have it ready pretty soon here. In the mean time the low resolution files are still available.

Hello People!
Just wanted to let all of you know that we are currently waiting to receive a physical proof of Virgin Seas. All Digital files have been approved and things are moving forward.
I just did not want to go so long without an update. I will certainly be sharing lots of pictures as soon as we get the physical proofs in hand.

Hello Folks!
Just wanted to keep everyone in the loop as to were we are with the post-campaign stuff. I have completed all the art assets and am now working on formatting the booklet. The manufacturer has reviewed our design for the ship meeple and they gave us a big thumbs up!

Thanks are not enough! I cannot believe the level of sharing during the last few days. What a crazy finish! Today alone we had 80 new backers and over $2800 raised! I am truly humbled!
Virgin Seas will be Manufactured and Shipped to hundreds of people all over the world thanks to 468 people who believed in it! I know I have run a few Kickstarters now, but this feeling never gets old!

campaign.story:
VacuumClicka is an ultra portable vacuum gadget. It is small, easy to use, affordable, and can be used on any bag.
Step 1 - Separate 'em!
Separate the upper and lower clicka valve.
Step 2 - Place lower Clicka inside the bag
Place the lower clicka valve (the one with sharp point) inside the bag, about 1 inch away from the stored products. Then place the bag on a flat surface.
Step 3 - Click 'em!
Place the upper clicka valve on the outside of the bag, position above the lower valve. Flatten the bag with your hands to eliminate wrinkle. Press in the middle of the upper clicka valve until it's "clicked".
Step 4 - Seal it closed!
Open up the clip and place the bag slightly above the clicka valves. Simply seal it closed and make sure the whole bag is inside the clip.
Step 5 - Pump it!
Place the pump on the upper clicka valve and pump it until the bag is fully vacuumed. That's it!
You can use the VacuumClicka on most pre-packaged bags that you see from the grocery stores! Making it easy and simple to keep your favorite snacks fresh!
With the VacuumClicka, you no longer need to break the bank with expensive vacuum machines. 
The VacuumClickas are reusable. Use it as many times as you want!
Once you're done, simply put them back in your kitchen drawer and use them again next time. Save your precious counter space!
Whether you're camping, travelling, or going for a hike, you can always pack the VacuumClicka with you to keep your favorite snack fresh.
Store your frozen meat or seafood in the freezer to keep them fresh longer. 
Simply put them in the dishwasher when you need to clean them. 
Put your frozen meat in the microwave to defrost!
Whether it's fruits, meat or seafood. You can now keep your food fresh longer!
Say no more to freezer burn!
Vacuum seal your food to preserve the natural flavors.
In a hurry to marinate your food? Use it to make the marinating process faster for your next BBQ!
Use it to prepare your meals for the week!  
You can also use it to save space when packing clothes. Especially useful while travelling or camping to save space and keep your clothes dry!
75K Stretch Goal - UNLOCKED
At 75k, a new color option for the VacuumClicka will be released! Only available to Kickstarter Backers!
150K Stretch Goal
At 150k, all Starter Kit & Refill Kit will be upgraded with 5 additional ClickaBags (8 ClickaBags in total)!
225K Stretch Goal
At 225k, All Starter Kit & Refill Kit will be updated with 1 additional Clicka, 1 additional Clip & 5 additional ClickaBags! So in total you'll get 4 Clickas + 4 Clips + 8 ClickaBags!
Please share our project on Facebook and Twitter to let your friends and family know how awesome this project is! We have more stretch goals in the pipeline, and will only be made possible with your support!
VacuumClicka Starter Kit (Clicka x 3 / Clip x 3 / Pump x 1 / Bag x 3)
VacuumClicka Refill Kit (Clicka x 3 / Clip x 3 / Bag x 3)
ClickaBag Refill Kit (Bag x 20)
As we are based in Vancouver, Canada, our pledges are in Canadian Dollars. 
You want to add additional items to your reward like another Starter Kit or Refill Kit? Maybe more ClickaBags for your next meal prep? It's simple!
1. Choose a reward level
You must choose one reward level to back this project in order to add-on items. You will receive all the items in the reward.
2. Choose the item(s) you want to add from the Add-On Menu
If you wish to add additional items to your reward, you can add it to your reward by increasing your pledge by the amount specified in the menu. You can add as many items as you want from the add-on menu. 
3. Message us
Once you're done, please message us with the item and quantity that you added and we will confirm your order.
We will ship from our fulfillment facility in Vancouver, Canada to anywhere around the world. 
We ship worldwide!
Thanks for taking the time to check us out! We'd hugely appreciate you sharing it with your friends.
If you have any questions at all, please feel free to get in touch with us!
Backers: kickstarter@vacuumclicka.com
Business Enquiries: business@vacuumclicka.com
Press & Media Enquiries: Colin Trethewey - colin@prmedianow.com
We'd like to thank PUSHR for the awesome video!
PUSHR - www.pushr.ca
_____________
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
If all goes well during our funding campaign, we'll have a good amount of preorders for our product. We will be placing an order to our supplier at once for the manufacturing once the campaign is over. It's safe to say that there is reasonable risk involved in production and delivery such as busy period for the supplier, custom clearance, and passing our quality testing, which could result in delays.

There are always challenges and unforeseen obstacles that arise when trying to bring a product to the market. However, we're dedicated to do what we can to make sure we meet all goals and production deadline in order to deliver our product to you on time!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: We have been advised by Kickstarter Integrity that our campaign will be suspended
updates.update_content:
Dear Backers,
This morning, on the very last day of our 45-day campaign with few hours left, Kickstarter Integrity sent us an email to let us know that our project will be suspended due to violation of their rules. They stated that we have violated the following:
Offer purchased items and claim to have made them yourself 
Present someone else’s work as your own 
Misrepresent or fail to disclose relevant facts about the project or its creator
We have previously submitted our supporting development documents and prototype renderings to Kickstarter Integrity as requested to illustrate our process, and had been advised that our response was in good regards to continue on. However, we were shocked to receive their email this morning advising that we will be suspended on the last day of our campaign.

We've hit 150k! Stretch Goal Unlocked!
Thanks to you, we are able to hit our 150k stretch goal! Which means each of our Starter Kit and Refill Kit will be upgraded to a total of 8 ClickaBags!

Our 75K stretch goal is just around the corner to unlock a new color. More stretch goals will be announced soon!

THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!
We're excited to add the following stretch goals:

Yes, we're listening!

AMAZING! 
You guys have made it happen! 
We have just hit our goal of $15,000 in 3 short days!
Thank you for being our first backers and early believers. We are thrilled and truly humbled by the response!

WOW! 
In just a little over a day, we've already reached 50% of our goal!
Thank you all for getting us here so far!
We appreciate your support and we need your help to make this campaign bigger and better! Remember to  on your facebook timeline and let everyone know about your pledge!

Great news!
Because of our all of our backers' support, we're now able to offer a group rate with our shipping company which significantly reduced the overall shipping cost.
Thank you to all of our backers for your support!
Cheers,
The VacuumClicka Team

campaign.story:
We’re back! After the successful funding of nearly $500,000 from our previous campaign, Bomber Barrel, our early Kickstarter backers asked us to make a survival keychain to go with their Bomber Barrel Duffle Bag and bracelet. Introducing — Bomber Survival Gear, Survival Bracelet and Keychain.
Bomber Complete Pack - Bomber Barrel Duffle Bag and Paracord Bracelet
Bomber Paracord Keychain
Bomber Paracord Survival Bracelet
We wanted to create a timeless piece to accommodate your Bomber Barrel: an accessory that you can bring with you to the city, on hikes, and on all of your adventures. So the conception of the perfect everyday keychain was brought to life.
Firestarter Paracord Survival Keychain
Bomber Paracord Keychain
With its minimal design and effective functionality, the Bomber Survival Paracord Keychain is the perfect addition to your Bomber Barrel Duffle Bag and survival gear collection.
Bomber Paracord Keychain
We carefully crafted and tied premium quality 550 paracord into the design. The Bomber Survival Paracord Keychain can be used for a variety of emergency situations. 
Bomber Paracord Keychain
                 Bomber Paracord Keychain X MagKey
Equipped with 3 meters of paracord and fire-starting capabilities, the Bomber Survival Bracelet is not only stylish but practical.  The funding will help us manufacture a second production run of our Bomber Survival Bracelets.
Bomber Paracord Bracelet
Bomber Paracord Bracelet and Keychain
In addition to its functional 550 paracord strength, the Bomber Survival Bracelet and Bomber Survival Paracord Keychain both have firestarting capabilities using flint/steel woven within its design.
Bomber Paracord Survival Bracelet
Due to popular demand, we are bringing back the Bomber Barrel Set with an added bonus: the Bomber Survival Paracord Keychain.
The complete Bomber Set includes the original Bomber Barrel Duffle Bag, Mini Bomber Travel Kit, Bomber Survival Bracelet, and Bomber Survival Paracord Keychain.  With your help, we can start a second production run of the Bomber Barrel Duffle Bags.  All of the original tooling and pattern costs have been set up. Now, we're just in need of funding to get started on our production.
Bomber Barrel Duffle Bag, Paracord Bracelet, & Keychain
Bomber Barrel Duffle Bag
Bomber Barrel
Paracord was first used as suspension lines for U.S. parachutes during WWII, but has since proved itself useful in hundreds, if not thousands of other ways. The braided sheath has an incredible number of interwoven strands compared to its thickness, giving it a smooth texture, elastic feel, and unmatched strength. This makes it compact, fashionable, and highly useful in survival and dangerous situations.
Bomber & Company - Paracord Survival Gear
                                                      Bomber & Company was founded on Kickstarter by you! The success of our previous campaign, Bomber Barrel, is really due to a strong backbone of supporters. We seriously appreciate all the support you have given us because without you, we wouldn't be here. 
We're a small company based in San Francisco on a mission to bring you the best damn everyday products. We can ensure our products are made with the best quality in mind as we would not offer a product that we would not use ourselves. 
Bomber & Company is a start-up based in San Francisco
Bomber & Company is a start-up based in San Francisco
We have a promise to keep. Our promise is to provide you the best damn everyday products you can own, period.  We need the best damn support from you guys again to make this dream come true.
Your funding will go towards: high quality materials, packaging, production, and logistics for the Complete Bomber Set. Not only will your support help production possible, but will also provide the community with more everyday carry products.
Thank you for taking the time to check out our project. As a small startup based in San Francisco, it means a lot to have your support.
Best,
Vincent Pilot Ng (Lead Designer/Founder)
Andrew Tran Nguyen (Director of Operations)
P.S.: Check out some of our high-quality resolution pictures here. :)
SHARE US
@bomberandcompany
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
If Bomber Survival Gear is successfully funded, we will have to make sure everything goes according to plan to meet the promised deadline. We have manufacturing, operations, and logistics set up and ready to go. The funding raised on Kickstarter will be used for production and manufacturing. Although we do not see any direct risks and challenges, there are always indirect or unseen tasks that may present itself during the process of productions. We hope to run everything as streamlined as possible and also ahead of schedule to make you the best damn everyday carry, ever.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.creator_bio:
Bomber Barrel
2 created · 42 backed
BOMBER & COMPANY - Best Black Duffle and paracord bracelet, paracord keychain, survival gear. www.bomberco.comSee more

updates.update_userinfo: Survey and Shipping - ONLY 3 DAYS LEFT!
updates.update_content: We only have 3 days left! We're nearing the end of our campaign. We are incredibly grateful to have your support. We really wouldn't be here today if it wasn't for you and the Kickstarter community of supporters. It has been another amazing experience and we are very excited to get our products into production and into your hands very soon.

updates.update_userinfo: 7 DAYS LEFT! REMINDER: Bomber Survey + Extra Info
updates.update_content: We only have 5 days left in our campaign everyone and we're still going strong thanks to you guys! Were still on track to hit $500K organically. With over 8,000 backers, we should be able to surpass our stretch goal of $637K with no problems at all! We just need you guys to keep spreading the love for us! You guys are already doing a phenomenal job. Keep up the great work team! :)

updates.update_userinfo: Bomber Survey - Help us expedite faster delivery!
updates.update_content: We hope you guys had a great weekend as we sure did! With only 9 days left in our campaign, we reached $363K in funding! We would absolutely LOVE to share a video with you guys.

We're making great progress so far guys. We've hit over $300,000 in funding and are on track to hit $500,000 organically. Although some of you may believe, our $637K stretch goal may be a long stretch, it most definitely is not at all! This is where we need your help guys: we have over 6,000 backers and if we have everyone share our campaign via social media and had just one return, we should gain enough momentum to reach $650K with no problems at all! ;)

updates.update_userinfo: WE NEED YOUR HELP: $637K STRETCH GOAL!
updates.update_content:
Thank you so much for your support everyone! It really is amazing to see how fast this project has progressed over the past month! You guys have done a phenomenal job at sharing and spreading the word about our project.
We have some really exciting news to share with you guys. It looks like we're on track for our $287K stretch goal. As a recap, once we hit our stretch goal of $287K, everyone who pledged for a Complete Bomber Set will receive an ADDITIONAL Kickstarter Olive Green Keychain. Now, for the real exciting news. We have spent the past week working with our manufacturer as well as third party vendors to find the best options for another amazing stretch goal. So we thought: why not? Let's give an ADDITIONAL Kickstarter Olive Green Keychains to of our backers for our live project. That's right! Everyone who backed our live campaign will receive an extra keychain for

updates.update_userinfo: $637K Stretch Goal Announcement - Kickstarter Olive Green Keychains For Everyone!
updates.update_content: The weekend is approaching and we hope you guys have some awesome plans! For us, we have some extremely big news to share with you guys. We were featured on GQ TAIWAN! This is just so incredible to us. Us?! ON GQ?! WOW! We never could of imagined that Bomber & Company was GQ worthy. Our bag really is the best men's designer bag of the year! Not only that, but we're going to have to make Bomber & Company the best brand of the year! ;) Feel free to check out our feature or by clicking the picture below.

Happy hump day everyone! We have some great news. It looks like we're on our way to hit our $287,000 stretch goal. As a reminder, once we hit $287,000, everyone who pledged for a Complete Bomber Set Reward will receive an ADDITIONAL Kickstarter Olive Green Keychain. We also have something else in store for you guys if we hit our half a million mark. It's going to be a HUGE surprise for everyone. Trust us, it'll be worth it. ;)

updates.update_userinfo: Awesome HIGH-RES Lifestyle Photos + Stretch Goal Update
updates.update_content: We hope everyone had an amazing weekend. As of today, our project has hit $228,000 in funding! We can proudly say that we have launched another very successful campaign. In all honesty, it's incredible to see how Bomber & Company has grown in such a short time. We started as a passion project and never imagined that we would come this far. In October 2014, we launched our very first bag campaign ever, Bomber Barrel and made almost $500,000 in funding. Now, we're heading towards $250,000 with our second campaign and it's all because of you guys.  We're extremely grateful to be surrounded by such a supportive community. Cheers to that!

Thank you SO much for all of the support thus far! We have some great news for you guys. We've tallied up all the votes we received and the winning color is: KICKSTARTER OLIVE GREEN!  Here's a picture of one of our samples we received:

I was reading through the comments and saw @James mention adding snaps for function and thought it would be a good idea also. As a product designer and former attaching/application specialist for a USA snap manufacturer I felt I could offer a good solution. Any typical tube style metal snap will put a hole into the bag because of the open tube in the attached snap making efforts to weatherproof void. We sell an acetal snap which is weatherproof, UB stabilized, IR resistant, snaps have a Teflon addictive so the snap feel remains the same, lightweight, and doesn't rattle or corrode like a metal snap. Comes in matte black which fits the look of the bag and was developed for military packs and gear. For added versatility it also functions with those standard metal snaps mentioned which you can buy in the sewing section at most stores and they are all military spec in size. Anyone can make their own accessories to snap on straps to hold an oversized item, simple strap loop and D-ring for hanging items, or just some added protection for the bag like mentioned before. campaign.story:
Have you always wanted to keep a sketch journal but aren't sure you have the time or skills? Would you benefit from instruction, motivation, and tuition to help you record the sights you see and the people and places that you visit?  
As the answer to this, we at 3dtotal Publishing have created an inspiring artistic solution to enable you to carry your creativity around with you: How to Keep a Sketch Journal. 
The different elements for the full How to Keep a Sketch Journal package
A sketch journal allows you to record what you see around you and visualize your inner thoughts. It can offer an opportunity for you to relax and contemplate, a space for you to experiment with new materials and ideas, and a memoir in which to chronicle your progress and store references.
You can use a sketch journal to record your pets, friends, meals, family, special events, and occasions; to remember something nice someone did for you today, something that inspired you, something that taught you a new trick; to collect ideas and try new things.
This colourful display is by Rhea Dadoo, one of the featured artists in the How to Keep a Sketch Journal guide book
Following the success of the Sketch Workshop Kickstarter campaign, 3dtotal Publishing’s How to Keep a Sketch Journal package will help you follow your creative aspirations and unleash the artist within you. The project incorporates the informative How to Keep a Sketch Journal guide book teamed with high-quality sketch pads, quintessential artist tools, and a soft leather cover to wrap everything up as a compact artistic companion.
At 3dtotal we believe everyone has the potential to be creative, so How to Keep a Sketch Journal will help even the most beginner sketcher to unlock their inner artist, teaching you all the essential techniques to get your journal started – and how to keep it going!
112 pages of expert advice and stunning images; note that this is a mock-up image
The book will consist of four main sections with step-by-step guides covering the basics, watercolour techniques, pen and pencil techniques, and mixed media techniques. The specially selected artists behind the book will offer you advice and insights into their own work, as well as talking to you about some of their favourite techniques. The aim is to encourage you to discover how to keep a sketch journal in your own unique way.
Book mock-up - Florian Afflerbach
Not all of us lead exciting lives jetting around the world so How to Keep a Sketch Journal will provide you with plenty of ideas for interpreting the most mundane day-to-day subjects as exciting visual expressions, from annotated sketches to multimedia drawings. 
Book mock-up - Rhea Dadoo
For those of you who are lucky enough to have landmarks like the Eiffel Tower at your doorstep, we’ll give you a glimpse into other artists’ sketch journals to give you ideas for optimizing and maintaining your visual diary. With its attractive hand-drawn feel, this A5-size book will give you all the knowledge, motivation, and confidence you’ll need!
Book mock-up - Florian Afflerbach
Sketch wherever you go and carry your journal, tools, and How to Keep a Sketch Journal book with you! The soft, real leather cover is designed to be light and comfortable for you to carry wherever you are going. Slightly bigger than A5, it will neatly wrap up your sketch journal items while the leather ribbon will ensure your art tools are kept secure.
Of course, you'll also need your own, blank journal for you to start your sketching adventures in! We therefore have two journals for you to choose from to allow you to tailor the package to your needs and budget:  
An A5 hardback journal with 170gsm high-quality cartridge paper, ideal for sketching with pen and pencil - portrait orientation  
A Monsieur A5 soft leather cover premium journal with 200gsm watercolour paper - landscape orientation  
Just select the pledge option that best suits you!
The landscape premium watercolour journal and the portrait hardback journal
The tool set includes the basic HB pencil and a fineliner pen, plus a watercolour set and a water brush pen, so you’ll be able to add colour and your own distinct style to your journal. 
We’ve carefully selected tools that are high quality yet practical enough to be used on the move. For example the handy water brush pen will make painting on location a breeze, without the inconvenience of having to wipe up spilled water. 
Plus, as part of the watercolour set we'll include handy postcards displaying colour swatches and a colour wheel that can easily be tucked into one of the inside pockets of the leather cover, so you'll have all the essential information close to hand.
We created the How to Keep a Sketch Journal package as a beautiful and inspiring bundle for anyone who has ever thought about keeping a sketch journal or who just wants to find a new creative outlet, whatever your skill level. The range of pledge options means you can tailor the package to suit you. 
 We now have 11 different pledge options available:
#1 The book 
Get the How to Keep a Sketch Journal book! A beautifully designed 112-page guide to teach you how to draw from life, indoors and out, using pens, pencils, watercolours, and mixed media. Its dinky size will make it your best friend on sketching days out!
#2 The book × 2
Buddy up! 1 copy of the How to Keep a Sketch Journal book for you plus another for a friend!
#3 The book + leather cover
Get the How to Keep a Sketch Journal book + an attractive soft leather cover to enable you to carry everything you need to sketch on the go!
#4 The book + leather cover + hardback journal
Get the How to Keep a Sketch Journal book + the leather cover + a hardback journal for you to start your sketch journal in. High-quality art paper in a case bound book to help you keep your sketches for years to come! And it fits perfectly in the leather cover along with your How to Keep a Sketch Journal guide book!
#5 The book × 3
Great gifts for your friends – 3 copies of the How to Keep a Sketch Journal book!
#6 The book + leather cover + premium watercolour journal 
Get the How to Keep a Sketch Journal book + the leather cover + a luxury softcover watercolour pad for you to start a more colourful sketch journal in. The leather softcover offers a lovely rustic feel to help you feel inspired. Once again it all fits perfectly in the leather cover along with your How to Keep a Sketch Journal guide book!
#7 The full set (basic)
The basic full Sketch Journal set! Get the How to Keep a Sketch Journal book + the leather cover + the hardback journal + a selection of quality art tools: 1 watercolour travel set, 1 water brush pen, 1 HB pencil, 1 fineliner. A complete package to get you started on your sketching journey!
#8 The full set (premium)
The premium full Sketch Journal set! Get the How to Keep a Sketch Journal book + the leather cover + the luxury softcover watercolour pad + a selection of quality art tools: 1 watercolour travel set, 1 water brush pen, 1 HB pencil, 1 fineliner. A complete package with an added bit of luxury to get you started on your sketching journey!
#9 The book × 5
Start your own sketching group and get 5 copies of the How to Keep a Sketch Journal book. 
#10 The premium full set + 4 additional premium watercolour journals
Bundle up on watercolour journals to make sure you have enough to keep you going! Get the How to Keep a Sketch Journal book + the leather cover + 5 luxury softcover watercolour pads + a selection of quality art tools: 1 watercolour travel set, 1 water brush pen, 1 HB pencil, 1 fineliner.
#11 The book × 10
Perfect bundle for the classroom! Get 10 copies of the How to Keep a Sketch Journal book. 
Add-ons
We're also now giving you the opportunity to add up to five extra hardback and/or watercolour journals to your pledges, just in case you want to stock up on more than one!
And here are a couple of stretch goals as thanks for your support - both are now unlocked!!
We know what you’re thinking: this would make a perfect gift! If you'd like to gift any of the Sketch Journal tiers, we can send you an electronic gift card by email so that your loved ones will know their presents are on the way.
We ship worldwide! Simply select your favourite pledge option and your location and Kickstarter will calculate the shipping for you!  
Shipping in the UK will be trackable; however shipping outside of the UK will be untracked. If you require a tracked solution for your rewards, please message us or email support@3dtotal.com and we'll provide a shipping quote.  
What if my parcel gets lost? 
In the event of lost orders in the mail (it happens!), we will offer to resend the order once for free, or alternatively you will have the option of a refund. Please note that we can only reship an order once if it is lost. If the second parcel is lost, we will not be able to offer a refund.
With the Sketch Workshop experience now firmly under our belts, we are already hard at work writing and commissioning content for the How to Keep a Sketch Journal book, while continuing to refine and make improvements to the leather cover to ensure it's as comfortable and easy to carry as it is good-looking. If we reach our funding goal in July, we will be able to finalise the cover for mass production, and we expect for our shipments of books and covers to arrive in early December, allowing us to ship to backers throughout the month of December.  
As with any Kickstarter project, schedules can change depending on a variety of factors, however we have a lot of experience as publishers and Kickstarter creators, so we are confident we can stay on track. We will of course keep our backers up to date if any changes arise.
As a publisher of art books and tools specialising in computer graphics, we love that we can reach a new audience for traditional art through Kickstarter. We have met so many talented and inspiring people through the Kickstarter community already, and we hope to grow that network further still through the Sketch Journal project. Join us!
3dtotal Publishing is the maker of a library of successful educational books for digital artists, spanning a variety of subjects from digital painting for beginners to sculpting in ZBrush for professionals. Behind 3dtotal Publishing is the 3dtotal.com website, which has been around for the last 15 years offering artists and hobbyists helpful free tutorials and insightful articles to aid them with their digital art triumphs.
We’ve been working with all genres of artist since 1999 to create instructional and inspirational art books, tutorials, eBooks, magazines and more. It’s safe to say that we are a well-respected publisher and resource site and we pride ourselves on this reputation. We have already launched a host of successful Kickstarter projects, including:
Prime Wars (card game)
Male anatomical reference figure
404: Law Not Found (board game)
e338: The Art of Loic Zimmermann (art book)
The Sketch Workshop
Female anatomical reference figure
Male and female planar anatomical statues, plus full écorché, nude and biosuit editions! 
Wizard's Academy (board game)
A big thanks to 3dtotal's Az Pishneshin for his brilliant photography and camera work, to Marisa Lewis for her hard work on the illustrations and for being so wonderful to film, and to everyone who has helped to test the How to Keep a Sketch Journal package in order to make it the practical solution it has become.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The challenge is to show you the benefits of keeping a sketch journal and teach you how to start and maintain one. To achieve this we’ve worked really hard as a team to discuss ideas about what will work and what won’t. We hope that as a result we’ll be able to offer you something useful and inspiring to help you start a new artistic adventure! 

As always with books, the challenge is to get everything written, edited, proofed, designed and printed on time. We are becoming well practised in dealing with the hiccups and panic moments that come up during book production, so we will be doing our utmost to ensure your rewards are delivered on time. 

With the other elements involved, such as the leather cover and journal pads, we need to make sure we keep up to date with the manufacturers we are using to ensure everything comes together at the end. We gained some good experience of this with the Sketch Workshop campaign, so we are optimistic that we’ll be able to use this to help everything run smoothly! If any problems do occur though we’ll keep you in the loop with regular updates.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
VivaBoo Tea Infuser
One day, I saw a documentary about the platypus. The duck-billed, beaver-tailed, otter-footed platypus is a unique animal inhabiting eastern Australia. It looks goofy and cute, but is an uncommon species vulnerable to endangerment. We started this VivaBoo project to invite this rare, threatened creature to be a part of our everyday lives.
Fill our platypus-shaped VivaBoo Tea Infuser’s belly with a loose tea of your choice and put it in a cup of hot water. The tea diffuses through VivaBoo’s body. Whether it’s a mug or a tumbler, VivaBoo hangs conveniently inside your cup by its bill. Cute and fun, catch VivaBoo peeking curiously from your cup!
How to use VivaBoo:
Open VivaBoo's belly and put some loose tea inside.
Hang VivaBoo inside the cup by its bill.
Pour hot water into the cup.
Relax with your new pal, VivaBoo!
Vivid Coral Picks
You can find coral reefs in warm, clear waters around the world. Our Vivid Coral Picks are inspired by these purifying and life-giving ecosystems. Stick these picks in your teatime snacks and watch a marvelous ocean scene unfold. The Vivid Coral Picks are easy to clean and always on hand, stored conveniently in their base. Try the Vivid Coral Picks for your next tea party, picnic, or snack time for a beautiful, fun atmosphere!
Enjoying the beauty of nature is not always easy for people living in a dull gray city. We designed Vivid Coral Picks to help people experience a piece of nature's beauty in the city, café, home, and park more easily.
How to use Vivid Coral Picks: 
Pick a piece of coral from the base.
Stick the pick in your food.
Take a bite.
Keep the picks in their base so they're always easy to find.
Twitter / Facebook / Instagram / Pinterest / Gongdreen.com
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The most difficult part of developing this product so far has been design. Most specifically, designing the platypus bill to stay on the cup and balancing that with a large cavity for tea took quite a few tries. We've tested many designs and have one we are very comfortable with! 

In our experience, the most common problems come up when dealing with the manufacturing factories. For example, they may misinterpret a 3D design file or color orders. To avoid this kind of mishap, we are very thorough when checking with the factory, providing very detailed instructions and requests, as well as confirming each step along the way.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hello!
Well, there's less than 24 hours left on the VivaBoo Tea Infuser and Vivid Coral Picks Kickstarter project. We've surpassed our goal of $5,000, all thanks to you! Everything is all set and we can't wait to send your rewards out. We will send out surveys to collect your shipping addresses and color choices within a few days. 
If you want to grab an extra VivaBoo Tea Infuser or Vivid Coral Picks set for a friend (or yourself!), please pledge through the Kickstarter project here before it closes on July 3rd. These rewards are heavily discounted and the prices will probably go up a bit if you wait too long. Let your friends know about our project one last time before we wrap things up here and ship them all out!

We're working hard to get VivaBoo and Vivid Coral Picks to production early. Inspired by your support we're pushing even further and have already finished designing and printing the packaging well ahead of schedule! We took a few shots so you could all join us in the process. Check it out! :)

Hello!
Well, look at that! Our VivaBoo tea infuser and Vivid Coral Picks are already 110% funded and we still have 19 days left. That's all thanks to you guys giving 110% effort by supporting and sharing the project so much. We're looking forward to getting your VivaBoos and Vivid Coral Picks out to you in July! 
We've also filled our VivaBoo Early Bird reward tier (limited to 100 backers). Plenty of other discounted VivaBoo options still remain, though! Please continue supporting VivaBoo and Vivid Coral Picks by sharing the project with your friends and followers! It really is a huge, and much appreciated, help. :)

campaign.story:
In 1991, a group of footwear designers in Santa Barbara, CA had a vision. They set out to create a footwear company focused on keeping things simple. In an industry fixated on hype, Simple concentrated on quality, comfort, and attention to detail. Although establishing the business took considerable time and effort, coming up with a name for the company was Simple.
Now, as Simple gears up for our relaunch after a 4-year hiatus, we are excited to see what the future holds. By contributing to this Kickstarter campaign, you can be responsible for bringing back the shoes you love while giving Simple the edge we need to distribute a wider range of designs to even more locations throughout the US and around the globe. To show our appreciation of your loyalty, Simple is offering our backers a range of rewards, from t-shirts and totes to your favorite Simple shoes. So now’s your chance. Every little bit helps to get Simple back on your feet.
Campaign support provided by M studio.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The greatest risk associated with rebuilding a brand of footwear so many people grew to love and depend upon will be measuring and meeting the demand for our range of products following this Kickstarter campaign and once product becomes available to the public. While we are confident in being able to fulfill our backers’ rewards requests by September 15, there is always the potential for unforeseen delays in production.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hello, 
 First and foremost, we at Simple want to thank you for your support and patience. We know we made a commitment to you and we plan to honor it 100% without fail. Your loyalty is important to us.
We plan to get the first orders of OS91 into our warehouse on or about JAN25 and will start shipping direct to our kickstarter supporters first. The product is on the water and in transit. You are our first priority and we will deliver as promised.

updates.update_userinfo: To Those Awaiting Their OS-91 Arrival
updates.update_content:
Hello, Kickstarter Backers!
As some of the reward levels have begun being shipped, we have received a few messages and comments pertaining to certain styles running large. If you find that your shoes do not fit properly, and you would like more information on how to exchange for a different size, please email customerservice@simpleshoes.com. If you have already shared these concerns through Kickstarter message or comment, please follow-up at customerservice@simpleshoes.com as well, so we can be sure all pertinent information is being shared with the proper department.

Hello Kickstarter Backers, 
Thank you very much for your support, your questions, and your comments. Because there is no way to respond directly to questions or comments left in this section, we have been working to respond to any concerns through direct messages via this Kickstarter campaign. Please accept our sincerest apologies for any delays in communications, but be aware that we are working to answer all questions or comments as we continue our efforts to fulfill orders at this time. If you have any further questions or comments, please reach out to us via , and we will try to respond as quickly as possible.

Please respond regarding whether you would like to switch from the OS-91 to the Pipeline-1 by following the instructions below:
1. Click the icon in the top right portion of your screen.
2. In the drop down, click “Messages.”
3. You should see a message in your inbox from Simple Shoes pertaining to switching from the OS-91 to the Pipeline-1. Click on this message.

updates.update_userinfo: Thank you for your questions and comments

updates.update_content:
Firstly, we would like to extend a giant THANK YOU to all of the backers who helped Simple far surpass our Kickstarter goal! This campaign has been an amazing experience, and it has been truly moving to hear so many people's Simple stories and to see such enthusiasm for our return. 
As the reward surveys have been sent and we work to fulfill all reward requests, some questions have arisen amongst backers. Due to the high number of comments, questions posted within the Kickstarter comment section may get lost or unintentionally overlooked.

Thank you so much to everyone who has backed our Kickstarter campaign, giving Simple the support we need to prepare for a successful relaunch and fruitful future! With only 24 hours left, if you haven't contributed yet, now is your chance! 
Keep up with Simple beyond our Kickstarter campaign by visiting SimpleShoes.com and signing up for our mailing list.
